name: Alan
story:
Alan

A youth born into a family of knights and 
training hard to become one. Acts out of a
 belief that killing dragons is the best way
 to protect the people. In order to do that
, he enters the tournament that is also the
 entry exam for the Knights.

name: Alan, Warrior
story:
Alan the Warrior 

A youth whose victory in the tournament 
has earned him a place in the knights. Oft
en clashes with other new recruits becaus
e of his uncompromising sense of justice,
 but that same mentality is also attracting
 attention for his future as a knight.

name: Alan, Royal Knight
story:
Alan the Royal Knight

Alan has become the leader of the knights
. His bravery is unwavering, and his newfo
und skill allows him to survive even greate
r perils. He never involves his allies, and m
aintains the “come back in one piece” m
otto of his forbearers.

name: Cain
story:
Cain

A youth who lost his parents at a young a
ge and has lived alone ever since. Believe
s power is everything, and has no interest
 into anything else. Heads to the Capital i
n order to find the Evil Dragon's Eye.

name: Cain, Brave man
story:
Cain the Brave man

A youth who winds up joining the knights
 after successfully competing in a tournam
ent he joined while seeking info about the
 Evil Dragon’s Eye. He is now more inter
ested in Alan, the one who defeated him i
n the tourney. They are rivals in everythin
g.

name: Cain, Cavalryman
story:
Cain the Cavalryman 

A knight who has awoken to darkness afte
r obtaining the Evil Dragon's Eye. The eye
 brings certain death to all it looks upon, 
and gets stronger with each dragon it slay
s. Cain must always seek more dragons to
 kill. But when they are all dead...

name: Luka
story:
Luka

A girl from a bloodline of ancient dragons
. With a lifespan much greater than the av
erage human, she is already over 100 yea
rs old. Her search for the ancient dragon 
has brought her to the capital. She hopes
 to end the conflict between dragons and 
humans.
cutin: I see each puff of wind!

name: Luka, Master Archer
story:
Luka the Master Archer

A girl from a line of dragons who has now
 joined the knights. The battle between a 
fire swordsman and dark warrior she happ
ened to see at a tournament matched exac
tly with a legend of her people, so she joi
ned the knights to see how it will end.

name: Luka, Sniper
story:
Luka the Sniper 

Head of the dragon tribe and now leading
 100 of her kind. After the fire swordsman
 and dark warrior resolved their conflict, s
he left the knights, collected her scattere
d tribe, and returned. Now she prepares f
or the last battle in the Forbidden Library
.

name: Maria
story:
Maria

The daughter of the king and already a mi
stress of magic. She has a great respect f
or her mother who died protecting the Ca
pital from a dragon. She's also a little bor
ed of her conservative father, so she often
 watches tournaments for excitement.

name: Maria, Priestess
story:
Maria the Priestess 

A young leader who protects the Capital w
ith her holy power and commands the knig
hts.  Along with a fire swordsman, dark wa
rrior, and water archer, she helped drive o
ff a dragon that attacked the capital durin
g a tournament. She now vows to end the
 war.

name: Maria, Holy Woman
story:
Maria the Holy Woman

A holy woman who leads the people again
st the dragons in place of the mysteriousl
y ill king. Has saved the Capital with many
 miracles, and trusts her allies completely
. She actually has the same sickness as he
r father, but she keeps it a secret.

name: Rabby
story:
Rabby

Growing up with his friends Aaron, Anasta
sia and Carrol, a lively village boy trained 
in swordsmanship against adults, he's qui
te skilled. Dreams of slaying dragons and 
becoming a hero who will bring peace to t
he world.

accessory.name: Red Feather
accessory.detail: A token of friendship received from Arlong. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Karl
story:
Karl

A youth born into a household of fisherme
n. Unable to forgive dragons and monster
s for disturbing the seas, he strikes out o
n a journey to eliminate their evil. Alone a
gainst the waves, he finds solace in his la
te father's stories of a sea princess.

accessory.name: Waterguard Pen
accessory.detail: Given to him by his father. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Aleksy
story:
Aleksy

A youth who came to the Royal Capital, to
gether with his friend Michael, to join the
 Royal Knights. Having failed the entrance
 exam, however, he realizes Michael's sup
eriority. This realization drives him to red
ouble his training efforts.

accessory.name: Musketeer Talisman
accessory.detail: Given by Michael when Aleksy was a child. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Viktor
story:
Viktor

A young watchman who serves with Erving
. Drawn to Erving's strength and charisma
, he lives to fight by his side. He doesn't t
ake kindly to Erving's interest in Ludmilla
, and is planning to drive her from the vill
age.

accessory.name: Lavender Scarf
accessory.detail: A scarf that Victor stole from Irving. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Yuri
story:
Yuri

A youth interested in the life cycle of anim
als. Often explores the mountains behind 
the village. Originally not interested in dr
agons, but after learning of a dragon that
 looks like a wild boar, he becomes obsess
ed with discovering its origins.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Helm
accessory.detail: A cap designed to look like a Bahamutton. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Rabby Prana
story:
Rabby Prana

A youth seeking to bring peace to the wor
ld by driving out the dragons. He has hon
ed his skills after years of fighting. The lo
ss of his dear Anastasia teaches him to ca
re for his allies and keep a cool head, earn
ing him his comrades' trust.

accessory.name: Red Feather+
accessory.detail: With this, the rival became a worthy foe. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Karl Valna
story:
Karl Valna

A youth who respects his fisherman fathe
r, and seeks to protect the seas from the 
dragons. At the same time, he collects wo
rd on the legends of the sea princess that
 his father always spoke of. He hopes one
 day to share that story with his own child
ren.

accessory.name: Waterguard Pen+
accessory.detail: Every ship's log entry is written with this. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Aleksy Crest
story:
Aleksy Crest

A young knight defending Knight King Art
orius in the Capital. Works directly for the
 King, who trusts him implicitly, and is no
w a skilled and powerful fighter. His stanc
e of putting his all into his defense has al
so earned Aleksy support from the people
.

accessory.name: Musketeer Talisman+
accessory.detail: Emblem of the rascally Three Musketeers. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Viktor Straff
story:
Viktor Straff

Viktor worked for a long time under Ervin
g, but never managed to truly catch his at
tention. In fact, he was even ordered to se
arch for Ludmilla, whom he himself drove 
out of the village, and this has sunk him in
to a perpetual, explosive rage.

accessory.name: Lavender Scarf+
accessory.detail: The skull electrifies the wearer's soul. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Yuri Valrotz
story:
Yuri Valrotz

A youth who is now scared of animals afte
r being chased around in his childhood by
 a boar-like dragon. However, he still likes
 animals, and now continues his own inves
tigations - leading him to learn that large
 numbers of dragons have been disappear
ing.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Helm+
accessory.detail: Too shoddily made to serve as a disguise. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Aaron
story:
Aaron

An ambitious youth who sees his childhoo
d friend, Rabby, as his rival. He seeks to s
lay a dragon faster than anyone else. An e
xcellent fighter, he's also a hard worker w
ho is constantly training outside of the sig
ht of others.

accessory.name: Red Bangle
accessory.detail: Carol's gift to Aaron for his promotion. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Leonard
story:
Leonard

A youth seeking excitement in the towns, 
bored of the unchanging sea. Bold and ful
l of fun, his friends trust him implicitly, an
d he's well known across the region. Sets
 out alongside his friend kirill to find fame
 by killing a dragon.

accessory.name: Seabreeze Headguard
accessory.detail: Headgear passed on from Cyril to Leonid. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rolan
story:
Rolan

Mightiest in the village, a youth whose lan
ce skills are spoken of even in the Capital
. One day the Knight King came and sparr
ed with Rolan. Seeing the King's strength
 and benevolence, Rolan determines to fig
ht for him.

accessory.name: Guard's Spaulder
accessory.detail: A gift from the King for joining the Guard. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Erving
story:
Erving

A youth whose parents died protecting th
eir village from a dragon attack. Following
 in their footsteps, Erving became the you
ngest Captain in history. His next goal is t
o bring Ludmilla under his control.

accessory.name: Captain's Belt
accessory.detail: Given out of the blue by Victor one day. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Igor
story:
Igor

An iron chef who eagerly hunts the wild b
oar dragon known as "Bahammut". The fle
sh of this beast is soft, tender and juicy - 
dripping with fat when roasted, and it is s
aid to be the ultimate meat for the culinar
y inclined.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Roast
accessory.detail: Grilled Bahamutton, with head attached. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Aaron Prana
story:
Aaron Prana

Started out competing with Rabby, but th
e difficulties of the journey and loss of va
lued comrades have now forged them into
 excellent partners - each guarding the ot
her's back. His lance now stands to protec
t his allies, rather than make himself look
 good.

accessory.name: Red Bangle+
accessory.detail: Offers Aaron a great grip on his spear. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Leonard Valna
story:
Leonard Valna

A youth who has made a name for himself
 by defeating a dragon and protecting his
 town. However, he still tends to fritter aw
ay his money, so he now makes a living as
 a mercenary. Even when hired by his form
er partner Kirill, they remain solid friends
.

accessory.name: Seabreeze Headguard+
accessory.detail: Heavy, sturdy, and impenetrable. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rolan Crest
story:
Rolan Crest

A youth who leads Knight King Artorius's 
guards. One of the Three Musketeers, alo
ngside Angelica and Aleksy, he now spend
s his days fighting dragons with the King.
 Though mighty power may come to threa
ten the people, Rolan uses his spear to pr
otect them.

accessory.name: Guard's Spaulder+
accessory.detail: Only one true of will can equip this item. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Erving Straff
story:
Erving Straff

A youth who continues the search for his 
friends, Ludmilla and Sigmund, after their
 sudden disappearance. Although years ha
ve now passed, he still has no clue of thei
r whereabouts. There are rumors that an o
minous executioner pursues them.

accessory.name: Captain's Belt+
accessory.detail: An item that offers no discomfort whatsoever. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Igor Valrotz
story:
Igor Valrotz

An iron chef renowned for his work in Bah
ammut cookery. His lance & cooking knife
 skills have already gone beyond mortal li
mits, pushing toward the realm he so desi
res to reach - that of Izanagi, the God of C
ooking.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Roast+
accessory.detail: The aroma of meat whets the appetite. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Anastasia
story:
Anastasia

A young girl very interested in dragons, a
nd who really wants to just see them for h
erself rather than slay them. Also loves ru
ins and dungeons, often slipping off into t
hem before Rabby and her other friends e
ven realize she is gone.

accessory.name: Red Ring
accessory.detail: A toy given by Rabi when they were kids. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Anya
story:
Anya

A young girl who sets out to find her amb
itious father who gave up being a noble in
 order to hunt dragons. The dependable A
nya was left to look after her home in plac
e of her crippled mother, but after her mo
ther passed away Anya finally set out.

accessory.name: Foreign Amulet
accessory.detail: A gift given to Anya by a foreign friend. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Eleonora
story:
Eleonora

The daughter of a small village's lord. Rai
sed in a life of luxury, she knows little of t
he real world. This concerned her parents
, so they sent her to a girl's boarding scho
ol in the Capital. A genius with a bow, she
 is quickly adapting to her new life.

accessory.name: Locket of Parting
accessory.detail: Engraved with the name of the man she loves. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ludmilla
story:
Ludmilla

The leader of the village youths. A tough,
 charismatic and stubborn girl. Treats tho
se beneath her, boy or girl, almost like sla
ves, and sets out to slay dragons. Only sh
ares her true self with Sigmund, her child
hood friend, and she obeys him meekly.

accessory.name: Purple Hair Clip
accessory.detail: A self-made hair clip with no significance. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Eva
story:
Eva

A young cook who helps out the iron chef
 Igor. Has a remarkable tongue, and thoug
h ostensibly an assistant, her role is a vita
l one. In fact, Eva usually thinks of the rec
ipes and Igor cooks them. This has proven
 to be a good arrangement so far.

accessory.name: Cold Leekle Soup
accessory.detail: Garnished with chopped leekle. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Anastasia Prana
story:
Anastasia Prana

A young woman who is very interested in 
dragons and continues her journey to stu
dy them. Coming to realize that strength i
s also required in order to study the beas
ts, she has trained herself hard. Her reckl
essness can cause trouble for Rabby.

accessory.name: Red Ring+
accessory.detail: The vermillion glass has chipped a little. [5ef5f7]+250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Anya Valna
story:
Anya Valna

Anya has ventured to the islands in the ea
st. There she heard tale of a warrior from 
a distant family who fought for peace - he
r father. Upon hearing this, she did not ex
actly forgive him, but she was filled with a
 sense of pride.

accessory.name: Foreign Amulet+
accessory.detail: The gem resembles the ore of Anya's village. [5ef5f7]+250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Eleonora Crest
story:
Eleonora Crest

Her years at the academy have matured E
leonora into a fine young woman. Her inna
te cheerfulness remains, however, and sh
e often makes comments to those around 
her. She has also formed an excellent part
nership with Edwards.

accessory.name: Locket of Parting+
accessory.detail: Has not been opened since they separated. [5ef5f7]+250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ludmilla Straff
story:
Ludmilla Straff

Still as stubborn as ever, her reckless figh
ting style has also made her allies a little 
afraid of her. Those who fight alongside h
er know how strongly she wishes for peac
e, however, so they continue to support h
er.

accessory.name: Purple Hair Clip+
accessory.detail: Given out of the blue by Irving one day. [5ef5f7]+250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Eva Valrotz
story:
Eva Valrotz

An elite young cook who has now gone ou
t on her own, parting ways with Igor after
 starting to dislike all of his talk about the
 God of Cooking. Believing that a grateful
 heart is most important in cooking, she g
oes to the far eastern islands to train.

accessory.name: Cold Leekle Soup+
accessory.detail: A rich sweetness hides beneath the coldness. [5ef5f7]+250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Carrol
story:
Carrol

A youth who became involved in the fight
ing thanks to his childhood friend, Rabby.
 Very laidback, he would rather be nappin
g in the village's apple orchard. Skilled wi
th magic and a vital member of the group 
as the overall mood maker.

accessory.name: Red Spell Book
accessory.detail: A birthday gift from Anastasia. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kirill
story:
Kirill

A youth born into a longstanding magical 
family. Bored of the many traditions force
d upon wizards, he often sneaks out at nig
ht to find fun in town. Uninterested in fam
e, he joins his friend Leonard to slay a dra
gon for fun.

accessory.name: Wavecrash Gloves
accessory.detail: Given by Leonid after Cyril's first job. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Burckhardt
story:
Burckhardt

A youth born in a small village. Lived happ
y, peaceful days with his childhood friend
 Patricia. One day, the faithful of the Holy
 Kingdom came to the village and took Pat
ricia away. Burckhardt decided to learn m
agic and set out to save her.
cutin: I can do this! I can!

accessory.name: Incomplete Map
accessory.detail: A map to the Holy Land, half blank. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Sigmund
story:
Sigmund

A youth with amnesia who arrived in the v
illage after a fight with nearby dragons ju
st a few years ago. Knows nothing about h
imself, aside from his name, and rarely sp
eaks. The only one he talks to is Ludmilla.

accessory.name: Black Dragon Cure
accessory.detail: A painkiller made from black dragon scales. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Effim
story:
Effim

A youth who longs to see the land of Zipa
ng across the distant sea - a country close
d off to the outside with unique customs a
nd culture. His father Marty has filled his 
head with tales of things like "samurai," s
o now he studies daily in the library.

accessory.name: Dragon Wing Shard
accessory.detail: Inherited by Effim from his father. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Carrol Prana
story:
Carrol Prana

Once a laidback kid who watched Rabby a
nd Aaron clash, their arduous journey has
 transformed him into someone who now s
trikes enemies first in order to protect his
 friends. He fights dragons so he may also
 live to lay flowers at his fallen friends' gr
aves.

accessory.name: Red Spell Book+
accessory.detail: "Spells" are birthday wishes from friends. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kirill Valna
story:
Kirill Valna

A youth who has used his innate magical a
bilities to defeat numerous dragons and m
ake a name for himself. He's now busy as 
the mayor of a harbor town. Still firm frien
ds with his former partner Leonard, they o
ften stand together against dragons.
cutin: Just a bit of bad luck.

accessory.name: Wavecrash Gloves+
accessory.detail: A cheap pair and an uncomfortable fit. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Burckhardt Crest
story:
Burckhardt Crest

His years of travelling for nothing, Burckh
ardt has yet to reach the Holy Kindgom. A
s he travels, defeating dragons along the 
way, the information he gathers reveals th
at he must meet the infamous witch Ideia 
in order to reach his destination.

accessory.name: Incomplete Map+
accessory.detail: The blanks are filled through his travels. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Sigmund Straff
story:
Sigmund Straff

A youthful magician who accompanies Lud
milla. Now speaks even less than before, s
ince he lives in the mountains with little h
uman interaction. Some claim to have see
n Sigmund howling at the moon and turni
ng into a dragon, but the truth remains un
clear.

accessory.name: Black Dragon Cure+
accessory.detail: Use twice a day to greatly reduce pain. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Effim Valrotz
story:
Effim Valrotz

A youth hoping to reach the distant land o
f Zipang. With so little information to go o
n, he relies on the stories of a young drag
on rider from Peace. He hopes to find a w
ay for humans and dragons to coexist.

accessory.name: Dragon Wing Shard+
accessory.detail: The dragon was friends with Effim's father. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Johan
story:
Johan

A young swordsman who fights in a group
 of dragon slaying knights. As opposed to
 the almost demonic fervor of Dominic, wh
o joined at the same time, Johan is calm a
nd collected, almost angelic, and the only
 one who truly understands Dominic and h
is methods.

accessory.name: Red Horn Shard
accessory.detail: A horn broken off of the Red Dragon. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Claus
story:
Claus

A taciturn young man who has made it thr
ough the harsh youth knight training to b
ecome a true knight. Has a wife and child 
in his distant homeland, and hopes to retu
rn home proud of his deeds as a knight.

accessory.name: Homeland Amulet
accessory.detail: Fashioned from the ore of Klaus's homeland. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Michael
story:
Michael

A young knight who arrived in the Capital
 with Aleksy a few years ago. A genius wh
o easily passed the Royal Knight Exam, on
e of the hardest tests in the realm. Howev
er, he's also unable to understand those n
ot so advantaged, causing constant clashe
s.

accessory.name: Hallowed Crown
accessory.detail: A great royal treasure that Michael seeks. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Elvin
story:
Elvin

A young swordsman who joined the Imper
ial Army to save his brother who is infecte
d with the extremely rare and ever-worsen
ing Dragoturn Sickness. The cure is boiled
 dragon scales, so Elvin requests posting 
to the front line.

accessory.name: Doom Dragon Cure
accessory.detail: A cure made from the Doom Dragon's claws. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Theodore
story:
Theodore

A youth who has sworn to fight the Repub
lic for the liberation of humanity in the Em
pty Age. Alongside Clemence and Rudolph
, he operates a resistance movement calle
d the "White Hunters." However, their ina
bility to achieve their goal is causing tens
ion.

accessory.name: Emblem of Freedom
accessory.detail: A coat of arms drawn by a young Theodore. [5ef5f7]+8%[-]chance of special move.

name: Johan Marls
story:
Johan Marls

An aged fighter, 82 years old and long sin
ce retired from the knights. Hearing that h
is old partner Dominic has returned to the
 front lines, he is spurred back into action
 himself. Still the opposite of Dominic, his
 warm personality remains.

accessory.name: Red Horn Shard+
accessory.detail: The horn could pierce through any armor. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Claus Strohm
story:
Claus Strohm

The fight with the dragons is getting wors
e, leading to the potential for even Claus'
s own distant homeland to be attacked. In
 order to protect his wife and child Claus 
heads even further away from them - into
 the raging conflict of the eastern islands.

accessory.name: Homeland Amulet+
accessory.detail: The stone changes color with time. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Michael Vyce
story:
Michael Vyce

His talents have led to Michael being prom
oted to Captain. As well as leading the kn
ights, he is also in a position to comment 
on politics. In fact, his opposition to King
 Artorius has now divided the country into
 two factions.

accessory.name: Hallowed Crown+
accessory.detail: Offers eternal glory to those who wear it. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Elvin Schwarz
story:
Elvin Schwarz

One morning, Elvin awoke to find her hou
se empty, her younger brother gone. Year
s later, she finally uncovered a rumor abo
ut him - a youth who had turned into a dra
gon, travelled with a girl, and who 's name
 was "Sigmund," the same as her brother.
cutin: I know I can do this!
I know I can do this!

accessory.name: Doom Dragon Cure+
accessory.detail: Slightly slows down dragonization. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Theodore Zeele
story:
Theodore Zeele

The leader of an anti-government organiz
ation known as the "White Hunters." Conf
ident that his goals are noble, he has vow
ed to take down the Republic. Believing sa
crifices are necessary to achieve this, he o
rders the death of the rebellious Clemenc
e.

accessory.name: Emblem of Freedom+
accessory.detail: Depicts the Savior who will free the world. [5ef5f7]+12%[-]chance of special move.

name: Dominic
story:
Dominic

A demonic instructor feared by all new me
mbers of the knights. Knows no mercy and
 is always harsh and strict. However, this 
is based on his own sense of justice as he
 carries on the will of his former master.

accessory.name: Red Claw Shard
accessory.detail: A set of claws broken off of the Red Dragon. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Friedell
story:
Friedell

Having only just joined the Royal Knights,
 Friedell immediately found himself throw
n into danger. His unit was wiped out by d
ragons. Just as he was about to be chomp
ed, a knight cut in and saved him - Claus, 
the man who would be his future Captain.

accessory.name: Blue Lion Helm
accessory.detail: Worn by the Blue Lion, Suicide Unit Captain. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alphonse
story:
Alphonse

A former prince, stripped of his royal rank
 and forced to join the army as rank-and-f
ile. Treated badly by his comrades, he crie
s himself to sleep every night. His comma
nder, Michael, has promised to return him
 to royalty if he can kill 100 dragons.

accessory.name: Pillow of Sadness
accessory.detail: Alphonse's pillow, stained with tears. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Edgar
story:
Edgar

A stoic soldier who rarely speaks. Will do 
whatever is required to achieve his ends, 
including sacrificing his comrades. Only s
hows emotion when fighting dragons, roa
ring with anger and attacking violently wi
th his lance.

accessory.name: Demon Helm
accessory.detail: Given to Edgar to help cover his facial scar. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Clemence
story:
Clemence

A youth who fights alongside his comrade
s as one of the White Hunters. During the
 Empty Age, dragon hunting is forbidden, 
but they continue to flout that prohibition
. Now a skilled lance user, he forms a vita
l part of every dragon hunt.

accessory.name: Dove Helm
accessory.detail: Clement crafted this as a symbol of peace. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Dominic Marls
story:
Dominic Marls

Special advisor to the knights, alongside h
is former partner Johan. Though 84 years
 old, his body remains muscular and stron
g. Under the "come back in one piece" cre
do of his master, he treats new recruits as
 harshly as ever to ensure their survival.

accessory.name: Red Claw Shard+
accessory.detail: The claws could parry any spear attack. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Friedell Strohm
story:
Friedell Strohm

A special captain in the unit led by Claus. 
His Royal Machine Lance has allowed him
 and his allies to win many battles. Each b
attlefield provides the next testing ground
 for his skills, but he also feels bad about 
Claus's concern for him.

accessory.name: Blue Lion Helm+
accessory.detail: Only those who are worthy may wear it. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alphonse Vyce
story:
Alphonse Vyce

An unlucky former prince who killed his 1
00 dragons, but still hasn't made much he
adway in the world. He has reached Vice-C
aptain, but the mocking attitude of his sub
ordinates makes him cry himself to sleep 
every night. His only respite is fishing.

accessory.name: Pillow of Sadness+
accessory.detail: A childhood memento, wet with sad tears. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Edgar Schwarz
story:
Edgar Schwarz

A proud warrior who has killed many drag
ons and sacrificed those above and below
 him without a second thought. His lack o
f emotions means he cares nothing for tho
se who fall. He considers it to be the natu
ral law of the world.

accessory.name: Demon Helm+
accessory.detail: Hides a large scar on Edgar's face. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Clemence Zeele
story:
Clemence Zeele

A former rebel fighter who is now faced w
ith his execution. Though the dragon war 
was meant to be over, questioning why th
ey had to continue fighting against human
s incurred Theodore's anger and led to hi
s current predicament.

accessory.name: Dove Helm+
accessory.detail: It lay forgotten until the day it was needed. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Raquel
story:
Raquel

A young huntress who lives in a secluded 
valley and flies through the sky with her d
ragon while being careful to avoid contact
 with others. Was saved by her dragon fro
m a landslide when she was small, and the
y have been together ever since.

accessory.name: Helm of Fire
accessory.detail: Fiery headdress of the Endless Vale Queen. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cerim
story:
Cerim

A young huntress born in a valley where h
umans and dragons live together. Flies th
rough the skies with her dragon and hunt
s animals or monsters to make a living. Th
e valley is generally self-sufficient and se
cluded, but conflict is now creeping towar
d it.

accessory.name: Helm of Water
accessory.detail: Aquatic headdress of the Endless Vale King. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Maximilian
story:
Maximilian

A young huntress who continues to plead
 to the King that dragons and humans can
 coexist as they do in the valley where she
 was born - where conflict between them 
is unthinkable. She goes with her dragon 
to the capital to stop the futile war.
cutin: I don't want to do this!

accessory.name: Helm of Light
accessory.detail: Shiny headpiece of the Endless Vale Warriors. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Izark
story:
Izark

A young female Captain of the Imperial Dr
agon Riders. Born in a special valley wher
e dragons and humans coexist, she worke
d with her dragon as a bounty hunter befo
re joining the army. Leads the capture uni
t to find dragons to fight on the front line
.

accessory.name: Ears of Detection
accessory.detail: A dragon detector worn on the head. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Rudolph
story:
Rudolph

A female White Hunter who break the law 
forbidding dragon slaying. Loves to hunt d
ragons, and considers the ideals of human
 liberation touted by Theodore as nothing
 but an excuse. All she thinks about every
 day is how best to take down dragons.

accessory.name: Rabbit Hood
accessory.detail: A hood fashioned from Ruda's favorite doll. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Raquel Marls
story:
Raquel Marls

A female hunter and leader of the Perpetu
al Valley, where orphaned children and ge
ntle dragons live together in harmony. Sh
e manages the human and dragon populat
ions by giving them appropriate roles to h
elp keep life in the valley safe and stable.

accessory.name: Helm of Fire+
accessory.detail: A dragon's head motif with motherly eyes. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cerim Strohm
story:
Cerim Strohm

A huntress who continues her research in
to the cause of the conflict between huma
ns and dragons. She is accompanied by he
r own dragon. The war is hard for her to b
ear, and she is aware that some sacrifices
 will be required in order to end it.

accessory.name: Helm of Water+
accessory.detail: A dragon wing motif gives it a regalness. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Maximilian Vyce
story:
Maximilian Vyce

A warrior who hunts other dragons with th
e aid of her own. Tried to persuade the kin
g that humans and dragons can live toget
her, but the knight captain found out abou
t her home. Cursing her mistake, she cont
inues the hunt to protect the children the
re.

accessory.name: Helm of Light+
accessory.detail: The dragon claw motif exudes ferocity. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Izark Schwarz
story:
Izark Schwarz

A female Imperial Captain who hunts drag
ons. She sometimes works alongside drag
ons, but considers them nothing more tha
n tools, and has no special feelings towar
d them. She's now planning to capture the
 rich variety of dragons in her home valley
.

accessory.name: Ears of Detection+
accessory.detail: The device detects the heartbeat of dragons. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Rudolph Zeele
story:
Rudolph Zeele

A female fighter who has grown bored of 
dragons and has started to hunt humans t
oo. The reason the population considers t
he White Hunters to be extremists is large
ly due to her. She has a high bounty on he
r head, often attracting bounty hunters.

accessory.name: Rabbit Hood+
accessory.detail: Very comfortable, and cozy in the winter. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Liselotte
story:
Liselotte

A young girl training diligently in the art o
f fire magic under the tutelage of Sage Ra
chael. The Dragon Pyromancy that Rachae
l sometimes shows her casts beautiful fire
 into the night sky, and Liselotte dreams o
f creating that same fire herself.

accessory.name: Scarlet Gunpowder
accessory.detail: An enhancer for the Flora Incendia spell. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Flora
story:
Flora

A young girl raised with great expectation
s of being a shaman. Passionate in her ma
gic training, she has achieved substantial 
results, but now it is raining continuously
 in her homeland. This is at least serving t
o keep dragons away.

accessory.name: Rain Ward Doll
accessory.detail: A rain ward made by Flora's mother. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Patricia
story:
Patricia

A young magician who was captured and h
eld by the devout from the age-old countr
y known as the Holy Kingdom. Her powers
 were manifested at a young age, and afte
r losing control of them, she has spent ea
ch day living in fear of herself.

accessory.name: Cloth of Holiness
accessory.detail: Holy cloth gifted by the Holy Land's queen. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Walpurgis
story:
Walpurgis

A cheerful young girl born into a long line
 of magicians. She is already among the st
rongest in her family's history, but she ha
s no interest in being their next leader, pr
eferring to play in the nearby mountains a
nd rivers with her friend Edgar.

accessory.name: Tiara of True Self
accessory.detail: A heartfelt gift from Edgar to Walpurga. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Octavia
story:
Octavia

A homunculus created by Sage Rosa. Simi
lar to other spirits in most ways, but uniq
ue in that she is self aware. Although she
 was created  by Rosa on a whim, Octavia 
continues to seek answers regarding the m
eaning of her existence.

accessory.name: Cloth of Comfort
accessory.detail: Dropped by a disciple of the Blue God. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Liselotte Marls
story:
Liselotte Marls

A talented magician among the knights an
d no stranger to dragon-slaying. Her true
 passion is Dragon Pyromancy. This high l
evel magic requires all of her natural talen
t to master. She continues to hunt so she
 can perfect her art.

accessory.name: Scarlet Gunpowder+
accessory.detail: The powder is absorbed by the victim's body. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Flora Strohm
story:
Flora Strohm

A shaman who uses her gifts to deliver pr
ecipitation to various regions. Bringing en
dless rain wherever she goes, she is wors
hipped by the inhabitants of arid lands. W
hile Flora has accepted her role, she still 
dreams of seeing blue skies once more.

accessory.name: Rain Ward Doll+
accessory.detail: A travel mascot made by Flora's mother. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Patricia Vyce
story:
Patricia Vice

A beautiful magician raised with the doctr
ine of the Holy Kingdom. Now with comple
te control of her magic, she has ended he
r days of living in fear. She has also learn
ed of the First Dragon, so she endeavors t
o save the world from this threat.

accessory.name: Cloth of Holiness+
accessory.detail: The cloth helps one control one's magic. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Walpurgis Schwarz
story:
Walpurgis Schwarz

A great magician and the most powerful m
atriarch in her family's history. Thanks to 
her legendary skill, she is often asked to h
elp slay dragons and create new spells. Le
arning that Edgar has joined the Empire, s
he travels back to see him.

accessory.name: Tiara of True Self+
accessory.detail: The shawl now guides its wearer's heart. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Octavia Zeele
story:
Octavia Zeele

A doll who wants to become human. Octav
ia has become aware of her existence, see
ing all that she is and striving toward wha
t she could be.

accessory.name: Cloth of Comfort+
accessory.detail: A secret signal, tied around the leg. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Sakura
story:
Sakura

A girl raised by a dragon-slaying samurai.
 Thanks to his strict tutelage she is alread
y able to train others at their dojo. Thoug
h always at odds with her childhood friend
, Nijo, she isn't stubborn enough to deny 
his combat prowess.

accessory.name: Ornament of Trials
accessory.detail: Nabbed from Nijo at the end of a fight. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kasumi
story:
Kasumi

Having been saved by a knight from a fore
ign land, this girl vowed to take up the sw
ord to defend others. Once dragon-slayin
g is recognized as an official profession, s
he convinces her parents to let her becom
e a samurai.

accessory.name: Blue Hair Clip
accessory.detail: A gift given to Kasumi by a foreign friend. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Tsubaki
story:
Tsubaki

Descended from the bloodline of a legend
ary chef, this potential cooking genius is s
till in training. Rivals with Himeji, another
 up-and-coming cook, their culinary battle
s draw attention from across the land of Z
ipang.

accessory.name: Mythic Chopsticks
accessory.detail: Cooking utensil used by a legendary chef. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ayame
story:
Ayame

As a child, this girl was saved by Type Zer
o. The two wander the land slaying dragon
s as she hones her assassin skills. She de
sires to please her benefactor, though she
 has often put his life at risk with her terr
ible cooking.

accessory.name: Homemade Rice Ball
accessory.detail: Ayame's homemade rice ball. Very hazardous. [5ef5f7]+5%[-] chance of First Strike.

name: Botan
story:
Botan

A nameless girl born in a village of dragon
 slayers. The name "Botan" was passed do
wn to her and is treated more like a numb
er than an actual name. She acts almost li
ke a puppet, simply killing dragons as ord
ered - devoid of any emotion.

accessory.name: Bloody Peony
accessory.detail: Has been with Botan as long as she remembers. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Sakura, Inferno Blade
story:
Sakura the Inferno Blade 

A samurai who takes after her father by fi
ghting to defend others. She is known as 
“The Executioner” for having felled a dr
agon in a single decapitating blow. Since 
it was actually Nijo who accomplished this
 feat, she resents the nickname.

accessory.name: Ornament of Trials+
accessory.detail: Lovely hair ornament with a flower motif. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kasumi, Flowing Water
story:
Kasumi the Flowing Water 

A young samurai who hunts dragons to pr
otect others. In her travels, she meets An
ya, the daughter of the foreign knight who
 previously saved her. Anya is pleased to 
know that someone so far from home still
 champions her father’s beliefs.

accessory.name: Blue Hair Clip+
accessory.detail: Emits a foreign scent when winds blow past. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Tsubaki, Solar Flash
story:
Tsubaki the Solar Flash 

The true successor to the legendary chef 
Izanagi. This title, as well as great fame, w
as won by defeating Himeji in a cooking b
attle. He now spends his days gathering in
gredients so he can save the world throug
h cooking as the Chef of Light.

accessory.name: Mythic Chopsticks+
accessory.detail: All food they touched once turned delicious. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ayame, Dark Circle
story:
Ayame the Dark Circle 

A swordswoman who fights for the assass
in Type Zero, to whom she has been loyal
 since he saved her as a child. She is now 
completing requests to slay dragons while
 waiting impatiently for Type Zero to retu
rn from a long voyage overseas.

accessory.name: Homemade Rice Ball+
accessory.detail: Ayame's homemade rice ball. Possibly fatal. [5ef5f7]+7%[-] chance of First Strike.

name: Botan, Shadowless Wing
story:
Botan the Shadowless Wing 

A stoic warrior who exists only to hunt dr
agons. She sees them as nothing but targ
ets, and hunts the powerful beasts with a 
maniacal grin - the only emotional display
 she will ever exhibit.

accessory.name: Bloody Peony+
accessory.detail: The petals are dyed red with flying blood. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Nijo
story:
Nijo

A youth sworn to become a fine warrior to
 follow in the footsteps of his heroic moth
er who saved her lord. Using her spear te
chniques in battle, he claims to be the bes
t at his dojo. Often picks fights with his fr
iend Sakura, but usually ends up crying.

accessory.name: Headband of Trials
accessory.detail: Given by his mother the day he left home. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Nanao
story:
Nanao

A young spearman born in the Water Villa
ge. The heavy mists there kept dragons aw
ay for a long time, but the conflict has fin
ally reached them. He sees this as a chanc
e to test his skills and immediately signs u
p to fight.

accessory.name: Charm of Mists
accessory.detail: Given to all who live in the village. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Himeji
story:
Himeji

A young cook from the bloodline of a lege
ndary chef. Born into a family of conceale
d cooks, his family's captivating dishes ha
ve supported politics from the shadows fo
r generations. Confident that he is the on
e true successor to the legendary chef.

accessory.name: Mythic Bowl
accessory.detail: A serving dish used by a legendary chef. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Wakamatsu
story:
Wakamatsu

A Royal Knight who has come to investiga
te the land of Zipang. He now spends ever
y day irritated and annoyed, wanting to ge
t home again as quickly as he can. Upon fi
nding a wounded dragon, he quickly settle
s upon the idea of flying home.

accessory.name: Black Collar
accessory.detail: A dragon collar that controls through pain. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Matsue
story:
Matsue

A young man who lives with his own drago
n far from civilization. Unable to part with
 the baby dragon he acquired as a child, h
e ended up raising it into a mighty beast. 
The dragon still considers him its parent, 
and this has started to cause some troubl
e.

accessory.name: Dragongrass Whistle
accessory.detail: It’s sound can soothe even wild dragons. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Nijo, Double Inferno
story:
Nijo the Double Inferno 

A youth who hunts dragons with his partn
er Sakura. In the land of Zipang, dragon s
layers are called samurai, and those loyal 
to a Lord are called bushi. As one must sl
ay many dragons to become a bushi, Nijo 
strives to obtain this title.

accessory.name: Headband of Trials+
accessory.detail: Some parts are stained with blood and sweat. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Nanao, Double Water
story:
Nanao the Double Water 

A young hero who protects the Water Villa
ge. He trained hard to overcome his fear o
f fighting dragons. He still fears their app
earance, but he is also the first person to
 boldly dive into the fray when the village
 is under attack.

accessory.name: Charm of Mists+
accessory.detail: Represents a hope for peace and stability. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Himeji, Double Flash
story:
Himeji the Double Flash 

A chef of the legendary Izanagi bloodline.
 Though he was defeated by Tsubaki, he h
as become a skilled Chef of Darkness. He 
now controls many people through his coo
king, but his dishes are known for being s
lightly bitter.

accessory.name: Mythic Bowl+
accessory.detail: All food placed in it once turned delicious. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Wakamatsu, Double Dark
story:
Wakamatsu the Double Dark 

An investigator having trouble taming a d
ragon. He plans to use a dragon to escape
 to his homeland, but is frustrated by his 
lack of progress. Hearing of a lancer in th
e same position, he schemes to steal his d
ragon.

accessory.name: Black Collar+
accessory.detail: Emits noise to keep a dragon off-balance. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Matsue, D. Prototype
story:
Matsue the Double Prototype 

A young man who yearns to bring his own
 dragon to that distant place where human
s and dragons peacefully coexist. The mor
e he hears of other foreign lands, the mor
e he wants to explore them. As such, he is
 often distracted from his original goal.

accessory.name: Dragongrass Whistle+
accessory.detail: It’s sound is like that of the wind itself. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Haruna
story:
Haruna

A trainee in a troupe of archers from the e
ast. Joined after witnessing the prowess o
f the troupe’s leader, Mikasa. Enlisting a
t the same time as Ise, the two have becom
e known as the “Blue Flame Snipers” wh
en they work in tandem.

accessory.name: Red Feather Helm
accessory.detail: Mark of the Fire of the Blue Fire Archers. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ise
story:
Ise

A trainee in a troupe of archers from the e
ast. Joined the same time as Haruna and h
as received extensive military training wh
ich allowed her to master the bow. Despit
e their different backgrounds, she gets al
ong with Haruna very well.

accessory.name: Blue Feather Helm
accessory.detail: Mark of the Blue of the Blue Fire Archers. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Mikasa
story:
Mikasa

The leader of a troupe of archers from the
 east. She played a decisive role in defend
ing her homeland from an ancient dragon.
 While still a powerful warrior, a recent ba
ttle wound has begun to trouble her.

accessory.name: Charm of Cleansing
accessory.detail: Produced by the White Tiger Army. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nagato
story:
Nagato

A talented archer who took over for Mikas
a. Avoiding reckless confidence, she punis
hes the dragons that ravage her homeland
. While this earns her a great deal of prais
e, it's taking her down a path she'd rather
 avoid.

accessory.name: Poison Arrow
accessory.detail: Nagato carries a jar with him everywhere. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Settsu
story:
Settsu

An eastern girl in the same troupe of arch
ers as Mikasa. Though in different units, s
he was injured protecting Mikasa in the o
ne battle they fought together. Missing th
e rest of the fight, she spends her life in t
he shadow cast by Mikasa’s achievement
s.
cutin: I've got this on my own!

accessory.name: Hair Clip of Envy
accessory.detail: Given by Shinano when Settsu began serving. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Haruna, Flaming Shot
story:
Haruna the Flaming Shot 

A fire archer under Suzaku Emperor Akag
i. Akagi’s orders are usually vague, so it 
can be hard to serve her properly. This ch
allenge has helped hone Haruna’s skills 
as both an archer and a leader, and she no
w trains all new recruits.

accessory.name: Red Feather Helm+
accessory.detail: Its red hue represents a wildly blazing fire. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ise, Water Shot
story:
Ise the Water Shot 

An ice archer under Seiryu Emperor Kaga
. After training hard alongside Haruna, Mi
kasa, Nagato and Settsu, she has risen in 
rank to directly serve one of the military e
mperors. Though they no longer fight tog
ether, she often remembers her former co
mpanions.

accessory.name: Blue Feather Helm+
accessory.detail: Its blue hue conveys a placid water surface. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Mikasa, Sun Shot
story:
Mikasa the Sun Shot 

A light archer who fights dragons under B
yakko Emperor Chitose. Her back is slowly
 being covered in painful dragon scales. O
nly Chitose knows of this affliction, but an
y help she attempts is in vain as Mikasa se
ems doomed to become a dragon.

accessory.name: Charm of Cleansing+
accessory.detail: Slows growth and eases pain of dragon scales. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nagato, Dark Shot
story:
Nagato the Dark Shot 

A shadow archer under Genbu Emperor Ry
ujo. In truth, this role is a disguise, and sh
e is actually an assassin who secretly elim
inates Ryujo’s enemies. Ryujo himself is 
unaware of this, but Nagato considers it r
ecompense for his saving her from darkne
ss.
cutin: The wind is in my favor.

accessory.name: Poison Arrow+
accessory.detail: Even just a small cut can poison the victim. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Settsu, Zero Shot
story:
Settsu the Zero Shot

A void archer under Kirin Emperor Shinan
o. She gained undying respect for the emp
eror after Shinano healed her useless, inj
ured hand. While she has been working fo
r the Kirin emperor, she has added a strin
g of decisive victories to her name.

accessory.name: Hair Clip of Envy+
accessory.detail: Settsu always wears her most prized item. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Akagi
story:
Akagi

A fire mage in the eastern 88th Magic Div
ision. Joining about the same time as Kag
a, the two formed a friendly rivalry to imp
rove their magic. The Emperor nicknamed
 him, “Omega Storm.” He is beloved by h
is hometown for his stalwart defense of th
eir lands.

accessory.name: Fire Bird Bell
accessory.detail: One of 5 Godly Vessels gifted by the Emperor. [5ef5f7]+200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kaga
story:
Kaga

A mage skilled with water and ice. Joined 
the 88th Magic Division 5 months before 
Akagi, so he thinks himself more senior. N
amed “Obsidian Wind,” by the Emperor, 
he is known for his bold and aggressive b
attle tactics.

accessory.name: Azure Dragon Mirror
accessory.detail: One of 5 Godly Vessels gifted by the Emperor. [5ef5f7]+200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Chitose
story:
Chitose

A light mage who transferred to the 88th 
Magic Division around the same time as S
hinano thanks to his performance in battle
. His past remains a mystery, and he activ
ely supports the Emperor - even earning t
he name, "Elysian Sage."

accessory.name: White Tiger Band
accessory.detail: One of 5 Godly Vessels gifted by the Emperor. [5ef5f7]+200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ryujo
story:
Ryujo

A dark mage who joined the 88th Magic D
ivision purely out of admiration for Akagi.
 The Emperor named him, “Young Comma
nder.” What he lacks in magical prowess,
 he makes up for with hard work. His sigh
ts are firmly set on mirroring Akagi’s ach
ievements.

accessory.name: Black Turtle Curse
accessory.detail: One of 5 Godly Vessels gifted by the Emperor. [5ef5f7]+200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Shinano
story:
Shinano

A mage specialized in void magic, he joine
d the 88th Magic Division with Chitose. W
hile young and inexperienced, he still man
aged to earn the name “Brilliant Dawn” 
from the Emperor. Extremely humble, he h
olds himself back to make his allies look g
ood.

accessory.name: Chimera Beads
accessory.detail: One of 5 Godly Vessels gifted by the Emperor[5ef5f7]+200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Akagi, Emperor Suzaku
story:
Akagi the Emperor Suzaku 

The Military Emperor, Suzaku, who fights 
under the Star King. Divines the location 
of dragons with Kaga, Chitose, Ryujo and 
Shinano, then sends troops. With the bush
i and samurai long gone, Akagi's archers a
re the only thing that can oppose the drag
ons.

accessory.name: Fire Bird Bell+
accessory.detail: All who hear its sound are burned by fires. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kaga, Emperor Seiryu
story:
Kaga the Emperor Seiryu

The Military Emperor, Seiryu, who fights u
nder the Star King. Collaboration is key to
 defeating dragons in the land of Zipang, 
so if a dragon appears that is too much fo
r his subordinates to handle alone, he wil
l go into battle himself.

accessory.name: Azure Dragon Mirror+
accessory.detail: All that it reflects is drowned by water. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Chitose, Emperor Byakko
story:
Chitose the Emperor Byakko

The Military Emperor, Byakko, who fights 
under the Star King. He is also the one wh
o helped Shinano achieve the rank of Mili
tary Emperor. Has a more philosophical vi
ew of things than the others, and for som
e reason also knows a lot about distant la
nds.

accessory.name: White Tiger Band+
accessory.detail: All who gaze reveal their true selves. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ryujo, Emperor Genbu
story:
Ryujo the Emperor  Genbu 

The Military Emperor, Genbu, who fights u
nder the Star King. Has managed to comp
letely seal away his personality and never
 speaks a single word. This sacrifice was n
ot without reward as he is unparalleled in
 magical prowess.

accessory.name: Black Turtle Curse+
accessory.detail: All it is placed upon lose their souls. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Shinano, Emperor Kirin
story:
Shinano the Emperor Kirin
 
The Military Emperor, Kirin, who fights un
der the Star King. The Five Emperors - Su
zaku, Seiryu, Byakko, Genbu and Kirin - ar
e rarely seen together. Only once in the p
ast, when the Old Dragon appeared, did th
e five of them unite and fight as one.

accessory.name: Chimera Beads+
accessory.detail: All souls it captures are trapped in cycles. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Augustus
story:
Augustus

The legendary hero Augustus, who led his
 allies in the defeat of countless dragons 
during the Age of Fire. Bold, brave and fie
rce, he swore a vow that all under his com
mand would return alive. This earned him 
many supporters.

accessory.name: Cape of Triumph
accessory.detail: Given by his wife the day he left for war. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Luke
story:
Luke

A young hero on a journey with Sea Princ
ess Liveia to seal away the Glutton Queen
. Friends with Ursula and Mary, they have
 defeated many dragons and cryptids toge
ther. Although he doesn't want to fight a 
human, he takes up arms to keep his prom
ise to Ursula.

accessory.name: Medal of Vows
accessory.detail: Given to Luke and one other for their deeds. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alain
story:
Alain

The hero who forged the Age of Light. The
 Holy Sword he carries will change form d
epending on who wields it, and for him it 
becomes a gleaming white blade of pure b
eckoning light. Unfortunately, it’s so brig
ht he often has to fight alone.

accessory.name: Crystal of Deceit
accessory.detail: A dragon-shaped growth on the Holy Sword. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Eizel
story:
Eizel

A hero from the Age of Darkness, he defe
ated the Evil Dragon and obtained its Evil
 Eye. The power of the Evil Eye grows with
 each dragon killed, so he continues his ru
thless hunt. This has also made him a targ
et by those who covet that power.

accessory.name: Helm of Madness
accessory.detail: Controls the powers of the Evil Dragon's Eye. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Joseph
story:
Joseph

A hero born in the Empty Age - the only a
ge with no conflict between humans and d
ragons. During this age, humans served u
nder dragon masters. Joseph was a loyal k
night, so he was forced to turn his blade o
n rebellious humans.

accessory.name: Wings of the Ether
accessory.detail: Gift for becoming one of the Five Knights. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Phyllis
story:
Phyllis

A blazing hero who would roast dragons w
ith her flaming lance. When her home was
 razed by dragons, she swore to bring the
 same fate to all such creatures. Her own 
soul is the source of her flames, so she sl
owly sacrifices her own life as she slays.

accessory.name: Fire of Life
accessory.detail: A special item crafted  by a renowned smith. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ursula
story:
Ursula

A young hero traveling to seal the Glutton
 Queen. Voyaging with Liveia, Luke and M
ary for the Limit Sea, she is secretly aidin
g the Queen. She was promised the lives o
f her family in exchange for her companio
ns.

accessory.name: Crystal of Bondage
accessory.detail: The seven bonds that tie Ursula's soul. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Angelica
story:
Angelica

A female knight born to a loyalist family. S
he serves the Knight King, but since they 
grew up together, she is more like a siste
r to him. Having helped him overcome his
 crybaby tendencies, she loves that Artori
ous now tries to protect her.

accessory.name: Tiara of Light
accessory.detail: A vow and gift given to her by the King. [5ef5f7]+5%[-] chance of critical hit.

name: Viola
story:
Viola

An otherling master of death sent by God
 to help balance the mortal world. Disagre
es with her other half, Fiona, and believes
 that all mortals and dragons should be w
iped out. She spends most of her time wo
rking toward that goal.

accessory.name: Crown of Despair
accessory.detail: A mark of despair worn by a god's disciple. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Fiona
story:
Fiona

An otherling master of life sent by God to
 the mortal world to maintain balance. Alt
hough she was created at the same time a
s Viola, they never see eye-to-eye, so the
y always bicker. She spends her time puri
fying lost souls.

accessory.name: Crown of Hope
accessory.detail: A symbol of hope worn by a god's disciple. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Foster
story:
Foster

The first patriarch in the house of Apollos
. His arrow shots, as the name suggests, a
re arrow-like bullets, easily capable of pie
rcing dragon hide. Coating them in a certa
in oil also allows them to cause intense, li
ngering pain inside a dragon's body.

accessory.name: Wildfire Arrow
accessory.detail: A projectile that can even puncture dragons. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Turner
story:
Turner

The 63rd patriarch in the house of Apollo
s, he is known as the “Mighty Monsoon.”
 His greatest strength is his army of arche
rs and the hundreds of arrows they rain d
own on foes simultaneously. This monsoo
n of arrows can even wipe out dragons.

accessory.name: Raindrop Charm
accessory.detail: Found by Turner in a land of constant rain. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Edwards
story:
Edwards

The 162nd patriarch of Apollos and part o
f the duo known as the "Golden Twin Drag
ons." Using the arrow shots of his ancesto
rs, he can pierce a dragon's heart from an
y angle. He is among the few who recogni
ze the true skill of his partner Eleonora.

accessory.name: Locket of Distance
accessory.detail: Engraved with the name of the woman he loves. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Smith
story:
Smith

A youth who has survived in the underwor
ld by hunting dragons for gold. As far bac
k as he can remember, he has faced death
 each day but somehow made it through. U
nbeknownst to him, he is of the Apollos b
loodline.

accessory.name: The Don's Bracelet
accessory.detail: Found in the belly of his first dragon kill. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Robin
story:
Robin

A bounty hunter and the last of the Apollo
s bloodline. The arrow shots of his ancest
ors are now being used on humans. He cu
rrently seeks the high bounty on a female
 hunter. As long as he can make money, h
umans and dragons are both fair game.

accessory.name: Unicorn Mask
accessory.detail: Mask of a white-horned beast made by Robin. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Rachael
story:
Rachael

There were once explosive masters that d
ecorated festival nights with fire and firew
orks. They achieved this by tying a baby d
ragon down and turning its blood into gun
powder before blowing it up. She is the cr
eator of this Dragon Pyromancy.

accessory.name: Crimson Embers
accessory.detail: The scale of the first dragon she decimated. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Mary
story:
Mary

The legendary magician who sealed the G
lutton Queen deep within herself, losing h
er three companions along the way. Some
 say she created a land above the clouds a
nd tied her soul to that place while she re
mained to observe the world of men.

accessory.name: Shell Ornament
accessory.detail: It has been made from an unusual seashell. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rosa
story:
Rosa

The ultimate tyrannical mage from the Ag
e of Light. Utilizing a variety of forbidden
 arts, she could turn people into dragons 
or resurrect them with mechanical bodies
. Driven only by curiosity, it was virtually 
impossible to stop her.

accessory.name: Miracle Bouquet
accessory.detail: Given with some precious words. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nora
story:
Nora

A ray of light in the Age of Darkness. It is
 her life’s work to eradicate the Dragotu
rn Sickness birthed by Rosa in the previou
s age. She continues in this endeavor to a
tone for the sins of her mother.
cutin: No choice but to do it.

accessory.name: Cursed Blooddrop
accessory.detail: A lot of blood went into this tiny amount. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Loretta
story:
Loretta

Originally an orphan, this sage was held c
aptive in the Holy Kingdom because of he
r magical power. The Holy Kingdom was a
ctually an artificial island in the sky that I
deia created to seal herself away.

accessory.name: Laughing Cat Boots
accessory.detail: Loretta has worn these since being abandoned. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Fenris
story:
Fenris

A wolf girl with the unique ability to talk t
o dragons and monsters. Gentle by nature
, she hates conflict and searches for a way
 for humans and dragons to coexist. Each 
year, there is a single night of which she h
as no memory - the night of the God Moon
.

accessory.name: Moon Mementos
accessory.detail: Mysterious objects she has always had on her. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cthulu
story:
Cthulu

Queen of the Age of Water, she was seale
d away for disrupting the balance of the w
orld. She is a berserker who lived only to 
hunt humans and dragons. Known as the G
lutton Queen for consuming the flesh of h
er prey, regular folk dare not whisper her
 name.

accessory.name: Twin Blue Pendant
accessory.detail: The pendant emits a deep, blue light. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Artorius
story:
Artorius

The greatest Knight King in history and th
e only one to ever draw the Holy Sword. H
e was the first to reach the First Dragon. D
isplaying power so far beyond mere morta
ls, he was practically divine. Despite this, 
he lost his beloved during his travels.

accessory.name: Memory of Solitude
accessory.detail: A vow and gift given to him by Angelica. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Type Zero
story:
Type Zero

An assassin from the distant land of Zipan
g. He has come for the Evil Dragon Eye th
at a certain individual has obtained. Type 
Zero's mission is to obtain its power and 
use it to defeat the dragons now threaten
ing the land of Zipang.

accessory.name: Secret Medicine
accessory.detail: Pills for stomach pain made by a ninja clan. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Izanagi
story:
Izanagi

A legendary chef in the land of Zipang. Th
e dishes he created have since become my
th - even tying in to creation legends. It is
 said that he created land while cooking m
eat and life by gutting fish.

accessory.name: Mythic Topapo Stew
accessory.detail: T is for tidy. Keep your kitchen clean. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Zetterman
story:
Zetterman

Casting aside my life as a peasant, I am no
w reborn!

Emerging from the darkness to crush drag
ons! The hero of steel, ZETTERMAN!

accessory.name: Field Guardian
accessory.detail: A hero who protects fields from invaders![5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: ASMK-2
story:
ASMK-2

The remnants of a human enhanced by an
 ancient, long-lost technology. Lacking se
lf-awareness, it simply kills anything that 
comes within range, be it dragon or huma
n. Amid that rage, it is especially fixated o
n the Knight King.

accessory.name: Tarnished Tiara
accessory.detail: Rust covers the tiara, its former glow faded. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Anubis
story:
Anubis

The goddess who brings repose to souls b
y sending them to Holy Valhalla. She also
 maintains balance by silencing twisted so
uls. In times of chaos, she may turn her sp
ear on mortals. Because of this, she was a
 symbol of terror in the Age of Darkness.

accessory.name: Cat With No Name
accessory.detail: It has no name yet. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Grimdore
story:
Grimdore

A girl who works as a cryptid hunter using
 the machine gun her grandmother left he
r. Cryptids share their roots with dragons
 and other monsters, and she hunts them 
all on sight. She chose this profession aft
er a lycanthrope wiped out her family.

accessory.name: Red Hood of Hate
accessory.detail: A red hood inherited from her late grandma. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Liveia
story:
Liveia

Legendary princess of the sea, who rules 
the seven seas and fights beasts with her
 water bow. Possessing a beauty of both b
ody and voice, she travels to the distant e
ighth sea to seal away the Glutton Queen’
s evil.

accessory.name: Dual Blue Pendant
accessory.detail: The pendant emits a pale, blue light. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Mayu Hojo
story:
Mayu Hojo

A girl summoned from the distant future t
o become a hero in this one. Her pop cult
ure references are gibberish in an age wit
hout pop, but she is also kind and quickly
 makes new friends. She oils up her mech
anical body to fight dragons.

accessory.name: Mr. Skewer
accessory.detail: A popular item in the world of the future. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Chrono
story:
Chrono

The leader of an organization formed to h
unt the "Sinners", abnormals created usin
g forbidden arts. Chrono is one of them h
imself, and is already more than 2000 yea
rs old. Though one day he too must be era
sed, he goes about his missions with seem
ingly little concern.

accessory.name: Chronos Machina
accessory.detail: Shows the time left to the end of the world. [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dragons, Light enemies.

name: Velvet
story:
Velvet

A servant who made a contract with Ideia 
in the distant past. Training magicians to 
serve her in the Holy Kingdom, she spend
s her days trying to keep up with Ideia's d
emands. She’s not bothered by Ideia’s 
plans, she just wants to complete her con
tract.

accessory.name: Veil of Penance
accessory.detail: Worn to do penance for one's past mistakes. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ideia
story:
Ideia

A mighty sorceress who ruled the Holy Ki
ngdom for thousands of years. Her goals a
nd origins are unknown, and she has been
 kidnapping girls with magical abilities an
d educating them in the ways of the Holy 
Kingdom. Has a terrible memory.

accessory.name: Blazing Memories
accessory.detail: Contains the stopped time of the Holy Land. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Le Fay
story:
Le Fay

Born from a 5,000 m tall World Tree plant
ed by accident, Le Fay has a childlike inno
cence and curiosity that belies
the great knowledge she possesses. She h
as come to earth, drawn by the Seventh D
ragon-Human War.

accessory.name: Band of Mischief
accessory.detail: Reverberates to all that seem fun. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Yurika
story:
Yurika

The master librarian who manages the my
thical Forbidden Library which is hidden s
omewhere in the world and is responsible
 for all magical tomes. She often appears 
in historical tomes which suggest that she
 may be a creature of some unknown mag
ic.

accessory.name: Rainbow Pen
accessory.detail: Made with the feather of a Moonbow Dragon. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]error[-]
Not here anymore.

name: Silver Spirit (Sell)
story:
Silver Spirit (Sell)

[FF1493]To Sell[-]
A rare spirit that somehow happened to g
et a body made of silver.

name: Gold Spirit (Sell)
story:
Gold Spirit (Sell)

[FF1493]To Sell[-]
A very rare spirit that somehow happened
 to get a body made of gold.

name: Heaven Spirit (Sell)
story:
Heaven Spirit (Sell)

[FF1493]To Sell[-]
An extremely rare spirit that somehow hap
pened to get the body of an angel. Really 
has her stuff together compared to other 
spirits.

name: Augustus, God of War
story:
Augustus the God of War 

An age-worn warrior who still fights on th
e front lines. Under his motto of "come ba
ck in one piece," he trains the young knig
hts who he hopes will follow in his footste
ps. Much to their discomfort, he often lun
ges into danger for his allies.

accessory.name: Cape of Triumph+
accessory.detail: It is worn with care; not a stain covers it. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Luke, Godly Knight
story:
Luke the Godly Knight 

A hero from the Age of Water who reache
d the Final Sea in order to seal the Glutto
n Queen. Cursed with an incurable wound
 by Ursula's betrayal, he continues his mis
sion, preparing to face her down and unco
ver the truth behind her actions.

accessory.name: Medal of Vows+
accessory.detail: It was damaged during the fight with Ursula. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alain, Holy Emperor
story:
Alain the Holy Emperor 

The hero Alain, who fought tirelessly to p
rotect his people from dragons. His burnin
g heart of justice has earned him the nam
e Holy Emperor. His Holy Sword has start
ed to adopt a form that seals away his pow
ers, reflecting his doubts in himself.

accessory.name: Crystal of Deceit+
accessory.detail: The crystal has spread to cover Alain's soul. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Eizel, Crazed King
story:
Eizel the Crazed King 

A hero who has fallen into madness throu
gh use of the Evil Eye. Half of his body ha
s turned into a dragon, resembling the ev
il he defeated to obtain the eye. The eye i
tself has already been taken by an assassi
n, yet the transformation only accelerates
.

accessory.name: Helm of Madness+
accessory.detail: Protects the Eye from its enemy: sunlight. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Joseph, False God
story:
Joseph the False God 

Joseph fights against rebels as a knight. T
he Republic he fights for places dragons a
s the highest authority with five knights b
elow them. Joseph is one of the five, and 
he rarely agrees with his fellow knight Ro
bin.

accessory.name: Wings of the Ether+
accessory.detail: Woven with feathers of Moonbow Dragons. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Phyllis, True Heroine
story:
Phyllis the True Heroine
 
A female knight also known as the "Blaze.
" She has her own escape from the world 
- an orphanage for those who have lost fa
mily in the war. She has little life left in h
er, yet she burns on with the passion to p
rotect them.

accessory.name: Fire of Life+
accessory.detail: Exchanges one's soul for power over fire. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ursula, Savior
story:
Ursula the Savior 

Having traveled with Liveia and the others
 while acting as the secret emissary of the
 Glutton Queen, she made a promise to Lu
ke when their journey began. That promis
e was to be Liveia's shield, no matter wha
t, and to defeat all who stood before her.

accessory.name: Crystal of Bondage+
accessory.detail: Break a bond, and the crystal eats her soul. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Angelica, Holy One
story:
Angelica the Holy One 

A knight who rides with the Knight King to
 defeat the First Dragon. Happy to fight al
ongside him, she is also worried about his
 fixation on justice. They suddenly find th
emselves in a village where everyone has 
been affected by the Dragoturn Sickness.

accessory.name: Tiara of Light+
accessory.detail: A memory so beautiful, all pale in its face. [5ef5f7]+6%[-] chance of critical hit.

name: Viola, Scholar
story:
Viola the Scholar 

An apostle from the end of the Age of Dar
kness. Ordered by the gods to destroy the
 world along with the Hell King, she uses 
her weapon of despair - Pandora - to take
 countless lives. She hopes to cast a ray o
f hope into the next age.

accessory.name: Crown of Despair+
accessory.detail: Its black hue is like an abyss of despair. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Empress Fiona
story:
Fiona the Empress

The end of an age. Fiona, the Hell King, an
d the other apostles have renewed the wo
rld. However using the weapon of hope, P
andora, she reaches the ultimate truth aft
er creating countless lives - this was also
 the start of the next cycle of despair.

accessory.name: Crown of Hope+
accessory.detail: Its white hue is like a garden of hope. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Master Foster
story:
Foster the Master

Head of the house of Apollos, he was fam
ous for both slaying dragons and inventin
g many things - including arrow shots. Th
is was caused by his desire to become a s
cientist, and if not for the war, he would h
ave sought only to invent things that help
 others.

accessory.name: Wildfire Arrow+
accessory.detail: Its fires burn inside a dragon, roasting it. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Turner, Admiral
story:
Turner the Admiral 

The Mighty Monsoon, known for destroyin
g foes with thousands of arrows fired by h
is vast army. The woman he took as his wi
fe was also one who made it rain, and the
 quiet sound of the rain that gently fell ar
ound her become his own respite.

accessory.name: Raindrop Charm+
accessory.detail: Changes color based on the patter of rain. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Edwards, Field Marshall
story:
Edwards the Field Marshall

His intelligence earned him a position as a
 scientist for the crown. Had a child with h
is assistant, Eleonora, but she leaves him 
in order to let him pursue his career. Edw
ards spent the rest of his life in solitude, 
ending the house of Apollos.

accessory.name: Locket of Distance+
accessory.detail: Has not been opened since she left him. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Smith, Commander
story:
Smith the Commander

Dragon scales can be sold for gold. Havin
g killed many dragons, Smith ruled the un
derworld. Endless days without challenge
