 started to bore him, but one day he lost i
t all to a thief who appeared out of nowhe
re. Finally, some excitement.

accessory.name: The Don's Bracelet+
accessory.detail: Of horrible make; the gem is actually glass. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Robin, Lord Commander
story:
Robin the Lord Commander 

Now one of the Five Knights of the Repub
lic, he has nearly achieved his goal of revi
ving the house of the Apollos. Two proble
ms remain: one is the huntress who is stil
l too strong for him, and the other is Jose
ph, who doesn’t believe she needs to die
.

accessory.name: Unicorn Mask+
accessory.detail: Beast masks are an Apollos tradition. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Rachael, True Sage
story:
Rachael the True Sage 

Rachael was born to alchemist parents wh
o specialized in explosives. When she was
 young, she enjoyed their fireworks. One d
ay, a dragon attacked, razing the town and
 killing her parents. It closed in on her, bu
t suddenly it exploded into fireworks.

accessory.name: Crimson Embers+
accessory.detail: Makes an Explosionist feel pride and fear. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Mary, Sage General
story:
Mary the Sage General

Mary has no memories. Sometimes, she g
limpses flashes of the past - the same sce
ne: a beautiful sea princess shooting both
 a young hero and female knight as they g
rapple. It makes her feel so sad, she imme
diately does her best to forget it again.

accessory.name: Shell Ornament+
accessory.detail: Inside the shell is a deep, endless abyss. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rosa, Holy Sage
story:
Rosa the Holy Sage 

Rosa is totally without emotions. Discardi
ng them was the only way to survive her c
hildhood. She first felt emotion again whe
n her daughter was born. In that instant, s
he smiled, glad to have this new subject f
or her experiments.

accessory.name: Miracle Bouquet+
accessory.detail: The only truth amidst all the lies. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nora, Imperious
story:
The Imperious Nora 

The Dragoturn Sickness appeared at the e
nd of the Age of Darkness. All who catch i
t eventually turn into vicious dragons and
 experience terrible pain during the transf
ormation. The only cure is a serum create
d from the blood of the carrier, Nora.

accessory.name: Cursed Blooddrop+
accessory.detail: A medicine that can treat dragonization. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Loretta, Tactician
story:
Loretta the Tactician 

Loretta has achieved military rank in the H
oly Kingdom, but suffers a nightmare abo
ut a crazy king. He was sealed away for hi
s crimes, but now appears to be consumin
g that seal. Loretta awoke terrified, but th
en gave a strange, cat-like laugh.

accessory.name: Laughing Cat Boots+
accessory.detail: Whenever they tear, she patches them up. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Johan, Bold General
story:
Johan the Bold General 

How many years has it been since he raise
d his voice? That had always been the role
 of his partner, but for the first time, that 
same partner was about to ignore the cree
d of "come back in one piece." If not now,
 then when should he get angry?

accessory.name: Red Horn Shard++
accessory.detail: Only an old soldier's will stopped the horn. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Claus, Blue General
story:
Claus the Blue General

A knight captain who brandishes his blade
 in a distant eastern land. His activities ha
ve helped the local populace, but he’s al
so starting to bear the weight of responsi
bility for bringing so many young people a
long with him - including his friend Friede
ll.

accessory.name: Homeland Amulet++
accessory.detail: The hope it symbolizes shall be passed on. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Michael, Holy General
story:
Michael the Holy General 

Often called a demon because of his incre
dibly strategic wit, he was the true power
 behind the throne. Known for using multi
-tiered traps to humiliate and destroy his 
foes, for his final display of prowess, he h
as chosen the current king, Artorius.

accessory.name: Hallowed Crown++
accessory.detail: Only with death does glory become eternal. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Elvin, Black General
story:
Elvin the Black General 

An imperial warrior who hates the Dragot
urn Sickness (which turns humans into dr
agons). He seeks to end it by finding the w
itch who created it. Learning that it origin
ated from a small village, he believes that
 location now holds the key.

accessory.name: Doom Dragon Cure++
accessory.detail: Side effects include doubling of pain. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Theodore, Tiger General
story:
Theodore the Tiger General 

I bring you salutations!
Welcome, one and all, to the grand new ag
e!

- Collection of Speeches by Tiger General
 Theodore, Chapter Three, Paragraph 4

accessory.name: Emblem of Freedom++
accessory.detail: It eventually comes to symbolize destruction. [5ef5f7]+15%[-] chance of special move.

name: Dominic, Red Deer
story:
Dominic the Red Deer 

The old soldier grips his lance more tightl
y. This is where he will die. At least the ot
hers have escaped. He just needs to buy t
hem a little more time. He is ready to die 
- here where his own master...  but then t
he anger of his friend erupts.

accessory.name: Red Claw Shard++
accessory.detail: Only an old soldier's will struck through. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Friedell, Frosty Tiger
story:
Friedell the Frosty Tiger 

A knight captain who succeeds his fallen c
aptain, Claus, and leads his men in the ea
stern land of Zipang. After falling out with
 the samurai dragon slayers in this region
, he spends his days skirmishing with thei
r female boss, Kasumi.

accessory.name: Blue Lion Helm++
accessory.detail: The crest is extended with every success. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alphonse, Heavenly Gate
story:
Alphonse the Heavenly Gate 

A former prince who's every effort to retu
rn to royalty has failed. He continues to b
e mocked within the army, too, but no lon
ger cries himself to sleep. Instead, Alphon
se fights on, for the sake of his wife and c
hild who wait for him.

accessory.name: Pillow of Sadness++
accessory.detail: No longer shall tears dampen this pillow. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Edgar, Vizali Hunter
story:
Edgar the Vizali Hunter

Marginalized by the army, he is practically
 forced out of the service and into mercen
ary life. Sipping watery beer in a southern
 desert bar, Edgar watches a familiar look
ing girl dance on stage. Fearing the truth 
behind her presence, he leaves the bar.

accessory.name: Demon Helm++
accessory.detail: The mask no longer comes off for anyone. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Clemence, Brave Spirit
story:
Clemence the Brave Spirit 

A knight and key member of the rebel org
anization, White Hunters, who have finally
 plunged into a terrible, all-out war with t
he Republic. Having done all he can to pre
vent the war, it finally comes down to a si
ngle solution - to kill his former friend.

accessory.name: Dove Helm++
accessory.detail: People sought peace, and it began to shine. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Raquel, Bold Princess
story:
Raquel the Bold Princess 

The head huntress of a valley where drago
ns and humans live together. She works h
ard to keep peace between them. Known f
or her strict demeanor, she is feared by b
oth humans and dragons. Her merciful exp
ressions will sometimes reveal her matern
al nature.

accessory.name: Helm of Fire++
accessory.detail: A symbol of mutual need and coexistence. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cerim, Imperial Star
story:
Cerim the Imperial Star

Her investigations into regional dragon be
havior have led to an interesting revelatio
n. In regards to conflicts between dragons
, they seem to attack anything entering th
eir territory, but they will not engage in h
ostilities with dragons of the same color.

accessory.name: Helm of Water++
accessory.detail: A symbol of peace and change. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Maximilian, Dragon Seal
story:
Maximilian the Dragon Seal 

A warrior banished from her home in the P
erpetual Valley where dragons and human
s coexist. Keeping her promise to a certai
n knight captain, she spread the word of h
er home and helped lead others to seek it
 out. The valley banished her and moved.

accessory.name: Helm of Light++
accessory.detail: A symbol of struggle and exile. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Izark, Roaring Shadow
story:
Izark the Roaring Shadow

The Imperial Dragon Capture Captain who
 brought an end to the long history of the
 Perpetual Valley. Wiped out the humans l
iving there and handed all the dragons ov
er to the military, transforming herself int
o an object of fear for decades to come.
cutin: End of the line for you!

accessory.name: Ears of Detection++
accessory.detail: Hopefully one day, the device will go silent. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Rudolph, Queen Hare
story:
Rudolph the Queen Hare 

A hunter with a huge bounty on his head. 
He formerly hunted dragons, but he now t
argets humans as well - creating new trag
edies each day. After leaving the White Hu
nters, he learned that their boss, Theodor
e, is after him. He plans to hunt Theodore
 first.

accessory.name: Rabbit Hood++
accessory.detail: Not suited to summer, as it smells of blood. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Liselotte, Wild Witch
story:
Liselotte the Wild Witch 

Dragon Pyromancy are a high level form o
f alchemy involving transforming the bloo
d of dragons into gunpowder. The process
 requires the complete immobilization of t
he target, and continuously transforming 
the flowing blood is itself a form of art.

accessory.name: Scarlet Gunpowder++
accessory.detail: A spell causes the powder to explode. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Flora, Harvest Disciple
story:
Flora the Harvest Disciple 

Having continued to make it rain around h
erself, she has received gratitude, but als
o started to realize people think her a bit 
strange. Flora is accustomed to it by now,
 but is also wondering if the downpour aro
und her will ever allow her to get married
.

accessory.name: Rain Ward Doll++
accessory.detail: A happiness charm made by Flora's mother. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Patricia, Holy Empress
story:
Patricia the Holy Empress

The First Dragon is the progenitor of all d
ragons - the alpha and omega of all ages. 
Patricia has discovered that all calamities
 originate from this dragon, but there is a
lso a shadow controlling it.

accessory.name: Cloth of Holiness++
accessory.detail: Removing this cloth is expressly forbidden. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Walpurgis, Demon Eye
story:
Walpurgis the Demon Eye 

Walpurgis is a tavern dancer who supplem
ents her income using magic to heal and t
ell fortunes. After many years of living wit
hout memories, she finally recalls her own
 name and the smile of a boy from her chi
ldhood. She now dreams of meeting him a
gain.

accessory.name: Tiara of True Self++
accessory.detail: Walpurga cherishes it,but she knows not why. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Octavia, Necromancer
story:
Octavia the Necromancer 

Octavia has accepted her life as somethin
g other than a human after realizing that t
rying to act like a human is the last thing 
a real person would do. She decides to us
e what time remains to her to explore as m
uch of the world as possible.

accessory.name: Cloth of Comfort++
accessory.detail: Her Blue Guardian now lives on inside her. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Seyfried
story:
Seyfried

A youth who robs from the rich and gives 
to the poor. Travels along with the female
 magician who raised him, slaying dragons
 and doing good deeds. His massive sword
, Balmung, does not cut through dragon s
cales but rather crushes them to pieces.

accessory.name: Evil Dragon Shroud
accessory.detail: Worn by his father who slew the Evil Dragon. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Seyfried, Bandit King
story:
Seyfried the Bandit King

Take everything. That was Seyfried's cred
o. After the magician who raised him was 
assassinated, he stopped trusting others 
and has lived by his own wits. His sword, 
Balmung, has become even stronger after
 being bathed in his departed guardian's b
lood.

accessory.name: Evil Dragon Veil
accessory.detail: Evil Dragon's shroud, dyed with its blood. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Brunhilde
story:
Brunhilde

Brunhilde was born to a human mother an
d dragon father who both fought to the la
st to save her. She has the form of a huma
n with the powers of a dragon, and she is 
being closely watched by the gods since s
he is the only one who has the power to d
efeat them.

accessory.name: Hidden Fangs
accessory.detail: Mementos of her father given by her mother. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Brunhilde, Sky General
story:
Brunhilde the Sky General

A female knight who serves the gods, with
 the power of a dragon in a human body. H
er power is now used by the gods to mana
ge other apostles and dragons. She is act
ually waiting for a chance to turn on the g
ods to avenge her parents.

accessory.name: Bared Fangs
accessory.detail: The obedient dragon hides her fangs. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Amagi
story:
Amagi

18th successor to the throne of the land o
f Zipang. Amagi's talents and beauty are a
 match for the First Empress of old, and th
e people love Amagi too. Proposals come 
daily from princes across the lands, but th
ere is one issue - Amagi is a man.

accessory.name: Sash of Duality
accessory.detail: A sash for bringing out one's femininity. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Amagi, Lustrous Ruler
story:
Amagi the Lustrous Ruler 

The throne of the land of Zipang has tradi
tionally been held by a woman, and Amag
i has hidden the fact he is a man to becom
e the 18th ruler. He now aims to act more
 and more like a woman, but this desire on
ly seals his fate - the same as the First Em
press.

accessory.name: Girdle of Duality
accessory.detail: Wearing it brings out one's accepted form. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Maxwell
story:
Maxwell

A youth from the dragon tribe - those who
 predict the appearance of the First Drago
n at the end of each age. Having discovere
d the existence of a shadow that seems to
 be controlling the First Dragon, he leaves
 the village to uncover the truth.

accessory.name: Crying Hatchling
accessory.detail: A just born baby. Extremely light. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Maxwell, Elder
story:
The Elder Maxwell

An observer who has traveled for thousan
ds of years to find the shadow controlling
 the First Dragon. Having seen the role hi
s line has played, he now sees they are on
ly one faction, and the shadowy presence
 is the true observer of everything.

accessory.name: Crying Bird
accessory.detail: Notable weight gain, a sign of rapid growth. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Sky Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Sky Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]
A rare spirit that just suddenly came into 
being. It's a bit lazier than other spirits.

name: Festive Spirit (EFusion)
story:
Festive Spirit (EFusion)

[FF1493]Evolution Fusion[-]
A rare spirit that was suddenly created on
 a holy night. It's a bit more excitable than
 other spirits.

name: Snake Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Snake Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]
A rare spirit that was suddenly created at
 the start of a new year. It's a bit more cel
ebratory than other spirits.

name: Evil Spirit (Big Success)
story:
Evil Spirit (B. Success)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion / Big Success[-]
A slightly evil spirit that for some reason 
just broke bad. Works her wickedness whe
n used as an enhancer to ensure big or hu
ge success.

name: Lucia
story:
Lucia

A noble adventurer seeking the "Dengeki 
Game App" magazine said to be somewhe
re in the world. This powerful publication 
is said to contain all the secrets of this wo
rld, and she hopes to use it to find out wh
at the dragons want.

name: Lisha
story:
Lisha

A magical swordswoman who uses the sec
ret power of "Famitsu" to hunt dragons. T
he primary ability of this power is a "third
 eye" that can divine truth, and as the 832
nd master of this power, Lisha is also the 
youngest to ever obtain it.

name: Rabby, Crimson Knight
story:
Rabby the Crimson Knight 

A youth who slays dragons in order to pro
tect as many people as he can. The war be
tween dragons and humans is accelerating
, threatening to engulf the entire continen
t, yet Rabby still doesn't run away. He rem
ains in the land of the woman he once lov
ed.

accessory.name: Red Feather++
accessory.detail: The feather sways and brings in the spring. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Karl, Blue Knight
story:
Karl the Blue Knight

Long ago, there was a story about two be
autiful twin princesses with lovely singing
 voices. The people called them Sea Princ
esses, but one of them lost her voice. She
 cried every day, until a small fairy called 
Cthulu appeared before her.

accessory.name: Waterguard Pen++
accessory.detail: The pen flows, writing down all that he sees. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Aleksy, Golden Knight
story:
Aleksy the Golden Knight 

Aleksy has grown into a fine defender of t
he Knight King. As he continues to fight d
ragons with the Knight King and his allies
, he passes close to his home village and l
earns of a strange disease afflicting it, so
 he hurries homeward.

accessory.name: Musketeer Talisman++
accessory.detail: A hope that the three will someday reunite. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Viktor, Black Knight
story:
Viktor the Black Knight

Viktor, finally tracking down Erving after h
is disappearance from the village, is faced
 with a terrible sight. He was travelling wi
th Ludmilla and Sigmund. Viktor saw him 
with them, saw him smiling for the first tim
e, and something inside him snapped.

accessory.name: Lavender Scarf++
accessory.detail: A lavender scent imbues the fabric. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Yuri, White Knight
story:
Yuri the White Knight 

Through his research into dragon ecology
, Yuli finally captures an injured Bahammu
t. After learning of an evil cook on a ramp
age to obtain the prized meat of this beas
t, he approaches a female chef for assista
nce.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Helm++
accessory.detail: Doesn't look great, but give it a chance. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Aaron, Crimson Spear
story:
Aaron the Crimson Spear 

By the time he arrived, the warrior who le
d them was already dead - an injured Rab
by at her side. The gruesome scene was d
ominated by the lead dragon and the arro
w protruding from its lifeless head. Aaron
 wept for the sheer violence on display.

accessory.name: Red Bangle++
accessory.detail: The faded color shows the wearer's loyalty. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Leonard, Blue Spear
story:
Leonard the Blue Spear 

Leonard was glad that the surviving merce
naries made it out. Attacking a nest near t
he village, they had been routed by an un
expected number of dragons. They would 
only cause more damage if left unchecked
, so the only option was to blow up the ne
st.

accessory.name: Seabreeze Headguard++
accessory.detail: An item that has long protected Leonid. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rolan. Golden Spear
story:
Rolan the Golden Spear 

Rolan still gives his all for the Knight King
 - now hated by the people. With Angelica
 and Aleksy dead, Rolan is sure he is the o
nly one who can guard the King's back. He
 thwarts any who attack him, be they man
, beast or dragon.

accessory.name: Guard's Spaulder++
accessory.detail: A symbol of a very determined will. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Erving, Black Spear
story:
Erving the Black Spear
It seemed like any another day. In the inst
ant Erving laughed at the bickering betwe
en Sigmund and Ludmilla, two shadows at
tacked from the forest. One was a white-h
aired military man with an unfamiliar weap
on, and the other was his friend Viktor.

accessory.name: Captain's Belt++
accessory.detail: Hard to remove once fastened. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Igor, White Spear
story:
Igor the White Spear

Igor killed more than 3000 Bahammut, ma
king him widely known as a hunter. He car
ried out the forbidden hunting of dragons
 with no fear of reprisals, but one day he r
eceived a challenge - not to a feat of arms
, but in the arena of his true calling, cooke
ry.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Roast++
accessory.detail: The trick is to char it ever so slightly. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Anastasia, Crimson Bow
story:
Anastasia the Crimson Bow

Her tough training has made Anastasia str
ong and smart. Now she has a decision to
 make. The wounded comrade collapsed a
t her feet, or the dragon charging to attac
k her? Draw her bow, or retreat in fear? H
er choice was an obvious one.

accessory.name: Red Ring++
accessory.detail: Vermillion memories glitter in the light. [5ef5f7]+350[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Anya, Blue Bow
story:
Anya the Blue Bow

Anya hopes to re-forge her bonds with th
e land of Zipang. They once worked to sol
ve the dragon problem together, but that 
path has now closed for her. She struggle
s to reopen it as quickly as she can while 
the dragons continue to cause more dama
ge.

accessory.name: Foreign Amulet++
accessory.detail: The gem's color has changed with time. [5ef5f7]+350[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Eleonora. Golden Bow
story:
Eleonora the Golden Bow 

A warrior who left the man she loved and 
raises his children alone. Struggling with 
quadruplets, her cheerful nature remains 
unchanged. This earns the support of thos
e around her, but she secretly weeps for h
er loss each night.

accessory.name: Locket of Parting++
accessory.detail: The locket will never be opened again. [5ef5f7]+350[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ludmilla, Black Bow
story:
Ludmilla the Black Bow

Travels with a lancer from her village. The
 two plan to research the Dragoturn Sickn
ess, a fearsome disease that turns people
 into dragons. What Ludmilla hates about 
it most is that it also takes the victim's me
mories.

accessory.name: Purple Hair Clip++
accessory.detail: Given with love by Sigmund one day. [5ef5f7]+350[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Eva, White Bow
story:
Eva the White Bow

Now training in the distant east, Eva recei
ves a request to stop the rampage of her 
former comrade, Igor. Those who stray fro
m the true path must be punished. Eva ch
allenges him, in the traditions of the east,
 a cooking battle.

accessory.name: Cold Leekle Soup++
accessory.detail: The trick is to heat, cool, reheat, recool. [5ef5f7]+350[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Carrol, Crimson Wizard
story:
Carrol the Crimson Wizard 

Carrol has cast aside his former allies and
 now travels alone. There was no sin in sta
ying in one same place, believing in allies
, and weeping for them - but that time is g
one. Strong of heart, he sets out to find s
omewhere he is needed.
cutin: This will be a sure hit!
This will be a sure hit!

accessory.name: Red Spell Book++
accessory.detail: An irreplaceable tome he takes everywhere. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kirill, Blue Wizard
story:
Kirill the Blue Wizard 

Kirill has grown powerful. Too busy to hun
t dragons, and out of touch with Leonard 
for years, his friend suddenly pays him a v
isit. They share only a few words, but the 
reaffirmation of their friendship made Kiri
ll smile.

accessory.name: Wavecrash Gloves++
accessory.detail: For Cyril, the finest and worst gloves ever. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Burckhardt, Golden W.
story:
Burckhardt the Golden Wizard 

Burckhardt finally reached the Holy Kingd
om after decades of travelling, but it was 
already a wasteland - devoid of all life. Bu
rckhardt collapsed to his knees in shock, 
and then heard a cat-like laugh behind him
.

accessory.name: Incomplete Map++
accessory.detail: Will it lead to hope or the mouth of evil? [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Sigmund, Black Wizard
story:
Sigmund the Black Wizard 

A youth afflicted by Dragoturn Sickness. I
t starts with intense pain and scales sprea
ding across the body. This kills most victim
s, but in some cases the scales fall off and
 they turn into a full dragon. This marks th
e end of the Dragoturn Sickness.

accessory.name: Black Dragon Cure++
accessory.detail: Prolonged use may lead to dragonization. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Effim, White Wizard
story:
Effim the White Wizard

A youth seeking the valley where humans
 and dragons live together. He hopes to fi
nd his own dragon to ride. Texts say the v
alley was wiped out years ago, but a lette
r from his father suggests it was simply re
located to the very town in which Effim liv
es.

accessory.name: Dragon Wing Shard++
accessory.detail: A symbol of hope for peaceful coexistence. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Sakura, Blazing Blade
story:
Sakura the Blazing Blade

Sakura now has her own dojo with many s
tudents under her strict tutelage. She is e
qually strict with the two children she had
 with Nijo, and her anger (rooted in kindn
ess) can be heard echoing throughout the
 dojo.

accessory.name: Ornament of Trials++
accessory.detail: A strong woman does not wait; she takes. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kasumi, Still Waters
story:
Kasumi the Still Waters 

The land of Zipang has long rejected inter
action with the outside world, but Kasumi
 advocates reopening their borders. Many
 of the supplies from overseas were used 
to defeat dragons, but now those supply l
ines have been cut.

accessory.name: Blue Hair Clip++
accessory.detail: A symbol of friendship that crosses borders. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Tsubaki, Heaven Bright
story:
Tsubaki the Heaven Bright 

Coming from the bloodline of the legenda
ry chef, Tsubaki continues to protect the h
uman world as the Chef of Light. His cook
ing brings people vigor and hope, and he 
dreams of saving Himeji, who has now fall
en into the ways of darkness.

accessory.name: Mythic Chopsticks++
accessory.detail: A certain bowl sapped them of their powers. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ayame, Shaded Circle
story:
Ayame the Shaded Circle 

Ayame continues to kill dragons as an ass
assin of the land of Zipang. While waiting 
for Type Zero to return to her, she has po
lished her cooking skills up to a reasonab
le level. The dream of his return motivates
 her to live on.

accessory.name: Homemade Rice Ball++
accessory.detail: Ayame's homemade rice ball. Full of love. [5ef5f7]+10%[-] chance of First Strike.

name: Botan, Shadowless Blade
story:
Botan the Shadowless Blade

Having betrayed her village in an attempt 
to wipe it out, the villagers realize it’s to
o dangerous for her to remain alive. Havin
g become completely self-aware, she turn
s on her former comrades and no longer t
ries to hide her insanity.

accessory.name: Bloody Peony++
accessory.detail: Only Botan is able to see this white flower. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Nijo, Dragon Flame
story:
Nijo the Dragon Flame 

Hearing the town in which his wife and ch
ildren live was wiped out by dragons, Nijo
 hurries home. With more than 300 drago
ns involved, the samurai and bushi couldn
't do a thing. Seeing his home, the dojo, b
urn, Nijo collapses in anguish.

accessory.name: Headband of Trials++
accessory.detail: Makes him think of his home and mother. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Nanao, Dragon Water
story:
Nanao the Dragon Water

Nanao is the young head of Water Village.
 Capable of swiftly leading his allies to tak
e out any dragon that appears in the vicin
ity, he has yet to overcome his fear from t
he past.  This makes him very strict with t
hose who underestimate dragons.

accessory.name: Charm of Mists++
accessory.detail: The charm protects, and so do the people. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Himeji, Dragon Flash
story:
Himeji the Dragon Flash

Himeji continues to cast people into desp
air as the Chef of Darkness. Those who ea
t his food sink into anxiety and uncertaint
y. However, its real terror is that it is also
 terribly addictive. Still dreams of using h
is cooking to captivate Tsubaki.

accessory.name: Mythic Bowl++
accessory.detail: A pair of chopsticks took away its powers. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Wakamatsu, Dragon S.
story:
Wakamatsu the Dragon Scale

Wakamatsu has succeeded in stealing a dr
agon trained by Matsue. With that dragon
, he will not only be able to return to his h
ome, he might also be rewarded for his un
ique success. Filled with happiness, he ta
kes to the skies.

accessory.name: Black Collar++
accessory.detail: The dragon silently awaits its moment. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Matsue, Dragon Knight
story:
Matsue the Dragon Knight

A youth from the land of Zipang. After lon
g years of interacting with dragons, he ha
s come to learn that they have emotions. 
The only dragon he was unable to tame w
as stolen. Taking the rest along with him, 
he now leaves the land of Zipang behind.

accessory.name: Dragongrass Whistle++
accessory.detail: It’s sound can soothe the user as well. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Haruna, Flame Empress
story:
Haruna the Flame Empress 

Haruna was once one of the Blue Flame Sn
ipers, fighting alongside Ise. She protecte
d Ise with all her might for the sake of thi
s moment - the moment in which the two 
of them could fight.

accessory.name: Red Feather Helm++
accessory.detail: Ise turned it into a crimson grave marker. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ise, Water Empress
story:
Ise the Water Empress

Ise avoided Haruna’s shot by just a hair’
s breadth. Seeing the intent and convictio
n behind the arrow, she replies in kind. Pe
ering over the defeated Haruna, she stays
 her hand. Ise turns and leaves their past 
glory days behind as she walks away.

accessory.name: Blue Feather Helm++
accessory.detail: Haruna saw it as an azure target to hit. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Mikasa, Light Empress
story:
Mikasa the Light Empress 

Struggling to resist the Dragoturn Sickne
ss, Mikasa awaits her three friends in the 
promised spot. She wanted to discuss wit
h them the orders from the First Empress
 - that they must fight each other. But the
ir arrows were already aiming at her...

accessory.name: Charm of Cleansing++
accessory.detail: The curse is then passed on to Chitose. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nagato, Shadow Empress
story:
Nagato the Shadow Empress

Word reaches Nagato that Settsu has defe
ated Ise. She decided what to do next. It w
as something she did every day, for Ryujo
, sometimes without him even knowing it.
 To remove those in his way. Now she had
 her next target.

accessory.name: Poison Arrow++
accessory.detail: Dragon scale poison is very deadly to humans. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Settsu, Nil Empress
story:
Settsu the Nil Empress 

Having defeated Mikasa, Settsu sensed ot
her archers nearby. The forest made it im
possible to estimate their position. If the 
other two conspired against her then she 
would end up like Mikasa; however, that w
as not what ultimately transpired that nig
ht.

accessory.name: Hair Clip of Envy++
accessory.detail: Offers speed to help one serve their lord. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Akagi, Tyrant Suzaku
story:
Akagi the Tyrant Suzaku 

Akagi burned with a passion for battle. Af
ter earning the name Suzaku, he honed hi
s skills diligently while desperately seekin
g an opponent worthy of facing his true m
ight. He was extremely happy to receive th
e order to fight his allies - his only equals
.

accessory.name: Fire Bird Bell++
accessory.detail: Controls the fires; leads to tyranny. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kaga, Count Seiryu
story:
Kaga the Count Seiryu 

Kaga, ordered by the First Empress to sla
y the Fire Emperors and Five Archers, imm
ediately started making detailed plans to 
achieve this end. Deciding to first winnow
 the chaff, he fixes his sights on the Five A
rchers.

accessory.name: Azure Dragon Mirror++
accessory.detail: Controls the waters; leads to tranquility. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Chitose, Rebel Byakko
story:
Chitose the Rebel Byakko

Chitose had been expecting the orders fro
m the First Empress, to kill the other Emp
erors. It was all to do with the fixed numb
er of souls in the world. They had become
 too powerful, and needed to be culled. To
 resist would only create further suffering
.
cutin: I can see you, you know.

accessory.name: White Tiger Band++
accessory.detail: Controls all light; leads to hope. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ryujo, Master Genbu
story:
Ryujo the Master Genbu  

Ryujo resists the oncoming blaze and kills
 Akagi. A report also comes in that Chitos
e has defeated Kaga. If only one of them c
an possibly survive, isn't the outcome ine
vitable? A moment later, a third Emperor 
lay dead.

accessory.name: Black Turtle Curse++
accessory.detail: Controls all darkness; leads to disaster. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Shinano, Kirin Goddess
story:
Shinano the Kirin Goddess 

The other four Emperors and the Five Arc
hers are all dead, with only Shino, the Kir
in, remaining. Soon, there would be none.
 The land of Zipang was doubtless headin
g into a new age; hopefully, one of peace.
..
cutin: Tis the end of the road.

accessory.name: Chimera Beads++
accessory.detail: Controls the balances; leads back to nothing. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Fenris, Beast Empress
story:
Fenris the Beast Empress 

Fenris drinks the pure blood of a certain g
irl on the night of the God Moon and beco
mes a full lycan. Her kind nature vanishes
, and is replaced with that of a wild beast.
 That beast then races to get more of the 
same girl's blood.

accessory.name: Moon Mementos+
accessory.detail: Stole both items off of the Red Girl. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cthulu, Wicked Queen
story:
Cthulu the Wicked Queen

Evil. That was the best word for this fairy 
creature. Promising to grant the wishes o
f mortals, she actually took over their bod
ies. That was the true form of the terrible
 Cthulu. She once formed a contract to re
cover a lost voice…

accessory.name: Twin Blue Pendant+
accessory.detail: Without its twin, it is incomplete. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Artorius, Savior King
story:
Artorius the Savior King 

The Knight King lost everything for the sa
ke of his justice. His sins rallied the peopl
e against him, and they dragged him to th
e ground. Still, his heart did not break. Hi
s unwavering conviction would not allow h
im to halt his advance - even if crushed.

accessory.name: Memory of Solitude+
accessory.detail: That day, his love and memory were shattered. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Type Zero, Demon King
story:
Type Zero the Demon King 

An assassin from the land of Zipang who's
 powerful mind has allowed him to becom
e the first true master of the Evil Dragon 
Eye. He killed many dragons, but as the p
rice for such power his body started to cr
umble and flake away.

accessory.name: Secret Medicine+
accessory.detail: Even ninja medicine cannot heal all pain. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Izanagi, Feast King
story:
Izanagi the Feast King

Chop the leaky onion into cubes.
Peel the 'taters and cut into chunks.
Fry the dragon meat and onions together,
 and season to taste.
Add the 'taters and water and continue to
 fry until all the water is gone.
A lovely meat & potatoes dish is ready!

accessory.name: Mythic Topapo Stew+
accessory.detail: A is for attentive. Cook meals with care. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Zetterman, Bravest King
story:
Zetterman the Bravest King 

* No. 2.

Giving up on harvest this season, my light
 now accelerates!
I am the ultimate king of the braves!
I AM HERO ZETTERMAN!

accessory.name: Field Guardian+
accessory.detail: Come rain, wind, or snow, he'll be there![5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: ASMK-2 Beta
story:
ASMK-2 Beta the Destroyer King 

Target's cardiac functions terminated.
181418 error.
181418 error. Unexpected error.
Clearing log data.

accessory.name: Tarnished Tiara+
accessory.detail: Her shattered and scattered memories. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Anubis, Phantom Queen
story:
Anubis the Phantom Queen 

The goddess of death, Anubis, appeared d
uring the Age of Darkness, an era of confl
ict between humans. Having arrived with h
er apostles to purify the world, she first b
rought the dragons under her control. No
w she turns her Funeral Spear on the hum
ans.

accessory.name: Cat With No Name+
accessory.detail: It still has no name, and it never will. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Grimdore, Revenge Q.
story:
Grimdore the Revenge Queen 

The wound she received on the night of th
e God Moon, although almost healed, still
 gives her mental pain. For the first time, 
she works alongside other hunters. Amid 
the fear and trepidation, she awaits the ar
rival of her prey.

accessory.name: Red Hood of Hate+
accessory.detail: She swears revenge on the moonlit rainbow. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Liveia, Sea Dragon Queen
story:
Liveia the Sea Dragon Queen 

Liveia finally faces off with the Glutton Qu
een, losing comrades along the way. Her t
rembling hands draw her bow. She couldn
't fire, however, because the terrible crea
ture in front of her, with its cat-like laugh
, was clearly her long-lost twin sister.

accessory.name: Dual Blue Pendant+
accessory.detail: Without its twin, it is incomplete. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Mayu Hojo, High Queen
story:
Mayu Hojo the High Queen

A being from the future, Mayu Hojo has re
cently felt her body slowing down. A local
 blacksmith tells her it may be caused by t
he low grade oil in this age. Hearing that 
the land of Zipang can make better oil, sh
e sets off at mach 20 to get the good stuf
f.

accessory.name: Mr. Skewer+
accessory.detail: In the future, people delight in skewerings. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Chrono, Emperor King
story:
Chrono the Emperor King 

The former executioner who now leads the
 Sinners under his control against the org
anization he once belonged to. His new fo
rce includes a youth afflicted by the Drago
turn Sickness and a female land of Zipang
 warrior with the Evil Dragon's Eye.

accessory.name: Chronos Machina+
accessory.detail: Also functions as a normal timepiece. [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dragons, Light enemies.

name: Velvet, Bound Queen
story:
Velvet the Bound Queen 

Velvet formed a contract with the fairy Ct
hulu, completely losing control of herself.
 When Ideia finally removed Cthulu from h
er body, part of Velvet's soul was also rem
oved, taking her powers and memories wi
th it. They are just now coming back.

accessory.name: Veil of Penance+
accessory.detail: When time is endless, so is penance. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ideia, Sealing Queen
story:
Ideia the Sealing Queen

A magician of the Holy Kingdom, who seal
ed the soul of the Glutton Queen inside h
erself. She gathered as many magicians as
 she could, planning to take the magic tha
t stopped time in the Holy Kingdom and fo
cus it on the Glutton Queen.

accessory.name: Blazing Memories+
accessory.detail: Time is captured and fed into the flames. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Le Fay, Fairy Monarch
story:
Le Fay the Fairy Monarch

A fairy of great intellect, born from the wo
rld tree. Observing humans out of curiosit
y, she also sometimes causes a commotio
n by getting involved in their affairs. Her 
whispers in one poor nation, for example,
 resulted in regime-ending riots.

accessory.name: Band of Mischief+
accessory.detail: Emits a floral aroma when it detects fun. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Yurika, Queen of Tomes
story:
Yurika the Queen of Tomes

Yurika's role is to observe and record the 
world. Preparing for the time when human
s will finally defeat the dragons, she recor
ds the stories of all the heroes through hi
story. Finally, in the Rainbow Age, she ste
ps onto the stage herself.

accessory.name: Rainbow Pen+
accessory.detail: Can write without ink on certain paper. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Yamato
story:
Yamato
A youth from the royal line of the land of 
Zipang. He refuses to take the path set ou
t for him and instead wanders the world. H
e seeks recognition as the greatest warrio
r and to hone is skills so he can defeat the
 emperor’s legitimate son, a skilled arche
r.

accessory.name: Borrowed Pipe
accessory.detail: Like your pipe, Pa? Here's me takin' it![5ef5f7]+400[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Yamato God of Blades
story:
Yamato the God of Blades

Yamato was ready to take on the archer h
e failed to defeat in the games years befo
re, but found himself faced with an incred
ibly beautiful woman. Losing his focus in 
the face of Amagi, Yamato ends up defeat
ed once more.

accessory.name: Glittering Pipe
accessory.detail: I don't fight women! Here's your win![5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Valzark
story:
Valzark

Valzark was an experiment of the gods, a 
spirit vessel created to hold a soul. As tha
t was his only reason to exist, he had no h
eart. In a certain age, this all changed whe
n met the one who called herself Octavia.

accessory.name: Blue Core
accessory.detail: Valzark's blue heart. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Valzark, Dragon Lord
story:
Valzark the Dragon Lord

The gods did not take kindly to their tool,
 Valzark, getting involved with some abom
inable failure made by mere humans. They
 ordered their White and Black apostles to
 destroy the thing, and Valzark only learn
ed of this when it was already over.

accessory.name: Core of Blue Dreams
accessory.detail: A device that will never actually feel. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Karma
story:
Karma

Picked up by Seyfried at a young age, he h
as looked after her ever since. Extremely 
introverted, she lost the ability to speak s
oon after being born. She rarely interacts
 with others, but she often smiles at Seyfr
ied.

accessory.name: Tragic Concealer
accessory.detail: Worn around her neck to hide a scar. [5ef5f7]+50[-] HP & ATK, Ups chain bonus, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Karma, Curse Bearer
story:
Karma the Curse Bearer 

A thief who travels with Seyfried, she has
 been cursed since birth. Anyone who is n
ear her for too long will develop a terrible
 disease. Karma herself does not know thi
s, but Seyfried continues his quest to sav
e her.

accessory.name: Tragic Binder
accessory.detail: She has others tie it, as she can't herself. [5ef5f7]+75[-] HP & ATK, Ups chain bonus, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Isabella
story:
Isabella

Isabella was a princess of a country wiped
 out by an uprising. Finding herself living 
among the poor, she learned how to survi
ve and protect herself. Time passed, and a
 royal family took Isabella in. That was wh
en she met Maria.

accessory.name: Crystal Shell
accessory.detail: A treasure handed down by her ancestors. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Queen Isabella
story:
Queen Isabella

Isabella pretended to enjoy her life with M
aria, hiding her nature as a former princes
s. Her ancestor Michael had proclaimed hi
mself supreme ruler, and that was unchan
ged in Isabella's mind. All were beneath h
er. She quietly prepared to take Maria's c
ountry.

accessory.name: Demonic Shell
accessory.detail: Crystals shroud this unusual seashell. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Fire Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Fire Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]
A slightly rare spirit which obtained a bod
y of fire by being burned.

name: Water Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Water Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]
A slightly rare spirit which obtained a bod
y of water by being sunk into the sea.

name: Light Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Light Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]
A slightly rare spirit which obtained a bod
y of light by being left out in the sun.

name: Dark Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Dark Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]
A slightly rare spirit which obtained a bod
y of darkness by being left in the dark for
 too long.

name: Blaze Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Blaze Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]
An extremely rare spirit born with the ble
ssings of fire.

name: Liquid Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Liquid Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]
An extremely rare spirit born with the ble
ssings of water.

name: Shine Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Shine Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]
An extremely rare spirit born with the ble
ssings of light.

name: Abyss Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Abyss Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]
An extremely rare spirit born with the ble
ssings of darkness.

name: Ogre Spirit (EFusion)
story:
Ogre Spirit (EFusion)

[FF1493]Evolution Fusion[-]
An Oni spirit that has been driven out of m
any homes. It's a bit more pitiful than oth
er spirits.

name: Chocolate Spirit (Gift)
story:
Chocolate Spirit (Gift)

[FF1493]Gift[-]
A spirit that makes the perfect gift, create
d when expressing gratitude to someone. 
It's a bit sweeter than other spirits.

name: Spirit Queen (EFusion)
story:
Spirit Queen (EFusion)

[FF1493]Evolution Fusion[-]
A fun loving spirit that has been displayed
 in many houses for children's festivals. It
's a bit happier than other spirits.

name: Lushi
story:
Lushi

A noble adventurer from a distant land se
eking a text containing every secret of thi
s world. Accompanied by her sisters Lucia
 and Lucy, she believes the tome lies in th
e Forbidden Library. Can they find it befo
re their homeland is destroyed?

name: Lisha, Tactical Goddess
story:
Lisha the Tactical Goddess 

The 832nd master of her powers, Lisha no
w dresses to look the part. Her robes are 
worn by students of her school, with the s
titches on the sleeve marking rank. Green
 is the color of a Third Stage, which only f
our people (including Lisha) have achieve
d.

name: Corona
story:
Corona

A young girl sent back in time after an acc
ident in the distant future. Her dimension
al shifter, Politan, requires a vast amount
 of power to recharge. Just when she was 
about to give up, Rosa appeared before he
r.

name: Dione
story:
Dione

A tavern in the desert where girls with no
 memories and mercenaries with no past s
eem to gather. Dione’s graceful dancing 
enthralls all who see her. The goddess lau
ghs at how thoroughly she captivates the 
audience as she continues her dance.

accessory.name: Crimson Slasher
accessory.detail: Cheap human jewelry a friend gave to her. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Dione, World Goddess
story:
Dione the World Goddess 

The gods did not actually create this worl
d. They were born of soul fragments from
 the true creator, and they act as observe
rs. They were meant to use their apostles
 to keep balance, but Dione rejects this an
d simply enjoys the human world.

accessory.name: Crimson Slicer
accessory.detail: Received it after a farewell drink. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Natal
story:
Natal

Natal is an apostle of the land of Zipang a
nd the youngest of three sisters. She grew
 up happy among the gods and her sisters
, and truly enjoyed playing on earth. She h
oned her skills against the beasts of the f
orest as a youth spied on her from the tre
es.

accessory.name: Bear-Cat Ornament
accessory.detail: One ornament, given by her two sisters. [5ef5f7]+100[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Natal, Blazing General
story:
Natal the Blazing General 

When Natal punched down the youth who
 called her "Master," she realized somethi
ng. During their fights, he was closing his
 eyes. She was taking the time to train him
, and this was how he repaid her? It was o
nly later she learned he had a phobia of w
omen.

accessory.name: Bear-Cat Ornament
accessory.detail: Still not sure if it's a bear or a cat. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Schelk
story:
Schelk

The Valley of Light, where the last of the 
dragon tribe live. Schelk was born there -
 heir to the king. It is said that humans an
d dragons lived together in that valley lon
g ago, and the conflict-hating Schelk long
s to realize that idea once more.

accessory.name: Wind Feathers
accessory.detail: The traditional charm made by her people. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Schelk, Wind Lord
story:
Schelk the Wind Lord

On that day, members of the dragon tribe
 gathered in the Valley of Light to celebra
te Schelk's 50th birthday. During the cele
brations, a girl was watching him from the
 shadow of her father, the head of the Wa
ter Valley Tribe. She was known as Luka.

accessory.name: Gale Feathers
accessory.detail: Made from baby dragon feathers; valuable. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Noa
story:
Noa

Head of the Military R&D Section. Capture
d by the military, she gave up freedom in 
exchange for a huge budget and subordin
ates on whom she could test weapons. Sh
e realized her fate, and after taking a long
 drag on her cigarette, she laughed at the
 irony.

accessory.name: Science Goggles
accessory.detail: Analyzes the makeup of the displayed object. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Noa, Invention Queen
story:
Noa the Invention Queen 

Once, she had dreamed of her inventions 
making the world a better place. Vehicles 
that would move around on their own or f
ly through the air like birds. Dreams that 
can never come true. Amid clouds of smok
e, Noa activates her ultimate weapon, V.

accessory.name: Science Visor
accessory.detail: Also can be used to shield from sunlight. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Draco
story:
Draco

Dracchi Diary Day 105.

I finally! Today! Yes! Caught up with Dracc
hi! His guard (protect) is always up, but I 
think the spring sunlight made him relax! 
This time... he won't get away!

name: Super Evil Spirit (HS)
story:
Super Evil Spirit (HS)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion / Huge Success[-]
A super evil spirit that for some reason ju
st broke bad. Works her wickedness when
 used as an enhancer to ensure huge succ
ess.

name: White Chocolate (Repay)
story:
White Chocolate (Repay)

[FF1493]Gift[-]
A spirit that makes the perfect return gift
, created when expressing gratitude to so
meone. It's a bit more milky than other sp
irits.

name: Spring Spirit (New Term)
story:
Spring Spirit (New Term)

[FF1493]New Semester (Evolution Fusion / Sale) [-]
A well-meaning spirit that shows up along
 with spring. It's a bit more excited than o
ther spirits.

name: Valtols
story:
Valtols

Valtols manages the Heavenly Realm wher
e the gods reside. The personification of r
ules and regulations, he seeks to realize t
he world desired by his master, the creato
r. As he aims for true perfection, he punis
hes all who stand in the way of that goal.

accessory.name: Headband of Pure Gold
accessory.detail: Made of pure gold, and will never decay. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Valtols, Sky God
story:
Valtols the Sky God 

Valtols allowed no imperfection in the Hea
venly Realm, sending all impurities back t
o the earth. That was his purpose, and tha
t was why he so desperately sought to tra
ck down and slay the Soul Vessel that had
 obtained a fragment of self-awareness.

accessory.name: Headband of Purity
accessory.detail: The stone has been flawlessly polished. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nefteria
story:
Nefteria

Nefteria was an extremely difficult apostle
 to handle. In the distant past, she was cre
ated alongside the Hell Queen to manage 
the souls of the world. It was only a matte
r of time before the lazy, rough Nefteria f
ell into slovenly ways.

accessory.name: Crystal of Cycles
accessory.detail: Valuable godly jewelry a friend gave to her. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Nefteria, Fallen One
story:
Nefteria the Fallen One

Giving up on the Heavenly Realm, Nefteria
 cast aside her position as an apostle and
 descended to earth. She didn't like leavin
g the Black and White apostles behind, bu
t the Hell Queen could look after them. It 
was then she found the nameless Soul Ve
ssel.

accessory.name: Necklace of Cycles
accessory.detail: Received after a farewell drink. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Frau
story:
Frau

Born with the legacy of her departed moth
er, it always rains around Frau. This preci
pitation is the perfect metaphor for her fe
elings of loneliness and isolation. One day
, from amid the rain, she suddenly hears “
his” voice.

accessory.name: Snail
accessory.detail: To be exact, a snail-shaped speaker. [5ef5f7]+100[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Frau, Rain Queen
story:
Frau the Rain Queen

O-6 Instruction Manual.

"He" is an aerial biological weapon. "He" i
s self aware.
*Be careful not to upset him.
"He" is powered by water.
"He" houses a dimensional transportation
 device.
"He" seeks to fulfill his purpose and...

accessory.name: Snail-Like Speaker
accessory.detail: Gives voice to the built-in AI's will. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Amaterasu
story:
Amaterasu

The Goddess Amaterasu watched over the
 land of Zipang. Considered a failure by ot
her gods, she actually liked its imperfectio
ns. This was not out of benevolence; rathe
r she saw it as a playground to satisfy her
 hedonism.

accessory.name: Flaming Souls
accessory.detail: One of many pieces of impure souls she owns. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Amaterasu, Goddess
story:
Amaterasu the Goddess

Amaterasu was keen to keep outsiders aw
ay from the land of Zipang. It was her play
ground, and hers alone. She proceeded to
 separate the land of Zipang from the outs
ide world by placing a Shrine in the easte
rn sea to be the only portal in or out.

accessory.name: Burning Souls
accessory.detail: If placed in a dead vessel, lives forever. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Beta
story:
Beta

Caution: Viewing, release prohibited.
Sealed Specs Source File: No.2082

.Title: The Destroyer Of Time

accessory.name: Time Core
accessory.detail: Controls time. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+1900[-] HP when also equipping Final Core. (Stack: N)

name: Beta, Time Weapon
story:
Beta the Time Weapon

The creator of the world also created a nu
mber of mechanical humanoids to assist in
 the task. They controlled matter, souls, h
earts, and time. The one responsible for t
ime was B-02, codenamed "Beta".

accessory.name: Time Core+
accessory.detail: Not of this world. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+2000[-] HP when also equipping Final Core. (Stack: N)

name: Life Spirit (MF)
story:
Life Spirit (MF)

[FF1493]Mega Fusion[-]
A spirit that represents the pinnacle of sc
ience, having been created artificially. Inc
reases the HP limit of the base unit when 
used as an enhancer in Mega Fusion.

name: Power Spirit (MF)
story:
Power Spirit (MF)

[FF1493]Mega Fusion[-]
A spirit that represents the pinnacle of sc
ience, having been created artificially. Inc
reases the Attack limit of the base unit wh
en used as an enhancer in Mega Fusion.

name: Healing Spirit (MF)
story:
Healing Spirit (MF)

[FF1493]Mega Fusion[-]
A spirit that represents the pinnacle of sc
ience, having been created artificially. Inc
reases the Recovery limit of the base unit
 when used as an enhancer in Mega Fusio
n.

name: Seyfried, Thief King
story:
Seyfried the Thief King 

When Seyfried awoke, his right eye was g
one. It was clear that the betrayer Eizel w
as the one who attacked them, seeking th
e eye he received from a female magician.
 It was unclear who had treated his arm, o
r where this ship's cabin-like space was lo
cated.

accessory.name: Evil Dragon Veil+
accessory.detail: The blood's pure scent draws the Evil Dragon. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Brunhilde, Sun General
story:
Brunhilde the Sun General 

Brunhilde was a faithful apostle. She obey
ed the gods without question, even if it m
eant her great pain. That was simply to de
ceive them, and it ultimately enabled her 
to sink her fangs deep into their exposed 
throats.

accessory.name: Bared Fangs+
accessory.detail: The time comes, and she bares her fangs. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Amagi, Shaded King
story:
Amagi the Shaded King

Amagi struggles with his identity; is he m
ale or female? Is there any unification bet
ween his heart and mind? He first felt the
 woman inside him stir when he met a cer
tain man in his youth. Now fighting alongs
ide him, they turn on the gods together.

accessory.name: Girdle of Duality+
accessory.detail: One then slowly turns into an Imperial tool. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Maxwell, Ancient
story:
The Ancient Maxwell

Maxwell has finally worked out how to era
dicate the true Observer, and hurries to im
part this to the Forbidden Library. He care
fully avoids the eyes of the dragons and O
bserver's spies, but his trust in his partne
r of many years - a bird - is his downfall.

accessory.name: Crying Bird+
accessory.detail: Has grown so heavy as to feel crushing. [5ef5f7]+700[-] RE [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Yamato, Raging God
story:
Yamato the Raging God 

The land of Zipang was enveloped in the f
lames of conflict between the Regime and
 the Rebels. Yamato, head of the Rebels, b
urns with rage to avenge his father who w
as killed by the Regime and their ruler Am
agi.
cutin: All of you! Out my way!

accessory.name: Glittering Pipe+
accessory.detail: You took my Pa's life! Here's my revenge! [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Valzark, Water Dragon
story:
Valzark the Water Dragon 

Valzark is now fully aware that he's a vess
el of the gods, and that living heartless is
 the key to being a good one. He has done
 so for thousands of years, but was it the 
right choice? With everything now in ruin
s, he has no way of ever knowing.

accessory.name: Core of Blue Dreams+
accessory.detail: It is driven only by its programmed duty. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Karma, Compassion
story:
Karma the Compassion Queen 

When Karma awoke, Seyfried was standing
 in front of her. He had single-handedly p
rotected her from the enemy forces at the
 cost of his arm, an eye, and... Karma held
 him in her trembling arms and gave a futi
le, voiceless scream.

accessory.name: Tragic Binder+
accessory.detail: Those who tie it must do it blindfolded. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK, Ups chain bonus, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Empress Isabella
story:
Empress Isabella

Isabella grew irritated with her plan. She 
succeeded in getting Maria's father infect
ed with the Dragoturn Sickness, but Maria
 proved too strong of heart, holding on as
 the heir to the throne. She decided to tur
n to her backup plan, obtaining the Evil D
ragon's Eye.

accessory.name: Demonic Shell+
accessory.detail: Inside the shell is a deep, endless abyss. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Matilda
story:
Matilda 

There is said to be a ship that sails on the
 desert. It's name, the "Lost Blonde." Crew
ed by fearless scum who steal, pillage and
 trade in slaves across the vast desert san
ds - it's final resting place of the terrible 
sand pirate, Matilda Blonde.

accessory.name: Desert Mirage
accessory.detail: A model of the Lost Blonde, in a bottle. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Matilda, Desert Raider
story:
Matilda the Desert Raider

That pretty much covers it, she laughs as 
she hears of her reputation in the outside
 world. Her thieving was simply to feed all
 the child slaves that she rescued. She ha
s no intention of letting this be her final r
esting place.

accessory.name: Desert Mirage+
accessory.detail: Today it lies at the bottom of the ocean. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Beta type-A
story:
The Weapon Beta type-A

Who is the Creator? Noa began investigat
ing ancient ruins to find out. In the proces
s, she discovered a stash of over 1,000 an
cient, humanoid weapons. She was shocke
d to discover there were also thousands o
f slain dragons decaying near them.

accessory.name: Standard Core
accessory.detail: The core of a weapon that controls time. [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dragons,[5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Beta type-A, MP Weapon
story:
Beta type-A the MP Weapon 

Investigations revealed that the weapons 
found in the ancient ruins were mass-prod
uced units called “Beta.” Noa succeeded
 in repairing one of them, but there was s
till no explanation about the damage caus
ed by a battle between dragons and these
 weapons.

accessory.name: Standard Core+
accessory.detail: Very breakable and hollow inside. [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dragons, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Leena
story:
Leena

A magic lancer who leads the Shadow Dra
gons, a faction of the Fire Dragons led by
 Lisha. They grew up together and were fr
iends in school, but that bond was abrupt
ly sundered by the shadow resistance.

name: Lucy
story:
Lucy

The youngest of the three sisters searchin
g for the same special book. Their failure 
to find the Forbidden Library has caused t
hem much grief. Suddenly, a purple drago
n appears before them. For a certain favor
 it promises to take them there.

name: Corona, Thunder Maiden
story:
Corona the Thunder Maiden

There are lots of magicians like me who ti
nker with machinery, laughed Rosa. It had
 been half a year since Corona arrived in t
his time. Politan was gradually being repa
ired, and the Storm Day upon which Coron
a would return to the future drew near.

name: Spirit Flier (Growth)
story:
Spirit Flier (Growth)

[FF1493]Level-Up / Evolution Fusion[-]
A listless spirit that can be found floating
 above the roofs of many houses. Easily g
ets caught up and blown away.

name: Chroma
story:
Chroma

Afflicted with a disease that turns humans
 into dragons, Chroma was abandoned and
 rejected by her parents, the orphanage, a
nd even the place where all outcasts dwel
l. She collapsed in the cold, snowy woods
 - unable to carry on.

accessory.name: Black Wing Headband
accessory.detail: Exacerbates the effect of dragonization. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Chroma Finstar
story:
Chroma Finstar

Chroma began to feel warmth again, but s
he stiffened when she realized her predic
ament. The creature warming and protecti
ng her was undoubtedly a dragon. She tri
ed to flee, but heard a gentle, soothing vo
ice. The dragon introduced himself as Sig
mund.

accessory.name: Black Wing Headband+
accessory.detail: Human? Dragon? Or will she choose both?[5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Alicia
story:
Alicia

Alicia lost her parents and brothers when
 a dragon burned her village. She was take
n in by distant relatives and became mute
. Living much of her childhood with little h
uman contact, she was placed in an orpha
nage where she met a certain female knig
ht.

accessory.name: Candy Bow
accessory.detail: A bow formed into the shape of a candy. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Alicia Brant
story:
Alicia Brant

A year passed since she met Phyllis and b
ecame inspired by her. The tomboy, Alicia
, was returning to her old energetic self. O
ne day, she was to meet Phyllis for their s
pear training, but deep into the night, she
 realized her friend wasn’t coming…

accessory.name: Candy Bow+
accessory.detail: A young Alicia got it from her mother. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kyte
story:
Kyte

A bard who took up the vocation of passin
g the true history of each region’s storie
s and customs, Kyte has uncovered incons
istent causes, motives, and conclusions in
 common legends. Unbeknownst to him, h
is investigations are leading him to an ear
ly demise.

accessory.name: Writer's Hat
accessory.detail: Passed from father to son for generations. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Kyte Shutral
story:
Kyte Shutral

As Kyte continued his research into the le
gends and stories, he came across a distu
rbing trend. None of the rewritten history
 contained outright lies, but many depictio
ns of events were clearly twisted with ill i
ntent.

accessory.name: Writer's Hat+
accessory.detail: Time has been kind; it is in good condition. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nicola
story:
Nicola

An alchemist serving the kingdom, Nicola 
was a leader in the cutting-edge field of c
reating something from nothing. Living wi
th his loving wife and child and working in
 a captivating field should have made him 
happy, yet he felt something was missing.

accessory.name: Flask of Wandering
accessory.detail: Guides one towards one's desires. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Nicola Raygan
story:
Nicola Raygan

Nicola’s wife died after collapsing in the
ir home, her young life burning out. He lo
st his son as well when the boy went to se
e and never returned. Nicola grieved for n
either, and half a year later succeeded in 
creating a human soul from nothing.

accessory.name: Flask of Wandering+
accessory.detail: An alchemist friend once gave it to him. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alice
story:
Alice

I have fallen sick.
A rabbit dropped on you.
My dream.
The cards are burning.
A spear pierces me.
But that isn't me.
I am Alice.
You are Alice.

accessory.name: Joker of Deception
accessory.detail: A lie that eventually becomes the truth. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alice, Fallen Queen
story:
Alice the Fallen Queen 

Judging by the above symptoms, meeting 
her soul-copy caused Alice to have a men
tal break or possibly trade her sense of se
lf.  Though this is an extremely rare case, 
security on the texts in question must be 
improved in future.
Report by: Chrono Paladin

accessory.name: Joker of Deception+
accessory.detail: The self burns; the lying heart remains. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Simone
story:
Simone

Simone was an assassin in the group dedi
cated to wiping out the Sinners, abnormal
s and beast men. The group was comprise
d of Sinners, so any who finished their “s
entence” were fated to be killed. In this t
wisted system, Simone’s next target - he
r next love - was set.

accessory.name: Love Poison
accessory.detail: A poison that robs one of one's body control. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK..

name: Simone, Love Queen
story:
Simone the Love Queen 

Simone loved all her targets. She showed
 it by injecting them with a deadly poison 
from her special needle lance and placing
 them in a vat filled with embalming agent
s to keep them forever. The Execution Kin
g escaped that fate by hiding from her gro
up.

accessory.name: Love Poison+
accessory.detail: The poison is applied from mouth to mouth. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK..

name: Don Polta
story:
Don Polta

Legendary gunman, Don Polta. With few r
ecords of his life, it’s unclear if he even 
existed. In a tall tale, he was said to have 
shot a dragon between the eyes from an i
mpossible distance. In another, he bested
 a Samurai from the land of Zipang. (01)

accessory.name: Wild Rooster
accessory.detail: Tipple of choice for outlaws of the West. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Don Polta, Westen King
story:
Don Polta the Western King

Those are all the Don Polta tales I know. A
fter the last one, “Duel at Midnight,” it’
s not really clear what happened to him. S
ome say he still travels with Marianne, bu
t no one knows for sure. Still, I enjoy thes
e legends during my own travels. (10)

accessory.name: Wild Rooster+
accessory.detail: Goes well with cigars made in the West. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Valk
story:
Valk

Valk was the last of a long, ill-fated blood
line. His family used curses, but it was the
ir creation of Revival Juju which led to the
ir downfall. This forbidden magic could bi
nd souls of the dead to a special stone an
d restore life in this world.

accessory.name: Sapling of Binding
accessory.detail: An ancestral heirloom made from cursed wood. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Valk, Juju King
story:
Valk the Juju King

Over 10 years since Valk boarded the des
ert runner, “Lost Blonde,” the ship sails
 through the desert with Valk, two men an
d two women alive onboard. The rest of th
e crew, its female captain, and a large swo
rd-wielder are all corpses Valk reanimated
.

accessory.name: Sapling of Binding+
accessory.detail: The living wood has born rock-like fruit. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Ancient Spirit
story:
Ancient Spirit

[FF1493]Level-up/Evolution Fusion[-]
An ancient and by now very dated spirit.

name: Super Ancient Spirit
story:
Super Ancient Spirit

[FF1493]Level-up / Evolution Fusion[-]
A super ancient and by now super dated s
pirit.

name: Divine Spirit
story:
Divine Spirit

The Divine Spirit had been on a lengthy jo
urney. Its apostles all left, but it continue
d alone. Eventually, the spirit ceased to m
ove. It forever slumbers in a distant land. 
With no name or memories, this fragment
 of life is no longer discussed.

name: Dione, Frontier Goddess
story:
Dione the Frontier Goddess 

Despite being a goddess, Dione had little 
interest in gods or apostles and viewed ex
istence as nothing more than predestined
 actions playing out. Her only friend was e
xecuted for defying the gods, so Dione fel
t saddened by her own divinity.

accessory.name: Crimson Slicer+
accessory.detail: The stone changes color with time. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Natal, Inferno General
story:
Natal the Inferno General 

Natal faced off against her goddess and m
aster. When asked the reason for the rebe
llion, she replied that it was no rebellion a
t all. Flames blazed as two apostles joined
 the goddess. Natal stoically prepared for
 the first fight she’d ever started.

accessory.name: Bear-Cat Ornament+
accessory.detail: She ties her hair, binding her resolve. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Schelk, Gale King
story:
Schelk the Gale King

The valley had begun to reclaim its former
 glory, but now it simply burned. The king
 was dead and the dragons' assault would
 surely spread. Schelk took up his late kin
g’s cause and bravely flew through the fl
ames to protect the other valleys.

accessory.name: Gale Feathers+
accessory.detail: One enters adulthood by making it oneself. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Noa, Creation Queen
story:
Noa the Creation Queen

Noa’s fears were misplaced. After being 
restored by scientists, the ultimate weapo
n, “V,” used its power to make the world
 a better place. That was one possible futu
re, but back in reality, with ash falling fro
m her bloody hand, Noa shut that dream a
way.

accessory.name: Science Visor+
accessory.detail: Also has a function for dating objects. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Valtols, Heaven God
story:
Valtols the Heaven God

At the Heavenly Round Table, high above 
Babel, Valtols and the other gods listened
 to the apostle’s report on the Eastern R
ealm. It seemed as though the gods were 
unable to hold back these “outcasts,” an
d it was only a matter of time before Babe
l fell.

accessory.name: Headband of Purity+
accessory.detail: A godly symbol that attracts no dirt. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nefteria, Fallen Major
story:
Nefteria the Fallen Major

With the power to mimic souls, Nefteria p
rotected the Soul Vessel in battles agains
t the gods. Her wounds proved fatal, and 
in the end, she cried the name of the Soul
 Vessel. Holding it tightly for one last time
, she passed on her power and her last wo
rds.

accessory.name: Necklace of Cycles+
accessory.detail: It shines forever, repeating the cycle. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Frau, Monsoon Queen
story:
Frau the Monsoon Queen

Frau was of the age of darkness and desti
ned to destroy the ancient weapon the O 
- 6 referred to as “V.” While the O - 6 re
fueled, Frau stroked his smooth body. Am
idst that terrible downpour, their final bat
tle across time had finally begun.

accessory.name: Snail-Like Speaker+
accessory.detail: Made from live parts, so technically alive. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Amaterasu, Fire Goddess
story:
Amaterasu the Fire Goddess 

As her apostles (her three sisters) argued
, Amaterasu enacted the rite to destroy th
e land of Zipang. They turned on the gods
, so she would lay waste to them. As she w
as about to finish, an arrow flew past her.
 Smiling in rage, she knew who fired it.

accessory.name: Burning Souls+
accessory.detail: The people call such vessels "disciples."[5ef5f7]+600[-] RE [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Hilde
story:
Hilde

Growing up in Babel, the home of the god
s, Hilde watched her swordsmith father. T
hough she tried making many weapons, sh
e could never craft one that pleased her. T
hen, she learned of the Eastern Realm, he
r father’s homeland.

accessory.name: Smith's Seal
accessory.detail: The seal pressed into the works of a smith. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Hilde, Forge Queen
story:
Hilde the Forge Queen 

Her late father often spoke of an ore that 
could absorb the soul of whoever touched
 it and would change its shape accordingl
y. The power to craft a weapon that could
 perfectly suit its user, this was the goal t
hat drove Hilde to the Eastern Realm.

accessory.name: Smith's Seal+
accessory.detail: Her father's pride and joy, and now hers. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Rindo
story:
Rindo

Raised as a female ninja (a kunoichi), Rind
o was a highly talented warrior whose skil
l only increased with age. Despite this, he
r pride was crushed when a young ninja a
