rrived from a village that had been razed b
y dragons. His name was Zero.

accessory.name: Gentian Flower
accessory.detail: Received from Zero on the day they parted. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Rindo, Covert Queen
story:
Rindo the Covert Queen 

Her natural talent and diligent training, co
upled with the ability to calmly finish any 
mission, made Rindo the ultimate ninja. E
arning the complete trust of the king, her
 reputation led to her worst mission: to de
feat her childhood friend Zero.

accessory.name: Gentian Flower+
accessory.detail: Different paths, both paved with purpose. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Aria
story:
Aria

Born to a line of legendary ancestors, Aria
 trained hard to take over her father’s ro
le of Knight Captain and defend the count
ry. A leader of men despite her age, she t
aught the “come back in one piece” mot
to and cut all who could not endure her tr
aining.

accessory.name: Mask of Darkness
accessory.detail: Symbol of a firm heart and determined will. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] HP..

name: Aria, Crimson Lotus
story:
Aria the Crimson Lotus 

Known as the Crimson Lotus, Aria scorche
d through the battlefield as an unstoppab
le flame. This power led to her assignmen
t to defeat the First Dragon. She promised
 her crying brother she’d return in one p
iece. It was the final promise between the
 two.

accessory.name: Mask of Darkness+
accessory.detail: Soon, the fire burning behind it shall die. [5ef5f7]+1250[-] ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] HP..

name: Johnny
story:
Johnny

Johnny the Metal Strings - that was his na
me. He was a smug showoff and impossibl
e to reign in once he got angry or upset. T
he long range rifle built into his guitar ne
ver let a target escape, but that wasn't th
e only ace up Johnny's sleeve. (04)

accessory.name: Metal Strings
accessory.detail: The suit is mightier than the gun. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK & REC.

name: Johnny, Duel King
story:
Johnny the Duel King 

Caught off guard, Johnny was at a disadva
ntage. The duel suddenly broke out in the
 middle of town, and Don took out Johnny
’s good arm. Don was quicker, but as his
 name suggested, “Metal Strings” wore 
a protective wire suit that deflected Don’
s shot. (08)

accessory.name: Metal Strings+
accessory.detail: An eye for an eye, and a gun for a gun. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK & REC..

name: Faust
story:
Faust

Faust had not heard from his fellow alche
mist friend since the tragic death of that f
riend’s wife and child six months earlier.
 After hearing rumors that his friend mana
ged to create souls, Faust hurried to see h
im, but saw a new evil was already born.

accessory.name: Rosary of Impurity
accessory.detail: The other half of a certain object. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Faust, Evil King
story:
Faust the Evil King 

Having consumed 100 souls, he craved mo
re as he left the decimated village. Growin
g stronger, and wiser as he ate, Faust mov
ed eagerly to the next village - his next m
eal. No longer Faust, he had become Cthu
lu, the Supreme Glutton and evil incarnate
.

accessory.name: Rosary of Impurity+
accessory.detail: Sin had twisted love into a distorted form. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Kylt
story:
Kylt

The young assistant to the head magician
 of the Magical Sciences Factory, Kylt was
 given permission to research his sister’s
 disease. There were just two conditions: 
he must clean the factory each day, and h
e must not enter a certain room.

accessory.name: Spellcraft Remedy
accessory.detail: Medicine made through spellcraft. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Kylt Blitz
story:
Kylt Blitz

Kylt managed to stockpile medicine for hi
s sister, but he noticed that his boss had 
been missing for weeks. She was normally
 quite overbearing, so he grew worried by
 her absence. One day, Kylt learned that t
he knights of the kingdom had arrested he
r.
cutin: I will heal her one day.
I will heal her one day.

accessory.name: Spellcraft Remedy+
accessory.detail: Treats a malady caused by a certain flower. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Meril
story:
Meril

Vowing to forgo all sin, Meril became a nu
n in the convent near her hometown. She 
underwent severe training that drew bloo
d and tears each day to atone for her dark
, secret sin. When the other nuns visited t
he village, they returned pale and shaken.

accessory.name: Rosary of Penance
accessory.detail: Used to admonish and punish oneself. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Meril Grencher
story:
Meril Grencher

Hearing the terrible news, Meril rushed to
 the village. She saw nothing but the rema
ins of villagers. A chill ran down her spine
 as a laugh rang out behind her. She turne
d to find a horrid thing which resembled h
er beloved brother. Meril readied her lanc
e.

accessory.name: Rosary of Penance+
accessory.detail: Emotions, though bound, cannot change. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Leo
story:
Leo

He was close to death. Close enough to fo
rget he was straving, thirsty, and alive. Le
ft in the desert, he didn’t curse his fate, 
just one person. As consciousness faded, 
he began to hallucinate. He saw a large sh
ip sailing the desert and moving toward h
im.

accessory.name: Polar Bear Bag
accessory.detail: A precious doll given to him when picked up. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Leo Catastrophe
story:
Leo Catastrophe

About a year passed since Leo was picked
 up by the Lost Blonde. His trip across the
 desert with the captain and her crew invi
gorated him. One day, the ship was in upr
oar as a swordsman and young girl came a
board. When Leo saw her, deep feelings s
tirred.

accessory.name: Polar Bear Bag+
accessory.detail: Hidden inside are some important things. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Bonny
story:
Bonny

Today, tomorrow, every so often, fun and 
smiles! Super transform into a charming g
irl! No one escapes me! I’ll chase you to 
the ends of the earth, finish you off, and p
eel your skin. I won’t waste a drop of blo
od. I am the magical girl, Pretty Witch!

accessory.name: Flitting Partner
accessory.detail: This strange creature is her producer. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Bonny the Witch
story:
Bonny the Witch

Today, yesterday, fun and hugs! Dazzling 
transformation into a cute girl! No one es
cape me! I’ll shoot your arms and legs th
en string you up to flay your skin! I’ll ba
the in a shower of your blood. I’m the ma
gical honey, Pretty Witch!

accessory.name: Flitting Partner+
accessory.detail: Provides outfits and general direction. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Fire Ghost
story:
Fire Ghost

[Lost Records of a Nameless Knight]
The knight faced off against the dragon ev
en as his allies lay dead around him. His h
ands shook as he gripped his blade. Win, 
live, flee, or beg - whatever the choice, th
e massive dragon was unlikely to accept it
.

name: Fire Wraith
story:
Fire Wraith

[Lost Records of a Nameless Swordsman]
The swordsman had a fine future with a po
sition of esteem among knights, a beautif
ul wife, talented children, and peaceful tw
ilight years. He passed blissfully in his sle
ep, an average life now at its end.

name: Fire Specter
story:
Fire Specter

[Lost Records of a Nameless Warrior]
Feeling warmth, the warrior woke up- sur
prised to be alive. His cave was hot and st
eamy with spongy walls. Amid the acrid st
ench, the warrior steeled himself and pus
hed on. Time stood still in the dragon’s s
tomach.

name: Water Ghost
story:
Water Ghost

 [Lost Records of a Nameless Sailor]
A lone boat drifted in the vast sea. Its sail
or had a map, telescope, and oar. A bird la
nded on the oar, and the vessel shifted sl
ightly. It had been five days since the sail
or moved. The boat is still out there.

name: Water Wraith
story:
Water Wraith

[Lost Records of a Nameless Soldier]
Foul air blew into his face. He completely 
locked up, his sight transfixed on a single
 point. Sweat slid down his face - no, tear
s. “Mother, father, I’m sorry.” The drag
on’s massive jaws opened before him.

name: Water Specter
story:
Water Specter

[Lost Records of a Nameless Investigator]
An injury robbed him of sight, and his alli
es fled. Hearing only the dragon’s footst
eps and roars, he ran through the grass g
uided by his ears. Thunder boomed, and t
hen there was nothing- aside from the clif
f.

name: Light Ghost
story:
Light Ghost

[Lost Records of a Nameless Guardsman]
The castle was impregnable. Foreign trade
rs and emissaries were denied entrance. T
he gates were welded from the outside. V
oices could be heard- the shouts of peopl
e unable to flee from the dragons inside.

name: Light Wraith
story:
Light Wraith

[Lost Records of a Nameless Noble]
What did I do wrong? Nothing! I did nothi
ng wrong! I made no mistake! If I did not m
ake the decision right then, then I would h
ave been eaten by the dragon too! I did no
thing wrong!
The noble's pleas fell on deaf ears.

name: Light Specter
story:
Light Specter

[Lost Records of a Nameless Soldier]
The soldier had a wife. "Nice day." No rep
ly. "Why don't you go out for a change?" H
e brushed her hair, and a few strands fell 
off. "I might be late today." The cracked e
yes gazed out emptily. "Well, bye." No rep
ly.

name: Dark Ghost
story:
Dark Ghost

[Lost Records of a Nameless Straggler]
The other defeated stragglers scattered. H
e had been without sustenance for days w
hen he spied the village. He moved toward
 it with glee, but he was unable to escape
 the jaws of the dragon clamped around h
is waist.

name: Dark Wraith
story:
Dark Wraith

[Lost Records of a Nameless Peasant]
Talk about bad luck! I was running an erra
nd and took a shortcut. There happened t
o be a dragon in the forest, so that becam
e my body’s final resting place. I suppos
e the animals gobbled it up by now.

name: Dark Specter
story:
Dark Specter

[Lost Records of a Nameless Hill Guard]
She watched the blizzard rage until the gr
ound beneath her collapsed. She was luck
y to avoid injury, and since the cave was w
armer than the outside, she settled in for 
a nap. It was always warm in a dragon’s n
est.

name: Inferno Apparition
story:
Inferno Apparition

[Records of a Forgotten Hero]
This hero led a thousand knights who wou
ld defend him. He pushed on toward the m
ountain of fire - the peak where the drago
n dwelt- then he heard the growl. Looking
 back to his men, he saw the light fade fro
m 2,000 eyes.

name: Inferno Legend
story:
Inferno Legend

[Forgotten Memory I]
These are the memories from a wide rang
e of forgotten spirits. I am collecting and 
collating them. Yes, I ask - I question - Int
o the gaps between memories. Yes, I am t
he tower to which all souls are led.

name: Whirlpool Apparition
story:
Whirlpool Apparition

[Records of a Forgotten Sage]
Day 1: Arrived on vacant island. Leg, injur
ed.
Day 5: Food and water ran out.
Day 10: Dragon ate my left arm.
Day 18: The gangrene is bad. My fever is 
burning hot.
Day 36: The pain. Help me. Burning.
Day 39: [illegible].

name: Whirlpool Legend
story:
Whirlpool Legend

[Forgotten Memory II]
However great the individual, all are equa
l in death. The wise lose their wisdom, and
 the strong fall to the stronger. All power 
ends. So I ask, "Who were you- what did y
ou do?" I am the tower of departed souls.

name: Sparkling Apparition
story:
Sparkling Apparition

[Records of a Forgotten Brave]
She wanted to be brave. Never straying fr
om the path of the righteous, she fought v
aliantly in all battles and earned a pile of 
medals. Just before her head was chewed
 off by a dragon, she saw the truth - she w
as nothing.

name: Sparkling Legend
story:
Sparkling Legend

[Forgotten Memory III]
She was beautiful. She was taller than me
, more worldly than me, more optimistic th
an me, more unfortunate than me, and die
d earlier than me. I explore my memories 
and wander through them. I am the Tower
 of Bound Souls.

name: Abyss Apparition
story:
Abyss Apparition

[Records of a Forgotten Ruler]
He ruled all. A girl whose father he killed 
shot his leg. A man whose wife he execute
d stabbed his belly. He was torn down by 
the citizens who hated him. At last, a drag
on he had captured closed in on him. He r
uled all.

name: Abyss Legend
story:
Abyss Legend

[Forgotten Memory IV]
The towers also dreamed. Warriors led to 
their doom. Heroes who learned they wer
e nothing at the end. Souls who lost their
 minds- forever trapped. The towers neve
r wake, but forever dream of records and 
memories.

name: A. the Chained Soul
story:
A. the Chained Soul

[A Knight's Last Memory]
She screams and throws herself in front o
f him; 
the frightened villagers plunge their weap
ons into her. He roars and draws his Holy
 Sword. I must stop him, she thinks, but it
 is too late--the light is fading from her ey
es.

name: A. the Eternal Soul
story:
A. the Eternal Soul

[Memories of the Distant Past]
Smiling, she watched him train. He grew s
tronger each day- already far taller than h
er. He had been just a boy until recently, 
and sometimes he still had that boyish sm
ile. If only that smile could remain forever
.

name: Gamma
story:
Gamma

Caution: Viewing/release prohibited.
Sealed Specs Source File: No. 2594

Title: The Ruler Of Human Minds

accessory.name: Mind Core
accessory.detail: Controls the mind. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC; [5ef5f7]+1900[-] REC when also equipping Final Core. (Stack: N)

name: Gamma, C. Weapon
story:
Gamma the Controlling Weapon

Everything made by the Creator had a sou
l. Dragons, beasts, plants- even the plane
t itself. Only humans lacked souls. They p
ossessed nothing resembling one. Instead
, they had a mind, and a weapon was crea
ted to control their use of it.

accessory.name: Mind Core+
accessory.detail: Very, very sensitive. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+2000[-] REC when also equipping Final Core. (Stack: N)

name: Withered Spirit
story:
Withered Spirit

[FF1493]Level Up / Evolution Fusion[-]
A slightly pitiful spirit that has been forgo
tten. A little less lucky than other spirits.

name: Lost Spirit
story:
Lost Spirit

[FF1493]Level Up / Evolution Fusion[-]
A suffering spirit that has somehow gotte
n lost. Has a poorer sense of direction tha
n other spirits.

name: Shultz
story:
Shultz

Shultz became a legend once he drew the
 Holy Sword, but he was unable to enjoy i
t since all of its past owners suffered viole
nt deaths. He spent each day in anxiety, a
nd perhaps sensing this, the Holy Sword c
hanged into a suit of armor that covered h
im.

accessory.name: Cotton Handkerchief
accessory.detail: Given by Isabella, and smooth to the touch. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Shultz, Cage Armor
story:
Shultz the Cage Armor 

Protected by his holy armor, Shultz regain
ed his confidence and achieved great thin
gs. He was eventually tasked with guardin
g the queen. The duty was such a high ho
nor, that he grew a bit anxious, but his ne
w mistress Isabella put his mind at ease.

accessory.name: Cotton Handkerchief+
accessory.detail: Kept in a drawer; has not been used once. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Loki
story:
Loki

Loki researched the Soul Chamber in Babe
l. Examining souls harvested by apostles a
nd those naturally consumed, he saw that
 purified souls returned to the world. Whe
ther they ended up in humans or somethin
g else depended on the will of the Creator
.

accessory.name: Soul-Reveal Lantern
accessory.detail: Sheds light on souls floating in the air. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: Loki, Spirit God
story:
Loki the Spirit God

Loki continued to research souls and the 
Soul Vessel which held them. As a result, 
he created a number of functional dolls, b
ut the sanctions placed on Loki stopped h
im from working on real souls. As he cons
idered his next move, the dolls came to lif
e.

accessory.name: Soul-Reveal Lantern+
accessory.detail: All souls caught in the light will perish. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: Vira
story:
Vira

Near a certain lake, beautiful singing rang
 out. The two sisters were in harmony with
 Vira’s music. She stopped to recover wh
en she met the pair. Vira thought humans
 to be vile and pointless, but as these sist
ers treated her wounds, her heart softene
d.

accessory.name: Jade Dragon Scales
accessory.detail: Only one jade dragon has ever existed. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Vira, Ice Jade Goddess
story:
Vira the Ice Jade Goddess 

He turned slowly to look at me.
"You crossed a forbidden line."
No, I haven't.
"You have had feelings for humans."
Yes.
"You are no longer one of the divine."
That might be the case.

And then the lance pierced Vira's chest.

accessory.name: Jade Dragon Scales+
accessory.detail: No regrets; the scales will glow forevermore. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Jacqueline
story:
Jacqueline 

Jacqueline was the ring-master of the Jac
k ‘o Lantern Circus, and she led them acr
oss the world- bringing joy to many. As sh
e did so, she sought out her long-lost par
ents. Though she looked like a young girl,
 she was the oldest member of the troupe
.

accessory.name: Pumpkin Invite
accessory.detail: Come one, come all to the great show! [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Jacqueline, Show Queen
story:
Jacqueline the Show Queen  

With hopes of finding info about her paren
ts in the Forbidden Library, Jacqueline bro
ught the Jack ‘o Lantern Circus to the ca
pital. As she walked with a girl from her tr
oupe, the girl’s crimson hair billowed ou
t suddenly. A sea of dragons flew overhea
d.

accessory.name: Pumpkin Invite+
accessory.detail: Tremble at the pumpkin demon Jack O'Lantern! [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Alphonse, Grieving King
story:
Alphonse the Grieving King 

A former prince who found happiness des
pite losing his name and rank. One mornin
g, he and his daughter visit the grave of h
is wife. There he prays for peace rather th
an revenge. This would be the last time. A
lphonse lifts his spear and moves on.

name: Alphonse,  Injured King
story:
Alphonse the Injured King 

Former prince Alphonse was kind and gen
tle. For the first time, his dragon-slaying 
lance took a human life. His former comm
ander, aide to the current king, lay at his 
feet. A spear in his own body, he hoped fo
r his daughter’s happiness as he fought 
on.

name: Homura
story:
Homura

The Four Divines of the land of Zipang we
re ordered by the First Emperor to kill eac
h other. Only Homura, defender of the sou
th, was pleased. She didn’t care about th
e other two, but her attention was fixed o
n her former partner, Phantom Fist Jikai.

name: Homura, Crimson Queen
story:
Homura the Crimson Queen 

In the lands of her old partner Jikai, Homu
ra sliced her way through his men. Reachi
ng his stronghold, she cleaned the blood 
from her sword and gazed about. Rememb
ering the past, she smiled. A leaf fell -swo
rd and fist clashed. Their death duel had b
egun.

name: Jikai
story:
Jikai

Jikai, defender of the east, received an un
expected order from the First Emperor. “
Each Divine must slay the others.” The la
nd of Zipang was thrown into chaos. Jikai 
calmly assessed the situation, and when t
roops reached his lands, he was ready to 
fight.
cutin: I won't go easy on ya!
I won't go easy on ya!

name: Jikai, Blue King
story:
Jikai the Blue King 

Eldritch Sword Homura sliced a bloody pa
th toward Jikai. Memories flooded back - t
hey fought dragons together. Known joint
ly as the Swords of Blue Flame, the irony 
of the current situation was not lost. He s
miled, a leaf fell, and sword clashed with f
ist.
cutin: One blow is all I need.
One blow is all I need.

name: Kinugasa
story:
Kinugasa

Kinugasa laughed. The fact the Divines ha
d to slay each other was cause enough, bu
t to hear that two were already killed by a
n unknown third party? Pathetic! He was 
pleased, but he knew he had to act - the o
ld veteran understood what was really hap
pening.

name: Kinugasa, White King
story:
Kinugasa the White King 

They had finally come to his lands. Kinuga
sa’s defense was perfect, and he waited 
with his bow drawn. He considered meetin
g with them. He was troubled by the empe
ror’s orders and the foreign visitors, but
 was excited to see the Swords of Blue Fla
me.

name: Himiko
story:
Himiko

Himiko could no longer see her future. Lo
oking over the battlefield, she realized th
at choosing the Divines was simply the sta
rt of “his” revenge. Only the remaining D
ivine would accompany him to the land of
 Zipang in that other realm. So it’s come
 to this…

name: Himiko, Dark Queen
story:
Himiko the Dark Queen

Star Queen and defender of the north, Him
iko saw a future where she and the Emper
or destroy a dragon. After helping him esc
ape to the new land, her vision changed a
nd she instead joined warriors to kill her E
mperor and prevent this new future she fe
ared.

name: Kotowari
story:
Kotowari

Kotowari lay dying. He rebelled against th
e First Empress’s order for all Empresse
s to slay each other and tried to stop it. H
e soon learned there was a great deity ag
ainst which none could stand- he prayed o
nly for peace and destruction.

name: Kotowari, First Emperor
story:
Kotowari the First Emperor

Kotowari awoke. The Star Queen had save
d his life and told him her vision about the
 end of the land of Zipang. All his emotion
 vanished-replaced by pure hatred of the 
gods. He took the name First Emperor and
 planned to bring vengeance to the land o
f Zipang.

name: Eternal Knight
story:
Eternal Knight

Last Thoughts of a King
A voice calls for him, and he awakens to fi
nd a knight in a mask. His right arm is use
less, and all he can do is look up at the kn
ight as snow trickles down his cheeks. The
 knight pulls the Holy Sword out of his ch
est.

name: Eternal Vow
story:
Eternal Vow

Distant Memories of a Boy
A voice calls for him, and he awakens to fi
nd his head cradled by the girl. His right a
rm hurts from his reckless fall. As warm te
ars fall from her eyes and trickle down his
 cheeks, he vows never to make her cry ag
ain.

name: Artemis
story:
Artemis

Caution: Viewing/release prohibited.
Sealed Specs Source File: No. 0352

Title: Controller of Cause and Effect

accessory.name: Mark of the Cycle
accessory.detail: A singularity in time controlled by Artemis. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Artemis, Goddess
story:
Artemis the Goddess

Ranked highest among the Observers who
 watch over the world, Artemis shared her
 findings with the gods. She also had the 
ability to give living things souls. Observi
ng and giving live made her rival the Crea
tor in power, so other gods sought to kill 
her.

accessory.name: Mark of the Cycle+
accessory.detail: Marks that which is observed, then ended. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Deus
story:
Deus

Caution: Viewing/release prohibited.
Sealed Specs Source File: No. 0010

Title: The Ruler of all Dragons

accessory.name: Dragonization Agent
accessory.detail: Transforms soul and flesh into a dragon. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dragons, Neutral enemies.

name: Deus, Wyrm God
story:
Deus the Wyrm God 

The god Deus was progenitor of all drago
ns thanks to the Dragonization power of h
is lance. Once pierced, crystals were injec
ted into a body that would transform it int
o a dragon. Appearing in the Age of Nothi
ng, he turned many species into dragons.

accessory.name: Dragonization Agent+
accessory.detail: To be a dragon is to live through penance. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dragons, Neutral enemies.

name: Ji'Ors
story:
Ji'Ors

Caution: Viewing/release prohibited.
Sealed Specs Source File: No. 0014

Title: The Ruler of Heaven
cutin: This is the will of god!
See the power of a god!
See the power of a god!

accessory.name: Wreath of Thunder
accessory.detail: The crown that controls the world. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ji'Ors, Ultimate God
story:
Ji'Ors the Ultimate God 

Ji’Ors dwelt in Babel, high in the land of 
gods. All who saw him were burned alive. 
He used his almighty power to rule both h
eaven and the lands below. He reduced th
e species of the earth by half and drove th
e remaining ones to the Eastern Realm.

accessory.name: Wreath of Thunder+
accessory.detail: Lightning for justice, laurel for blessing. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Fenris, Spear Beast
story:
Fenris the Spear Beast

Suffering great headaches, Fenris remaine
d lucid for just a few hours each day. This
 allowed “him” the freedom to “wound”
 the girl who could not heal. His desire fo
r this girl grew, and she knew she must st
op him. It was then, she discovered “her.
”

accessory.name: Moon Mementos++
accessory.detail: Pendant belonged to the Red Girl's mother. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Fenris, Holy Beast
story:
Fenris the Holy Beast 

Fenris starved. “He” was desperate to m
ake the girl his forever. He would control 
her through fear- a cold smile across his f
ace. Before he could do that, he needed to
 feed. Biting the flesh of the hunted drago
n, he wondered if she was eating properly
.

accessory.name: Moonlight Mementos++
accessory.detail: The pendant glows like her love for the girl. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Fenris, Evil Beast
story:
Fenris the Evil Beast 

Fenris wanted it. The most important thin
g to “her” was that Fenris and the blood
line continued. She respected the will of F
enris to protect the girl- for now. Eventua
lly “she” would become a problem when
 her deadly “maternal instincts” turned 
on her.

accessory.name: Shadow Mementos++
accessory.detail: The rag smolders like her anger at the girl. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Cthulu, Moon Eater
story:
Cthulu the Moon Eater

It was the night of the Twin Moons. The G
lutton Queen sat bathing in their light as 
the Sea Princess appeared. Having just ea
ten, she still hungered for her- cackling h
er strange, feline laugh. Long ago, two mo
ons lit the night sky. Now there is but one
.

accessory.name: Twin Blue Pendant++
accessory.detail: When its owner dies, it joins its twin. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Cthulu, Holy Eater
story:
Cthulu the Holy Eater

Maria was in disbelief. What would it take
 to satisfy this monster’s hunger? Cthulu
 had already eaten everything in sight. As
 the newspaper hawker shouted somethin
g about a “Devourer Dragon,” Cthulu on
ly smiled and muttered something under h
er breath.

accessory.name: Twin Moon Pendant++
accessory.detail: Outside, it seeks out its twin--unfulfilled. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Cthulu, Dragon Eater
story:
Cthulu the Dragon Eater

Cthulu wanted to eat that dragon-slaying 
knight. His soul was so appetizing, she lau
ghed. She was willing to break with her so
ul distributor’s restrictions for a taste. T
hen the “Devourer Dragon” and its “Ma
ster” appeared - laughing her same horri
d laugh.

accessory.name: Twin Shadow Pendant++
accessory.detail: Inside, it pushes its twin away--fearful. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Artorius, True Knight
story:
Artorius the True Knight 

Artorius gazed at the snowy sky. Alone, h
e defeated the First Dragon and stood con
templating the conflict between humans a
nd dragons. Nothing remained- no people
, no love. What was gained from his “just
ice?” As he pondered, a masked knight a
ppeared.

accessory.name: Memory of Solitude++
accessory.detail: Those days of eternal joy will never return. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Artorius, Flame Knight
story:
Artorius the Flame Knight

Walking in town, Artorius asked Alan the r
eason behind his justice. Alan replied tha
t justice requiring reason is no true justic
e. If reason is applied, justice becomes fa
lse- ultimately evil. With unfulfilled desire
 in his heart, Artorius followed Alan.

accessory.name: Abandoned Solitude++
accessory.detail: A king's memories, imprisoned and bound. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Artorius, Dragon Knight
story:
Artorius the Dragon Knight 

Suddenly, Artorius found himself in a vast
, dark library. A dragon girl -most likely h
is summoner- stood before him. She aske
d one question. This question denied him 
his justice and revealed that the battle be
tween humans and dragons had not yet en
ded.

accessory.name: Loathsome Solitude++
accessory.detail: A lonely man's memory, lost and forgotten. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Type Zero, Evil Dragon
story:
Type Zero the Evil Dragon

The last fell. With the Evil Dragon’s Eye,
 Type Zero destroyed all dragons in the la
nd of Zipang, but his body was already cru
mbling. “Let’s go back in spring,” his le
gs buckle. “The flowers,” he falls, “even
 your cooking…” - his life lost in the bree
ze.

accessory.name: Secret Medicine++
accessory.detail: Heals not one's self, but the other's heart. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Type Zero, Flame Demon
story:
Type Zero the Flame Demon 

Type Zero traveled with the girl he once s
aved. A result of her injuries, she never sm
iled. One day, he returned from a mission
 to find she prepared a meal. He ate (it wa
sn’t very good) and thanked her. She sm
iled - a summer memory he’d never forge
t.

accessory.name: Powerful Medicine++
accessory.detail: Cleanses stomach; may burn hole in stomach. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Type Zero, Tidal Snow
story:
Type Zero the Tidal Snow 

Type Zero rushed through the snow to the
 village besieged by a dragon. Most of the
 villagers already killed, the dragon prepa
red to devour one last victim. Type Zero d
ecapitated it and took the hand of the you
ng girl. A winter memory he’d never forg
et.

accessory.name: Agitating Medicine++
accessory.detail: Cleanses stomach; may cause memory loss. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Izanagi, Cooking God
story:
Izanagi the Cooking God

[A B Cs of Cooking]
Always keep your knife out of the face of 
guests.
Berate those who do not finish their meal
.
Cautiously allow guests to choose their ow
n meal.
Dare to be bold in the kitchen.
Every meal is a chance to prove yourself.

accessory.name: Mythic Topapo Stew++
accessory.detail: S is for sum, of all that goes into a meal. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Izanagi, Ring Eater
story:
Izanagi the Ring Eater

[FF1493][Ring Eater's Menu][-]
Beverage: Phosphorous Dragon's Blood
Stew: Dragon intestines in egg coating
Roast: Sea dragon sauté (head)
Broth: Spiced dragon bile
Sweet: Blade dragon's eyes

accessory.name: Clear Topapo Stew++
accessory.detail: T is for thanks. Show gratitude when eating. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Izanagi, Eldritch Eater
story:
Izanagi the Eldritch Eater 

[FF1493][Eldritch Eater's Banquet][-]
Starter: Assorted dragon scales
Soup: Cold volt-onion soup
Seafood: Fish dragon meuniere, with tiger
 leaves
Shorefood: Steamed crest bird
Main Dish: Bahammut hotplate
Dessert: Crispy dragon fritters

accessory.name: Murky Topapo Stew++
accessory.detail: Y is for yum, a good response to the meal. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Zetterman, Ultimate King
story:
Zetterman the Ultimate King 

* Side B
Bidding farewell to the shining fields
a heart that will forgive no evil!

Will crush evil dragons with the justice in 
his heart!
We love heroic Zetterman!

accessory.name: Field Guardian++
accessory.detail: Even the birds love this miracle worker! [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Zettershine
story:
Zettershine the Shine King 

[FF1493]Next week[-]
Zetterman has rescued the souls, putting 
an end to their endless limbo. The hopes 
of Mufis continue to light the way.

Zetterman will be back in "His Name is Sh
ine." Light makes shadow.

accessory.name: Morning Guardian++
accessory.detail: Another peaceful dawn arrives in the fields![5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Shadowzetter
story:
Shadowzetter, the Shade King 

[FF1493][Preview][-]

The rising shadow. The swallowed mind.
Mufis's plan starts to gain speed.

When overflowing malice explodes
danger closes in on Zetterman.

Next Episode "Fields of Darkness"
Shadow smothers the light.

accessory.name: Night Guardian++
accessory.detail: Another peaceful moon glows over the fields![5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: ASMK-2B, Machine God
story:
ASMK-2 Beta the Machine God 

Snow--knight--stopped--motion--lance--
stab--blood--call--voice--fades----

Failed to restore log data.

If you wish to attempt to recovery again
select [FF1493]"Close"[-].

accessory.name: Tarnished Tiara++
accessory.detail: The tiara will never shine again. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: ASMK-2S
story:
ASMK-2S the Machine Devil 

A human/machine weapon found by the Th
ird Corp. search team. It was flawless and
 powerful- with no history recorded in its 
circuits. It was rebooted without incident,
 but may lose control in battle. We will ne
ed to burn circuit pathways if this happen
s.

accessory.name: Burnt Tiara++
accessory.detail: The fires burned her flesh and memories. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: ASMK-2F
story:
ASMK-2F the Razing Machine 

Repeated burning of circuit pathways has
 damaged the machine. Once ranked S, it 
can no longer even be classified as F. We 
were unable to resolve the bug that reque
sted log data output and returned “error
.” In a few hours, it will be permanently d
ismantled.

accessory.name: Drowned Tiara++
accessory.detail: Deep in the darkness, her vow unfulfilled. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Anubis, Wraith Queen
story:
Anubis the Wraith Queen 

Anubis’s “Funeral God Strike” pierced 
the heart of the Empire. All functions ceas
ed, fires flared, and it screamed in death. 
Anubis knew the Empire would rise again,
 but next time they would not settle for th
e planet- they would instead aim for the g
ods.

accessory.name: Cat With No Name++
accessory.detail: Names bind us to our pasts. So, no name. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Anubis, Inferno Queen
story:
Anubis the Inferno Queen 

In the Age of Fire, warriors known as the 
“Crimson Gravediggers” fought in the fi
rst clash between humans and dragons. A
s the dragons lost ground, the gods sent 
forces to earth- Anubis among them. She 
calmly destroyed the warriors and other h
umans.

accessory.name: Cat With No Anger++
accessory.detail: Not once does the cat show signs of anger. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Anubis, Funeral Queen
story:
Anubis the Funeral Queen 

The Age of Water was one of purity and se
lflessness. The desire to put others’ nee
ds before one’s own was rooted in the so
uls of this age. Had it continued, the worl
d would be quite different. A thousand ye
ars in this age vastly changed Anubis’s h
eart.

accessory.name: Cat With No Sadness++
accessory.detail: Not once does the cat show signs of sadness. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Grimdore, Beast Hunter
story:
Grimdore the Beast Hunter

In the lush forest, a lone beast slumped a
gainst a giant tree. Bleeding heavily from 
a gaping stomach wound, it smiled at the 
girl who was pointing a gun at it. Their fig
ht would end, but the wound it gave her w
ould remain. She pulled the trigger.

accessory.name: Red Hood of Hate++
accessory.detail: The blood of beasts dyes it even redder. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Grimdore, White Hunter
story:
Grimdore the White Hunter

She only remained human when the sun w
as up, but was unaware of this fact. Being
 pursued by the black hunter, the wounds
 she suffered, her nocturnal escape - thes
e were just dreams. Waking from them, sh
e set out for the black beast the next mor
ning.

accessory.name: White Hood of Hate++
accessory.detail: The Red Girl gave the White Beast a child. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Grimdore, Black Hunter
story:
Grimdore the Black Hunter

She only remained human when the moon
 was up, but was unaware of this fact. Bei
ng pursued by the white hunter, her bruis
es, her daylight tumble from the cliff- the
se were just dreams. Waking from them, s
he set out for the white beast the next eve
ning.

accessory.name: Black Hood of Hate++
accessory.detail: The Red Girl gave the Black Beast a child. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Liveia, Ocean Queen
story:
Liveia the Ocean Queen 

The past could never return. Hands grippi
ng her bow, the shaking ceased. Her obse
ssion with the past lead to her sister’s sa
crifice. Would she make the same mistake
- no, she’d come too far. With conviction
, she aimed at the target and loosed her a
rrow.

accessory.name: Dual Blue Pendant++
accessory.detail: When its owner dies, it joins its twin. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Liveia, Light Sea Queen
story:
Liveia the Light Sea Queen 

An old tale: There was a beautiful princes
s who continued to watch over the sea eve
n after death. Bringing light to the depths
, she guided ships to safety. When the ligh
t of man came to illuminate the sea, her d
uty was fulfilled and she rose to heaven.

accessory.name: Dual Light Pendant++
accessory.detail: A light on the ocean floor guides the soul. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Liveia, Dark Sea Queen
story:
Liveia the Dark Sea Queen

An old tale: There was a princess with a b
eautiful voice. Even after death, she sang 
from below the sea to lead the souls of th
e seafaring dead safely to the netherworld
. When less people died at sea, her duty w
as fulfilled and she entered the netherwor
ld.

accessory.name: Dual Dark Pendant++
accessory.detail: A shadow on the ocean floor calms the soul. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Mayu Hojo, Destroyer
story:
Mayu Hojo the Destroyer

Detecting a distress signal, Mayu Hojo rus
hed to its source. In that remote place, th
e signal was triggered, but she could not 
tell who had done so. It was too soon to g
ive up, so she flew off to the Empire to se
ek aid.

accessory.name: Mr. Skewer++
accessory.detail: In the future, cutesy masochism is the rage. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Mayu Hojo, Fire Proof
story:
Mayu Hojo the Fire Proof 

Mayu Hojo was at the mouth of the volcan
o which pumped toxic fumes into the air. H
er orders were to recover something from
 one of its burning craters. Gently placing
 a foot in the magma, her clothes burned o
ff, but her body was unharmed. She then d
ove in.

accessory.name: Mr. Burns++
accessory.detail: An autumn version of Mr. Skewer. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Mayu Hojo, Submerged
story:
The Submerged Mayu Hojo

Mayu Hojo had many orders from the futu
re involving the sea in this time period. Sh
e noted various species with many append
ages and even round-bodied dragons. Mo
ving past them, to the deepest, darkest de
pths, she found the sparkling jade item sh
e sought.

accessory.name: Mr. Dunkle++
accessory.detail: A summer version of Mr. Skewer. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Chrono, Time Emperor
story:
Chrono the Time Emperor 

Rain fell as Chrono aimed at her. She bore
 her needle lance at blazing speed. He fire
d- multiple shots hit, but she drove on un
til the spear pierced his belly. Before she 
could inject her poison, he pulled the spe
ar through and put his gun to her stomach
.

accessory.name: Chronos Machina++
accessory.detail: Also shows the year. [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dragons, Light enemies.

name: Chrono, Intruder King
story:
Chrono the Intruder King 

Chrono snuck into the Empire to find a ce
rtain text. Based in magical science and st
ronger than mankind’s older capital, this
 country could bring even dragons to heel
. That was why this text couldn’t fall into
 their hands, lest the future of the Sinners
 be doomed.

accessory.name: Chronos Ignis++
accessory.detail: Also shows the temperature. [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dragons, Water enemies.

name: Chrono, Infiltrator King
story:
Chrono the Infiltrator King

Chrono infiltrated the capital to find the F
orbidden Library where his old master, th
e Book King, lived. It was said that none c
ould find it, but his ally apparently had. H
e hurried to meet her at the rendezvous p
oint, but it was all part of her trap.

accessory.name: Chronos Aqua++
accessory.detail: Also resistant to water pressure. [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dragons, Fire enemies.

name: Velvet, Nightmare
story:
Velvet the Nightmare 

Velvet couldn’t believe her eyes. All the 
magicians in the Holy Kingdom were being
 possessed by the Glutton Queen’s soul.
 Strange, cat-like laughter rang out, and s
he awoke. It was nothing but a nightmare,
 but that feline laugh still echoed.

accessory.name: Veil of Penance++
accessory.detail: Penance has turned into eternal regret. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] RE [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Velvet, White Dream
story:
Velvet the White Dream

The Holy Kingdom fell. Ideia’s bold wits 
almost killed the Glutton Queen, but she a
nd Tactician Loretta (their creator) lived. M
ass-produced Glutton Queens escaped to 
the land below. Her mistress Ideia was de
ad, but Velvet lived on to finish their cont
ract.

accessory.name: Veil of Regret++
accessory.detail: A personal reminder for never forgetting. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] RE [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Velvet, Black Dream
story:
Velvet the Black Dream 

The age was growing dark. The human/dra
gon conflict cycle continued and Velvet fo
ught against the Glutton Queen. Killing 62
 copies, she had yet to find their creator. 
She almost thought her dead until she he
ard strange rumors of a dragon eating dra
gon, the Devourer Dragon.

accessory.name: Veil of Guilt++
accessory.detail: A personal reminder for never giving up. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Ideia, Liberator Queen
story:
Ideia the Liberator Queen

Ideia’s plan failed. The Glutton Queen’s
 soul, once trapped inside her, had escape
d into all magicians across the Holy Kingd
om. Thousands of Glutton Queens would b
e unleashed, so she could not hesitate. Sh
e made the call to destroy the Holy Kingd
om.

accessory.name: Blazing Memories++
accessory.detail: If the fire burns out, time will flow again. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Ideia, Light Demon
story:
Ideia the Light Demon

As the woman questioned her, Ideia’s mi
nd raced. What age was it- why was she h
ere- who was this woman?  It looked like 
she wouldn’t get answers any time soon,
 so Ideia started answering the woman’s
 questions- questions about “a spell to s
top time.”

accessory.name: Shining Memories++
accessory.detail: The visible fake fire; the remains of time. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ideia, Cunning Queen
story:
Ideia the Cunning Queen

It was all going according to plan. Since th
e Age of Water, her scheme to snatch the 
Glutton Queen was on track. After thousa
nds of years, they finally reached this age
. All she had to do was call her. Laughing 
like a cat, Mary walked toward her summo
ner.

accessory.name: Darkening Memories++
accessory.detail: The hidden dark fire; the imprisoned time. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Le Fay, Fairy of Light
story:
Le Fay the Fairy of Light

Le Fay watched over the girl. Daughter of
 the king and worthy of her station, she fe
ll sick. She was becoming a dragon, but sh
e pushed on- protecting people from the 
capital’s threat. She became the hope fo
r the world, but that hope was soon eclips
ed.

accessory.name: Band of Mischief++
accessory.detail: Smell of pansies is for harmless mischief. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] RE [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Le Fay, Fairy of Fire
story:
Le Fay the Fairy of Fire 

Le Fay watched over the boy. He had lost 
his precious sister, but he grew into a pow
erful knight to keep his promise to her. H
e finally prepared his allies to face down t
he calamity in the capital, but he would so
on be forced to make an impossible choic
e.

accessory.name: Band of Order++
accessory.detail: Smell of cosmoses is for order and peace. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Le Fay, Fairy of Water
story:
Le Fay the Fairy of Water 

Le Fay watched over the girl. She was the
 last of the dragon tribe and prophesied t
o take the capital. With her allies and inte
llect, she stopped the calamity and becam
e the new ruler. As darkness spread, the f
ate of the land rested on her decision.

accessory.name: Band of Innocence++
accessory.detail: Smell of lilies is for innocence and purity. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Yurika, Forbidden Tomes
story:
Yurika the Forbidden Tomes

Yurika came from nothing. She was an ido
l created from books and free from her Cr
eator. With freedom of thought and action
, she built the Forbidden Library to escap
e his gaze. This may have been his goal al
l along, but she believed it was her own p
lan.

accessory.name: Rainbow Pen++
accessory.detail: Has depicted many thoughts and lives. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Yurika, Flame Tomes
story:
Yurika the Flame Tomes 

Yurika wrote tomes on the Age of Fire, bu
t this became too difficult after a time. Sh
e ended up creating five copies of herself
, but perhaps because of her original pers
onality, they ended up leaving the manage
ment of those tomes to the spirits.
cutin: What did I do with it?
What did I do with it?

accessory.name: Red Rainbow Pen++
accessory.detail: Recorded the history of the Age of Fire. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Yurika, Dragon Tomes
story:
Yurika the Dragon Tomes

It was something that had to continue. Sh
e invited this girl to the Forbidden Library
 because of her attraction to the girl’s st
rong will. A temporary soul who lived thou
sands of years, Yurika’s time was ending
. Could this girl, Luka, take over for her?

accessory.name: Blue Rainbow Pen++
accessory.detail: Recorded the history of the Age of Water. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Blanche
story:
Blanche

[FF1493]GD7016 Month 76, Waterday[-]
At last, we fight the Heavens for the West
ern Realm they stole from us 7,000 years
 ago. But why, my Lord, must I escort this
 vile, black-hearted king into this battle fo
r which I have prepared myself for years?

accessory.name: Snow Rabbit Cap
accessory.detail: Worn to hide an old scar on her forehead. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK..

name: Blanche, Lady of Snow
story:
Blanche the Lady of the Snow

[FF1493]GD7017 Month 3, Waterday[-]
King Popol continues to distract me with h
is devilish thoughts and deeds. He was so
 kind as a child but, since losing his fathe
r, Babal, in the war against the Heavens 1
,000 years ago, he is a changed man.

accessory.name: Snow Rabbit Cap+
accessory.detail: The scar continues biting at her soul. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK..

name: Popol
story:
Popol

[FF1493]GD7016 Month 72, Fireday[-]
The House of Poplion has ruled the Easter
n Realm for centuries, and now we will fin
ally take back the Western Realm we lost 
to the Invaders from above 7,000 years ag
o. I will avenge my father and his ancesto
rs.

accessory.name: Blazing Stone
accessory.detail: The fire in the stone continues to burn. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC..

name: Popol, Conqueror
story:
Popol the Conqueror
[FF1493]GD7017 Month 5, Fireday[-]
The Western Realm the Invaders stole from
 us 7,000 years ago is now infested with d
ragons.
I hear the people there have ways to defe
at these dragons using souls--they may b
e just the allies we need.

accessory.name: Blazing Stone+
accessory.detail: The fire has not died since the Invasion. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] REC..

name: Demi Anubis
story:
Demi Anubis

[FF1493]GD5312 Month 38, Darkday[-]
For millennia, we have prepared to attack
 the Invaders in the Western Realm, and h
ere we are.
We have a Kingforce with us; neither the I
nvaders nor the House of Poplion can stop
 us.

name: Lilly
story:
Lilly

[FF1493]GD5682 Month 58, Waterday[-]
My big sister is strong, kind, and caring. W
hen that crybaby Popol cries, she's always
 there for him. Sometimes, I wish she'd ta
ke care of me in the same way, too, but it'
s okay. I'm tough enough on my own.

name: Lilly, Conspirator
story:
Lilly the Conspirator 

[FF1493]GD7018 Month 17, Waterday[-]
My sister...the king's bodyguard. I tried to
 prevent this. The time isn't right for them
 to be brought together. But, seeing as Fa
te has other plans, maybe I'll let this be a
nd hope for the best.

name: Pippi
story:
Pippi

[FF1493]GD7019 Month 62, Lightday[-]
The 8th Company can't seem to break thro
ugh the enemy lines, although our attacks
 do seem to have some impact on the Inva
ders. Some worrying reports about "drago
ns" destroying the entire 2nd Battalion. E
nd report.

name: Pippi, Flutist
story:
Pippi the the Flutist

[FF1493]GD7022 Month 77, Endday[-]
After a year of fighting, things don't look 
good. Casualties in the 8th Company have
 been low, but those dragons are more po
werful than we expected. We need help fro
m the Western Realm. End report.

name: Gil
story:
Gil

[FF1493]GD6006 Month 59, Fireday[-]
I'm so hungry. I haven't eaten in days. It's
 dark. I think I'm on a ship. Around me are
 others like me. I'm writing this in the moo
nlight coming in through a window. If I do
n't eat soon, I might never write again.

name: Gil, Pot-Crowned
story:
The Pot-Crowned Gil

[FF1493]GD7016 Month 76, Fireday[-]
I'm going off to fight those Invaders. Hear
d they stole the Western Realm from our a
ncestors years ago. Don't know who start
ed that fight, but I heard there's good stu
ff to eat there. That's all I needed to hear.

name: Mui
story:
Mui

[FF1493]GD5251 Month 48, Darkday[-]
I have decided to become a scholar, as sch
olars are very smart and highly knowledge
able. I shall be the top scholar and be the
 smartest of them all. 
I shall become a scholar and find a cure to
 my mother's illness.

name: Mui, Barefooted
story:
The Barefooted Mui 

[FF1493]GD ____ Month __, ___day[-]
Thank you, Mui. You are such a bright chil
d. I'm sure there's nothing you can't do. I
'm so proud of you, and reading your diar
y seems to have cured my illness! If you e
ver get out, live life the way you want to. 
For me.

name: Summer Spirit
story:
Summer Spirit  

[FF1493]Summer Special[-]
[FF1493](Leveling/Evolving)[-]
Beat the summer heat with this cool-looki
ng Spirit. Looks a lot more chilled out tha
n the other Spirits.

name: Belmont
story:
Belmont 

Belmont is a smart man who has solved m
any a difficult case, from the Case of the M
issing Queen to the Murder at Black Mist 
Castle. Although he has caught the culpri
t behind every case, it has  been at the ex
pense of the whole truth.

accessory.name: Notebook of Truth
accessory.detail: Only describes events from the past. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK..

name: Belmont, Falsifier
story:
Belmont the Falsifier

Within two seconds of getting a case, Belm
ont deduces the truth. But, it is the truth 
as he sees fit. And so, he protects the crim
inal and indicts the innocent. It is in his fi
nal case, the Dragon King Murder, that he
 meets his downfall.

accessory.name: Notebook of Truth+
accessory.detail: Nothing is written about the future. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP & ATK..

name: Jeanne
story:
Jeanne

Jeanne was both princess and commander
, elegant yet reckless, and the first to wie
ld the Holy Sword that has changed so mu
ch history over time. The weapon was not
 known by that name at the time, but the p
eople heralded Jeanne as a Saint.

accessory.name: Princess Ornament
accessory.detail: Inherited from her late mother. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP..

name: Saint Jeanne
story:
Saint Jeanne

Once again, Jeanne had sneaked out of th
e castle to head into town, panicking her 
faithful servants, Noir and Alain. This lack
 of pretension, of course, was why her peo
ple loved her so...but there are some in th
e castle who disapproved.

accessory.name: Princess Ornament+
accessory.detail: The white flower will soon be dyed deep red. [5ef5f7]+1400[-] HP..

name: Palma
story:
Palma

Palma is the only one of her race in the Ea
stern Realm. She and her family were ship
wrecked when she was a child, and she alo
ne made it here. But the people thought h
er an Invader and were about to execute h
er, when one man pardoned her: King Pop
ol.

accessory.name: Hunting Headdress
accessory.detail: A permit allowing her to live in the forest. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] REC..

name: Palma, Hunter
story:
Palma the Hunter 

Fourteen years after drifting to the Easter
n Realm, Palma spends her time in remote
 forests, hunting beasts many times her s
ize. Though pardoned by King Popol, the w
ary locals made it difficult for her to live a
mong them, and so she left.

accessory.name: Hunting Headdress+
accessory.detail: She often loses it during her hunts. [5ef5f7]+1250[-] ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] REC..

name: Gibbs
story:
Gibbs

Warrant No. 0037
Name: Gibbs the Jackal
Crime: Theft, assault
Gibbs and his brothers are partners in cri
me, but he is by far the more vicious of th
e 3. He is very likely a Visitor who came h
ere by sea with Zamerie the Abductor.

accessory.name: Ripper Notice
accessory.detail: Describes the acts of this Ripper. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK..

name: Gibbs, Slicer
story:
Gibbs the Slicer 

Warrant No. 0037 (New)
Name: Gibbs the Jackal
Crime: Murder, human trafficking, treason
The eldest of the Jackal Brothers, Gibbs in
vades homes in broad daylight to kidnap g
irls and sell them to Zamerie the Abducto
r.

accessory.name: Ripper Notice+
accessory.detail: All he did was try to free his two brothers. [5ef5f7]+1450[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK..

name: FAZ-06S
story:
FAZ-06S

Magic automatons are never given the abi
lity to think, as freedom of thought may e
ventually lead to revolt. The only exceptio
n are FAZ class automatons, which are pa
rt human; but the human elements are tak
en from former criminals.

accessory.name: Part No. 006
accessory.detail: Screws needed to link a soul to a machine. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] REC..

name: FAZ-06ST
story:
FAZ-06ST

Automaton FAZ-06S has been ordered to 
eliminate a runaway automaton. Its unit n
umber is HOJ-021D-- too low a class to h
ave a mind of its own. FAZ-06S deduces i
t could not have "run off" on its own, and 
sets out into the outside world to dig dee
per.

accessory.name: Part No. 006+
accessory.detail: Once removed, the soul disappears at once. [5ef5f7]+650[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] REC..

name: Kilma
story:
Kilma

[FF1493]GD4802 Month 21, Darkday[-]
I have discovered a power kept secret by 
the House of Babrios for centuries. This p
ower should finally give us an edge over t
hose insufferable Poplions. But first, I mu
st discuss this with Mother.

accessory.name: Secret Plan
accessory.detail: A top secret plan for "Pertinent Eyes Only." [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK..

name: Kilma the Solver
story:
Kilma the Solver

[FF1493]GD5902 Month 68, Darkday[-]
We have a solution that will rid us of thos
e Invaders, and now, a Kingforce as well. T
he chosen ones shall attack from the west
, and us from the east. But first, I must dis
cuss this with Mother one final time.

accessory.name: Secret Plan+
accessory.detail: To be enacted by those with the Kingforces. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK..

name: Demi Velvet
story:
Demi Velvet

[FF1493]GD5124 Month 25, Fireday[-]
I have acquired the power of a certain Gui
lty King; this must be one of the Kingforc
es. Even in the Western Realm, you will no
t find a better weapon against the Invader
s, or even these so-called dragons.

name: Vesper
story:
Vesper

Though not a Pureblood, Vesper's fanatic
al zeal has earned her command of
the 3rd Battalion of the Imperial Army. Th
e means by which she won her post have e
arned her much hatred. She does not care
; it does not affect her well-laid plans.

accessory.name: Torture Whip
accessory.detail: The hardest whippings won't wear it down. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [d9419a]-50[-] HP.

name: Vesper, Tortured
story:
The Tortured Vesper
A little girl begs by the road, her clothes r
agged and arms frail. People walk past he
r as if she doesn't exist. A loaf of bread is
 placed into her small hands. She looks up
 into the kindly gaze of a female soldier, w
ho then silently walks away.

accessory.name: Torture Whip+
accessory.detail: Screams of pain soon turn into ecstasy. [5ef5f7]+1150[-] ATK, [d9419a]-50[-] HP.

name: Schneider
story:
Schneider 

As supreme commander and leader of the
 elite Zero Battalion, Schneider is the mos
t powerful man in the Imperial Army. He w
as fated to lead by the blood he was born
 with; the blood that will make him sacrifi
ce all for his cause, even himself.

accessory.name: Empire's Future
accessory.detail: Filled with the blood of a certain person. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-50[-] ATK.

name: Emperor Schneider
story:
Emperor Schneider 

The gods once destroyed the Empire for d
aring to create the purest form of human:
 the Pureblood. But now, 2,000 years late
r, the Empire has rebuilt itself and reactiv
ated Schneider and the other Purebloods 
to seek out a certain book.

accessory.name: Empire's Future+
accessory.detail: Destruction nor defeat stops the zombie king. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] HP, [d9419a]-50[-] ATK.

name: Heu Risko
story:
Heu Risko

[FF1493]Introduction[-]
You have opened this book to discover wh
o I am, but even I do not know the answer
. Reading on will leave you none the wiser
. But, if you insist on continuing, you will 
find many trivial, irrefutable truths in thes
e pages.

accessory.name: A Certain Tome
accessory.detail: Depicts the world, from end to start. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-50[-] ATK.

name: Heu Risko, Writer
story:
Heu Risko the Writer 

[FF1493]Afterword[-]
Your guess is neither close nor far, and no
t even correct. I am simply a book woven t
hrough with words that do not tell a story
. For the weaver does not need a story; th
e words they weave speak for themselves
.

accessory.name: A Certain Tome+
accessory.detail: What is written is the world itself. [5ef5f7]+1250[-] REC, [d9419a]-50[-] ATK.

name: Garce
story:
Garce

Warrant No. 0295
Name: Garce the Jackal
Crime: Robbery, abduction
Garce, one of the feared Jackal Brothers, 
commits robberies with the help of his yo
unger brother Damus. Wanted dead or aliv
e.

name: Garce, Robber
story:
Garce the Robber

Warrant No. 0295 (New)
Name: Garce the Jackal
Crime: Murder, human trafficking, treason
Garce, one of the feared Jackal Brothers, 
is not as vicious as older brother Gibbs, b
ut he is the more skilled thief. Wanted dea
d or alive.

name: Damus
story:
Damus

Damus grew up listening to stories about 
the West from the tribal elder. He hoped t
o one day see the dragons and unique pla
nts and beasts that could not be found in 
the East. His wish came true, but in the m
ost tragic way possible.

name: Damus, Trickster
story:
Damus the Trickster

Warrant No. 0022 (Closed)
Name: Damus the Jackal
Crime: Murder, human trafficking, treason
Damus has been captured and will be beh
eaded in the coming days. We hope to cap
ture his two elder brothers soon.

name: Zamerie
story:
Zamerie

The A. Smith Trading Co., a crime syndica
te born in the West and raised in the East
, smuggles Dolls,  people, beasts, and dra
gons...and their body parts. One of the 5 D
ons is Rideau; and working under him is Z
amerie the Abductor.

name: Zamerie, Abductor
story:
Zamerie the Abductor 

The Empire's insatiable need for soldiers 
ensured that humanoids from the Eastern
 Realm fetched high prices. Zamerie was e
yeing the Royal Fangs, a tribe nearing ext
inction. They were trusting by nature; the
 job would be easy, Zamerie thought.

name: HOJ-021D
story:
HOJ-021D

[FF1493]The Laws of Robot Soldiers[-]
1. They may not disobey humans (excl. ou
tsiders).
2. They may not harm humans (excl. outsi
ders).
3. They may not defend themselves (repai
rs cost more than manufacturing).
4. They may not dream.
That is all.

name: HOJ-021DS
story:
HOJ-021DS

HOJ-021 opened its eyes. It was in a scra
p yard. Piled all around were lifeless robo
ts with identical faces to its own. A gravey
ard; so why was it moving? Suddenly, som
ething else occurred to it: It had acquired
 an identity.

name: Superbad Spirit
story:
Superbad Spirit

This Spirit has been forced into an outfit i
t never wanted, and is in a very bad mood
. It'll play a trick during fusion that will al
ways produce a Mega Success.

name: Stamina Spirit
story:
Stamina Spirit

[FF1493]For Stamina Recovery[-]
This somewhat optimistic Spirit has devel
oped an ability to cheer people on. Selling
 it will raise your Stamina by [FF1493]1[-].

name: Sumire Hasora
story:
Sumire Hasora

Two types of artificial soldiers exist in the
 future. One is entirely manmade; one is b
uilt from a dead human given life through
 machinery.
There are no longer any casualties in war,
 except for the battered souls of these ma
chines.

accessory.name: Part Oh Oh Six
accessory.detail: A part needed to link a heart to a machine. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK..

name: Sumire H., Steel Lady
story:
Sumire Hasora the Lady of Steel 

She continued destroying her kind withou
t emotion, unable to show any even if she
 tried. She wished she had never been bor
n.
But a message from the past from an HOJ
 class automaton gives Sumire a new reas
on to live: to battle history itself.

accessory.name: Part Oh Oh Six+
accessory.detail: If it breaks, the heart will disappear. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK..

name: Oswald
story:
Oswald

[FF1493]Doctor's Log 21[-]
Every day, patients are brought in with mi
ssing legs, eyes, heads, and even lives. I s
it them down in a row, examine them, and
 replace the parts they are missing from h
umans--and dragons and beasts, if I have 
to.

accessory.name: Surgeon's Knife
accessory.detail: A tool for stitching on missing parts. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] REC..

name: Oswald, Surgeon
story:
Oswald the Surgeon 

[FF1493]Doctor's Log 862[-]
A knight in blue armor came in with a brok
en Doll, asking me to fix her using his bod
y as a part. I did so, even if she will not liv
e long; she is a Doll, after all. Yet, she loo
ked so happy as she left my clinic.

accessory.name: Surgeon's Knife
accessory.detail: Saving patients while spattered in blood. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] REC..

name: Victor
story:
Victor

Fire Valley. The most advanced and milita
rized descendants of the dragon people li
ve here, led by young Queen Victor, leade
r of a dragon hunting team called Gurt. On
e day, she learns that dragons have attack
ed Light Valley, whose king is her friend.

accessory.name: Hunter's Earring
accessory.detail: A red dragon fang--the mark of the chief. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] REC..

name: Victor, Dragon Hunter
story:
Victor the Dragon Hunter 

What was once beautiful was now no more
 in the charred remains of Light Valley. Al
though Victor and the dragon hunters of G
urt slew the monsters responsible for this
 act, there was no sign of her friend or his
 people. Resigned, she moved on.

accessory.name: Hunter's Earring+
accessory.detail: Won it from her father in battle. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] REC..

name: Izanami
story:
Izanami

There is a legend of an island in the far ea
st inhabited by a single old woman. Her co
oking is said to bring fortune to all who p
artake of it. She feeds all who come to he
r, but on the condition they never watch h
er as she prepares their meal.

accessory.name: Secret Seasoning
accessory.detail: A spice that makes all food fit for the gods. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK..

name: Izanami, Seductress
story:
Izanami the Seductress 
A man once sought the old woman's cook
ing to bring further prosperity to his king
dom. As always, she obliged happily. He t
hen invited her to his castle and demande
d she prepare the food in front of his gue
sts. Again, she obliged.

accessory.name: Secret Seasoning+
accessory.detail: No one knows what it is made of. [5ef5f7]+1400[-] REC, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK..

name: Porun
story:
Porun

[FF1493]GD5555 Month 22, Lightday[-]
This object seems to be  known as an "ins
trument" in the Western Realm. It seems o
ne can use it to make "music" by stringing
 together sounds into what is called a "so
ng." All very complicated. Well, good nigh
t.

accessory.name: Musical Part
accessory.detail: Part of a machine that once produced sounds. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC..

name: Porun, Music King
story:
Porun the King of Music
 

[FF1493]GD6666 Month 66, Lightday[-]
"Music" is about enjoying sounds, and "so
ngs" are its ultimate form. After many yea
rs, I've acquired a few songs. But, I long t
o cross the ocean to the Western Realm, w
here even more songs are said to exist. W
ell, good night.

accessory.name: Musical Part+
accessory.detail: Amplifies sound when worn on the head. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC.

name: Zorus
story:
Zorus

After years of studying these nonhumans,
 I'm no closer to making sense of them. I j
ust had an F class unit taken away, and no
w I'll have to do it all over again with this 
big hunk of metal. Why must I waste my va
st intelligence on such--

name: Zorus, Punisher
story:
Zorus the Punisher 

Zorus had his body and soul cut up severa
l times by an Imperial scientist "studying"
 and attempting to "improve" him. But, he
 had never lost his pride. As soon as the s
cientist turned his back on him, Zorus lift
ed his hammer and punished his captor.

name: Rideau
story:
Rideau

The A. Smith Trading Co. is a syndicate in
volved in all manner of criminal activity, in
cluding the slave trade. One of the 5 Dons
 is Rideau, who rules the Eastern Seas. Al
l traders are beholden to him, even as he 
is beholden to the sea.

accessory.name: Book of Names
accessory.detail: A list of everyone who was in his tribe. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC.

name: Rideau. Water-Bound
story:
Rideau the Water-Bound 

Rideau's people were nearly wiped out ye
ars ago at the hands of the A. Smith Tradi
ng Co., in a plan masterminded by Rideau
 himself. For this, he was promoted to the
 inner circle of Big Boss Gilva Apollos, the
 man he seeks to kill.

accessory.name: Book of Names+
accessory.detail: Not betrayal, but the will of his people. [5ef5f7]+750[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC.

name: Demi Cthulu
story:
Demi Cthulu

[FF1493]GD5311 Month 44, Waterday[-]
I've been hungry since acquiring this King
force. I eat and eat, but I get hungrier and
 lonelier. But, then I burst into laughter. W
hat a sad man the king who had this powe
r must have been.

name: Seth
story:
Seth

Seth was a servant of the gods sent to bri
ng order to the Western Realm. Upon arri
ving in a desert with his twin sister, the tw
o decided to divide it into east and west a
nd each rule one half as they saw fit.

accessory.name: Eternal Sun
accessory.detail: The sun was hope. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+1400[-] HP when also equipping Eternal Moon. (Stack: N)

name: Seth, Sun General
story:
Seth the Sun General  

Seth, King of the East Desert, was at war 
with his sister. She'd always wanted peac
e; why had she invaded? No answer came
 as their blades dug into each other. Seth
 turned to dust, and the sun has hovered 
over the East Desert since.

accessory.name: Eternal Sun+
accessory.detail: Now, the sun burns. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP when also equipping Eternal Moon. (Stack: N)

name: Isis
story:
Isis

Isis was a servant of the gods, Queen of th
e West Desert. Influenced by her peace-es
pousing brother, she had grown her kingd
om into a flowering oasis. But now, she w
as hearing rumors that her brother intend
ed to invade the West Desert.

accessory.name: Eternal Moon
accessory.detail: The moon was comfort. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC; [5ef5f7]+1400[-] HP when also equipping Eternal Sun. (Stack: N)

name: Isis, Moon General
story:
Isis the Moon General 

Isis realized her brother sought the Book 
of Gods. If so, she must stop him. Her bro
ther stood before her; the next moment, h
er blade thrust into him, and his into her. 
Isis turned to dust, and the moon has hov
ered over the West Desert since.

accessory.name: Eternal Moon+
accessory.detail: Now, the moon rots. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC; [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP when also equipping Eternal Sun. \n(Stack: N)

name: Jett
story:
Jett

[FF1493]Do You Need Assistance?[-]
Whatever the job or task, our experienced
 technical staff and temps at JASON Inc. w
ill be happy to take it on for you! Satisfac
tion guaranteed! 

Contact us now at:
3-535 West Panzile.

accessory.name: The Five Conditions
accessory.detail: The 5 conditions for funding his startup. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK.

name: Jett, Wolf Lord
story:
Jett the Wolf Lord 

A year ago, Jett launched JASON Inc., an o
dd-job agency in the industry town of Pan
zile. Jett has since gone into debt. One da
y, a man walks into his office with a gener
ous offer: Hunt down the dragons tormen
ting the Eastern Realm.

accessory.name: The Five Conditions+
accessory.detail: Only 2 of 5 conditions have so far been met. [5ef5f7]+1600[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK.

name: Kukul
story:
Kukul

[FF1493]GD 6955 Month 58, Waterday[-]
The Seven Seas?! Pah! A bunch of kiddie 
pools! No ocean in the East or West can s
low down the mighty Kukul! ...Wait! My sh
ip's under repairs, so I can't take you righ
t now! Come back later!

accessory.name: Mariner's Telescope
accessory.detail: Used by navigators to prepare for danger. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

name: Kukul, Navigator
story:
Kukul the Navigator

[FF1493]GD7016 Month 71, Waterday[-]
The Eight Seas?! Pah! I can sail 'em with m
y hands tied behind my back while hangin
g upside down! I'll take you to the Wester
n seas, no problem! ...Wait! Aren't those w
aters teeming with..gulp...behemoths?

accessory.name: Mariner's Telescope+
accessory.detail: Usually aimed at the terrors of the sea. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

name: Sui
story:
Sui

[FF1493]GD2982 Month 27, Lightday[-]
My entire world is the scenery I see throu
gh my window, from the petals flittering i
n the spring wind to the smell of snow in 
the winter. A rare illness keeps me indoor
s, which is why I am writing this letter to y
ou.

accessory.name: Yellow Overcoat
accessory.detail: Worn by a patient placed in isolation. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK.

name: Sui, Lady of Blooms
story:
Sui the Lady of Blooms 

[FF1493]GD3522 Month 33, Lightday[-]
I suffer from an illness called Floweration
, where my body slowly turns into a flowe
r petal and then withers away. There is no
 cure for it yet, but I do hope they find on
e soon. I miss going outside.

accessory.name: Yellow Overcoat+
accessory.detail: Her dreams grow with every tear and repair. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK.

name: Ghaist
story:
Ghaist

Ghaist pulled his spear out of the dragon 
as it fell to the ground. How many had he 
killed now? It didn't matter; all he knew w
as it was not yet enough to lift his curse. 
He turned around. The people he just resc
ued stared at him in horror.

accessory.name: Cursed Bones
accessory.detail: Binds his flesh to this world. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

name: Ghaist, Cursed Soul
story:
Ghaist the Cursed Soul 


A girl stared at the sky in prayer. She did 
not seem to see the dragon salivating ove
r her. As it opened its maw, Ghaist thrust 
his spear through its jaw and forced it shu
t. The girl just gazed into the sky, trembli
ng even as she kept praying.

accessory.name: Cursed Bones+
accessory.detail: Will crumble to dust when his journey ends. [5ef5f7]+1400[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

name: Demi Chrono
story:
Demi Chrono

[FF1493]GD 5256 Month 33, Darkday[-]
I arrived in a foreign land and stumbled up
on a golden clock with its time stopped: a
 vessel containing the powers of a king. I 
had acquired a Kingforce.

name: Kurotsuchi
story:
Kurotsuchi

[FF1493]Playing: Log Entry 00001[-]
...Awake...is...OK?...
Shinano...call...not 
Ryujo...Shinano...much
of a burden...No, Shinano
...right...soul...vessel.

name: Kurotsuchi, Samurai
story:
Kurotsuchi the Samurai 

[FF1493]Playing: Log Entry 48032[-]
Kurotsuchi, this is my final order. Don't th
ink about it too hard. I have decided to en
d the cycle here. Kurotsuchi, thank you, fo
r everything. Now go. Go and live beyond 
this cycle.

name: G.S.
story:
G.S.

[FF1493]UNKNOWN[-]
[FF1493]DATA LOST[-]
errorcode=07

accessory.name: Nostalgic Cigarette
accessory.detail: Cigarettes given by a childhood friend. Raises ATK except against bosses.

name: G.S., Warmonger
story:
G.S. the Warmonger 

There is a 7th Pureblood that doesn’t off
icially exist. Having staged a war in this ki
ngdom over the Book of Gods, G.S.
has caught the attention of the other Pure
bloods. And now, he will kill them along w
ith himself to destroy the Empire.

accessory.name: Nostalgic Cigarette+
accessory.detail: The smoke drifts slowly and heavily. Raises ATK except against bosses.

name: Nia
story:
Nia

There is a desert nation that sacrifices a y
oung girl once very few years to their pro
tector, an elderly dragon. Nia is the 999th
 sacrifice. She is blinded with poison so sh
e will not fear the sight of the dragon, and
 taken to the Royal Tomb.

accessory.name: Recalled Histories
accessory.detail: Pictures drawn based on what she hears. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK.

name: Nia, Offering
story:
Nia the Offering

Nia now walks the desert with a knight wh
o is on a quest to slay dragons. He does n
ot say why, but there is a sadness in his v
oice Nia cannot abandon. She has decided
 to escort him to return his favor, believin
g in the light she sees in his heart.

accessory.name: Recalled Histories+
accessory.detail: Though blind, she sees in her own way. [5ef5f7]+1550[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK.

name: Chroma, Dragonized
story:
Chroma the Dragonized 

A dragon gazed at Chroma from its cage. 
Chroma had been happy to live alone unti
l she met him. But illness had done to him
 what it would soon do to her as well. She
 drew her sword. She knew that, in her po
sition, he would have done the same.

accessory.name: Black Wing Headband++
accessory.detail: Living with the curse as human and dragon. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Alicia, Lady of Fire
story:
Alicia the Lady of Fire

The orphanage's children had loved Phylli
s, who died defending the town from drag
ons. Alicia took it hardest. She lost her so
ul and smile, and now dedicates her life to
 burning dragons with her magical fires, a
t once infernal and mournful.

accessory.name: Candy Bow++
accessory.detail: Will one day burn away in her own fire. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kyte, Historian
story:
Kyte the Historian 

Kyte's reputation as a bard was unsurpass
ed, and now the king himself was to hono
r him in person. Kyte imagined all the sec
ret lore he would now have access to. At t
he capital, he was given a warm welcome 
by Michael, captain of the guard.

accessory.name: Writer's Hat++
accessory.detail: Came to a sad end, along with its owner. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nicola, Wanderer
story:
Nicola the Wanderer
 
Nicola aimlessly wandered the desert unti
l he came upon the hut he lived in once. T
he door opened, and his wife and children
 welcomed him home. Soon, the mirage cr
eated by the Glutton Queen would turn to
 sand, and he would once again continue w
andering.

accessory.name: Flask of Wandering++
accessory.detail: Has pointed across the ocean for years now. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Licht
story:
Licht

Licht came from the future looking for his
 sister, Corona, but the battery on his onl
y means of time travel died upon arrival. H
e was offered help by a boy named Kylt--t
he same name as a scientist who is an ene
my of the state in the future.

name: Alan, Guard Captain
story:
Alan the Guard Captain 

Alan, his army of 1,000, Luka, her dragon
 people, and the heroes of lore listened as
 Princess Maria roused them before the b
attle that day. A sharp wind blew in, and a
 dark shadow fell on the city. The dragons
 had arrived. Alan drew his sword.

name: Cain, Dragon Knight
story:
Cain the Dragon Knight

The time had come. Cain quietly removed 
the seal over his left eye. The Eye of the E
vil Dragon throbbed ominously in the first
 light of day. Firm in resolve, Cain mounte
d his dragon and flew to the capital, looki
