ng more alone than he ever had.

name: Luka, Tome Restorer
story:
Luka the Tome Restorer

As Alan, his 1,000 men, Luka, her dragon 
people, and the heroes of lore battled the
 dragons, an onyx dragon flew at the Cath
edral where Queen Maria was. A black kni
ght leapt off its back. Cain had returned t
o fulfill the Prophecy.

name: Maria, Holy Princess
story:
Maria the Holy Princess

One by one, the dragons perished at the h
ands of the thousands of warriors gathere
d to defeat them. Suddenly, a dark wind b
lew in, dropping off a black knight at the f
eet of Maria. The next moment, his spear 
had pierced her chest.

name: Daria
story:
Daria

Daria had been brought up in darkness, b
lindfolded since the day she was born. Sh
e never wondered what it would be like to
 be able to see, as her other four senses s
erved her perfectly well. But then, her Evi
l Eye was opened.

accessory.name: Flower of Darkness
accessory.detail: An eerie flower that grows in the dark. [5ef5f7]+1050[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK & REC.

name: Daria, Evil Eye
story:
Daria the the Evil Eye 

Daria ran, for there were those who inten
ded to rob her of the light she had found.
 Her Evil Eye had revealed a world full of f
lowers that she took delight in cutting. Bu
t the flowers didn't exist, and all she cut w
ere the lives of other people.

accessory.name: Flower of Darkness+
accessory.detail: Only grows in the world that she sees. [5ef5f7]+1550[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK & REC.

name: Gilva
story:
Gilva

The A. Smith Trading Co. is a criminal syn
dicate that controls all illicit trade with sh
ips that sail the skies, the deserts, and th
e Eight Seas. The man at the top is Gilva A
pollos, the last heir to the once powerful 
Apollos family.

accessory.name: Pirate's Compass
accessory.detail: Always point to the treasure he seeks. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK.

name: Gilva, Pirate King
story:
Gilva the Pirate King 

Just as Gilva was looking for something ex
citing, he received word of the Forbidden 
Library. For Gilva, the world was his playt
hing, and there was no doubt in his mind 
that everything in the world would eventu
ally fall into his hands.

accessory.name: Pirate's Compass+
accessory.detail: Now pointing at Hall of Forbidden Tomes. [5ef5f7]+650[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK.

name: Varsh
story:
Varsh

Either due to arrogance or carelessness, V
arsh had been expecting one dragon when
 he entered the lair of the fire dragon. He
 faced six. As he closed his eyes to meet h
is fate, another Hunter came between him
 and the dragons.

accessory.name: Hunter's Tag
accessory.detail: A tag given to all members of Gurt. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, Ups chain bonus.

name: Varsh, Fire Vanquisher
story:
Varsh the Fire Vanquisher

Varsh was now a deputy of Gurt, the drag
on hunting team that had rescued him all 
those years ago. One day, he received wo
rd from his men about the dragon attack o
n Light Valley. Quickly, he gathered Victo
r and his own elite squadron.

accessory.name: Hunter's Tag+
accessory.detail: Varsh suggested it and designed it himself. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, Ups chain bonus.

name: Bakk
story:
Bakk

Bakk was 1 of the 5 Dons of criminal synd
icate A. Smith Trading Co., and the last of
 the Wingfolk who once ruled the skies. H
e lent his flying ship to the syndicate on o
ne condition: That they rid Babel of the In
vaders who killed his people.

accessory.name: Azure Horn
accessory.detail: A symbolic horn worn on a Wingfolk's head. [5ef5f7]+1050[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK & REC.

name: Bakk, Sky Lord
story:
Bakk the Sky Lord

Once, the Wingfolk ruled the heavens, the
 Angels the skies. They fought bitterly, bu
t at least they were free in their own king
doms. Then the Invaders arrived, calling t
hemselves "gods." They hunted the Wingf
olk and Angels for sport.

accessory.name: Azure Horn+
accessory.detail: The grave marker for a warrior friend. [5ef5f7]+1650[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK & REC.

name: Lilith
story:
Lilith

Lilith is a Demon, the oldest indigenous s
pecies in the Western Realm and the origi
n of Wingfolk and Angels. Lilith is one of t
he more humanlike and intelligent Demon
s, but it is unknown if Lilith is her name o
r the name of her species.

accessory.name: Moonstone
accessory.detail: A moon ore containing the light of the moon. [5ef5f7]+850[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] HP & REC.

name: Lilith, Moonlit Maiden
story:
Lilith the Moonlit Maiden

Lilith is 1 of 7 ancient indigenous species
 on record. Each is distinct, including one
 resembling the dragons created by the go
ds--the original that the gods simply copi
ed. The so-called 7 Ancients all hate drag
ons with a passion.

accessory.name: Moonstone+
accessory.detail: There are seven stones for the seven moons. [5ef5f7]+1450[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] HP & REC.

name: Serena
story:
Serena

There is a land known as the Middle betwe
en the sky and the heavens, made up of 5
 floating islands. Serena is an Angelic Arm
y captain stationed on the largest island, 
Centras. Her skill with the bow is deadly t
o dragons and her hated Wingfolk alike.

accessory.name: Lightspeed Arrow
accessory.detail: This deadly arrow does not miss its target. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK.

name: Serena, Speed Archer
story:
Serena the Archer of Speed 

Winds ensured the Middle never stayed in
 one spot, which was why it had never bee
n invaded--until the day the wind died. As
 Serena watched the four islands around C
entras begin to fall towards the earth, she
 heard an odd, catlike laugh.

accessory.name: Lightspeed Arrow+

[FF1493]GD7019 Month 56, Waterday[-]
The sea rages, Kukul, as it did 1,000 year

 The main character of [FF1493]"AKIBA’S TRIP: U

 A Pop idol in Akihabara who's got incomp

name: Licht, Electric Boy

Licht the Electric Boy

During the day, Kylt left Licht at home as

The Velbloods once ruled a third of the co

Levia's late mother gave her three things:

The curse was also called a contract, as it

Cupid was starved of love and so removed

Rem

For months, Rem had been having the sam

All around were buildings and creatures s

range outfits. Was Rem dreaming? But no

ddenly, she saw Luka and ran up to her.

Redrum

Dragoturn Sickness had caused half of Re
drum to turn into a dragon--which was str
ange, as it normally caused the victim to t
urn into a dragon or die in severe pain. Th

 to ache and slowly corrupted her mind.

Rosaria

There is a tower with a flower garden at th

live. But, one spring day, she escapes the

Rosaria woke up to the familiar sight of th

Kagura stood over her younger sister. Zip

Diablo are hard to predict, having fought

You want to be a hero? Then here's what

Totol

[FF1493]GD 4984 Month 23, Waterday[-]
I once had a dream where there were all k
inds of vehicles, even ones that could fly!

vehicle some day. I'd fly across the world 
to the kingdom where my girlfriend lives.

[FF1493]GD4999 Month 13, Waterday[-]
What a great day for a flight! I'm going to

irlfriend in this. It's a bit small for me, and

Frosty

[FF1493]GD ---- Month --, Snowday[-]
I went to the beach, and there was all this

. There was this thing that looked like a b
ig fish, and it had a long neck, and it attac
ked me, so I hit it back and took it home!

[FF1493]GD ---- Month --, Snowday[-]
I went to the beach, and there was all this

here was this person wearing these weird

[FF1493]Wood Log 002[-]
I do not know whether I was born a tree o

[FF1493]Wood Log 155[-]
The season has come when flowers and an
imals alike come to life. My master is in a

Oh dear. Never fear, I shall protect my ma

Although Dilacroc was the young king of t

The charred remains of friends sprawled a

[FF1493]For fusion[-]

      --Diebold Maxwell

accessory.name: Pearl of Yearning+

Equipped with his giant suit of armor and

n as the kindest man in the capital. Dunde

aused him to grow abnormally fast. He wa

[FF1493]GD5151 Month 22, Lightday[-]
Master sent me to the Western Realm to l
ook for a Kingforce to prepare him agains

omeone in this city can help me. Hm? Mm

Using the power of souls, the natives wer

name: Ukon
story:
Ukon

He who opens the gates.

name: Ukon, Gate Opener
story:
Ukon the Gate Opener 

Ukon and Sakon had been guarding the ga
tes since they were born, but none ever tr
ied to pass. Ukon wondered if there was a
 point to all this--but as Sakon did not spe
ak, he pondered this alone. One day, he h
oped, he would get to open the gates.

name: Sakon
story:
Sakon

He who closes the gates.

name: Sakon, Gate Closer
story:
Sakon the Gate Closer 

The gates had never been opened, nor ha
d any ever passed through. As long as the
 secrets beyond the gates remained unkno
wn, Sakon was cursed to keep every thoug
ht to himself in silence. This was a proble
m, especially when his nose tickled.

name: Shusui
story:
Shusui

Shusui serves the Emperor Kotowari in th
e land of Zipang. All that happens in this l
and is recorded in his writing. After recor
ding thousands of accounts, Shusui notice
s something: His records seem to be pred
icting future events.

name: Shusui, Monk of Dreams

Shusui the Monk of Dreams 

All that he had written had come to pass. 
War had broken out, the land had burned,
 and people had died. Shusui stood alone 
in a charred field, the sun setting behind 
his back. From now on, he vowed, he wou
ld write the future that he desired.

story:
Zio

He wakes to the sound of gentle waves an
d finds himself on a beach. The moon's re
flection is distorted on the water's surfac
e. He does not know where he is--nor who

 to roll in, offering no answers.

accessory.name: Blue Amnesia
accessory.detail: Its luster is gone, forgotten in the past. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dragons, Fire enemies.

name: Zio, Forgotten Past
story:
Zio the Forgotten Past 

He comes to with a start to the sound of p
ounding rain, roaring dragons, and bellow
ing warriors. All around him are bodies of
 countless dragons and soldiers. He does 
not know where he is, but he knows his pu
rpose. He draws his sword.

accessory.name: Blue Amnesia+
accessory.detail: He stands in an abyss of complete amnesia. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dragons, Fire enemies.

Vell

There are those in this world called Sinne
rs, freaks of nature who are partially drag
onized, perhaps, or enjoy eternal youth. T
hese "mistakes" are captured, bound, and

 the Original Sinner.

accessory.name: Rusted Padlock

Vell the Prison Lady 

The gates open to two wolves--or girls?--
in black and white who fire thousands of r
ounds at the gate. But the white-haired m
an has not a single scratch. The two girls 
smile and part to make way for the master

accessory.name: Rusted Padlock+

Pino

[FF1493]GD4825 Month 55, Lightday[-]
Grandpa's feeling better today. He wasn't

d my key, so I'll get to live a bit longer no
w. I wish Grandpa had a key too, so I coul
d wind his for him.

Pino the Broken Toy 

[FF1493]GD5882 Month 56, Lightday[-]
Grandpa's doing OK today. He hasn't eate
n in days, but he's ssssleeping without co
ughing. He hasn't wound my key in aaaaa 
while, so my body  is verrrryyyy stiff. I ho
pe I can stiiilllll be a real boy somedddddd
--

accessory.name: Rusted Life Force+

Benten

Before it had a name, the place was a para

nd the Tengu recently fought off some win

In an instant, the winged creatures had se

he ashes, wingless and alone, a god looke

accessory.name: Tengu Mask+

name: Ghies

Ghies

[FF1493]Top Secret[-]

Ghies the Anonymous

To: Schpritz
I've captured the Sinner Kristof. We can't 
allow Uberblood to cause any more damag
e; we must confine it at once. In the mean
time, I'll keep my eyes on Oliver. Over.

name: Kristof
story:
Kristof

[FF1493]Research Log 3856[-]
I have discovered what I call Ubdeath, a st
ate of death beyond ordinary death. Drago
ns, creatures of the Eastern Realm, the Se
ven Ancients, and Hades must hold the se
cret to it. I will find it and make it mine.

Kristof the Researcher

[FF1493]Research Log 0001[-]
Mother died today; maybe it's all Father's

f a death that lay beyond death. Mother ca
lled it a "taboo," but always talked about i
t. It's now time for me to seek out the "tru
th."

Nazna

Like her parents, Nazna was a hunter who

d. Her tribe did not hunt more than neede
d and lived in peace with the animals. Naz

Nazna the Beast Protector 

The Longclaws attacked Nazna's tribe. Wh
o knows how it started. In the silence that

f dead Longclaw and humans. Her parents

 At that moment, Nazna made a vow.

Demi Le Fay

[FF1493]GD5511 Month 15, Lightday[-]
I'm going to play a new prank! I thought a
bout it all night--okay, not all night, since

efore going to bed and... Anyway, the pra
nk! It's a great prank, and, um...I forgot.

For the umpteenth time, she rebuilt her h
ouse. It was always a wreck after the nigh
t of a God Moon, and she could never figu
re out why. As she pondered who the culp
rit could be, a red-hooded, beast-hunting

Seyfried the One-Eyed

His torn arm flew into the air as blood gus
hed out of his stomach. His nemesis was f

m his right arm.

Seyfried could not see or hear. He could f

The one-eyed god laughed with angry ridi

Deep in Babel was a land only open to the

Valzark's mind began to wander. He gazed

accessory.name: Core of Blue Dreams++

Valzark the White Dragon

The blue disciple stood in the pouring rain

isciples in white and black: Hope and Des
pair, but, to Valzark, they offered neither.
 The white one struck first; the next mome
nt, her white armor turned red.

The black disciple fell. Her right hand land

The soldiers wandered the hill in the light

agi searched in vain for someone among t
hem, the man she needed to help rebuild

She turned; tears of joy ran down her face
.

Amagi had grown up with two souls: He an
d She. He was stubborn and doubted noth
ing; it was Him that had instilled her with 
the unbending beliefs she lived by. As tim
e passed, both He and She vanished, to be

accessory.name: Girdle of Whiteness++

Amagi had never liked She, who was comp
letely selfish and did not sit well with her

She had told herself she was not going to

in her arms dying, she wanted to tell him 
so many things, but no words came. For a

accessory.name: Tragic Arm Sling++

Karma the Uncursed 

Karma lifted her bruised body off the grou
nd, her mouth full of blood. She steadily a
imed her bow at the man who stood on th
e burning deck of the Lost Blonde: Smith 
Apollos. She was no longer afraid. With a 
confident smile, Karma let loose an arrow

accessory.name: Tragic Arm Wrap++

The captain who lost her ship headed to t
he ocean. The taciturn mage built an orph
anage to protect children. The kindly boy 
decided to follow Karma, whose purple clo
th was now wrapped around her bow inste
ad of her neck. A new chapter had begun.

As he lay on the ground,  Maxwell knew h

Maxwell, shrouded in a black fog, flew into

nd "solution" created by the Blue Genius

accessory.name: Guiding Bird++

name: Maxwell, Dark Sage
story:
Maxwell the Dark Sage 

BP. BPBP. ALL IMPOSTERS ELIMINATED. 
AM NOW TRUE SEEKER, INHERITOR OF AL
L SOLUTIONS. TO COMPLETE MISSION, M
UST DESTROY ALL PAST BY BURNING QUE
EN OF TOMES AND FORBIDDEN TOMES, T
HEN CREATE FINAL SOLUTION. BP. BPBP.
 PBP.

Isabella the Tricky Empress

All had gone as planned. The dragons had

 Eye of the Evil Dragon had killed Queen M
aria. The world would soon be hers, Isabe
lla thought--but no plan ever goes entirel
y as planned.

accessory.name: Demonic Shell++
accessory.detail: A strange voice can be heard from the shell. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Isabella, Fire Empress
story:
Isabella the Fire Empress 
Isabella hated Alan. She hated his selfless
 regard for his men's safety over his own 
and the trust he had earned at the palace 
as a result. So, she conceived a plan to mu
rder his best friend and frame Alan for it.

accessory.name: Shell of War++
accessory.detail: A shell of beginnings that will upend all. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

story:
Isabella the Dragon Empress

Isabella hated Luka. She hated her newly 
acquired ability to use Forbidden Tomes. 
Such powers could foil her plans--but cou
ld also play into her hands. So, she conce
ived a plan to permanently imprison the h
eroes of legend who had been summoned
.

accessory.name: Shell of Answers++
accessory.detail: A shell of endings that will upend all. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Dione, Lady of the End
story:
Dione the Lady of the End 

Thousands of dragons flew into the capita
l. The End of Time was drawing near. Wou
ld it mark the end of the world or a beginn
ing? Or "D"--Genesis? Dione's quest for f
reedom was about to end. The next instan
t, a cold blade pressed against her neck.

accessory.name: Crimson Finalizer++

Dione the Lady of Nothing
 
She had seen things in dreams: her arms,

y she had come, in spite of these dreams,
 to put an end to it all. The 72 gods who s

accessory.name: Green Slicer++

Dione the Lady of Genesis 

Dione found her friend dead, having fough
t the gods to protect a mere Doll. Yet, this

e had become human and attained the fre
edom her protector had sought.

accessory.name: Crimson Burier++
accessory.detail: It is now crimson, and forever will be. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [d9419a]-450[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

Valtols the Heavenly Guard 

He thought her appearance impure, dress

fore the End of Time arrived.

Valtols walked the halls of Babel and saw 
that god with the umbrella who had a baff

ore impure than our Creator." His golden 
blade struck her fast.

Valtols the Heavenly Death

Pitiful, Valtols thought, as he looked at th
e god slumped before him. He turned to t
he 71 gods she had killed and grimaced a
t their impure forms. Suddenly, he droppe
d his sword; a blade protruded from his ch
est. The god had not been finished.

story:
Natal the Infernal Flames

Natal moved through the burning castle c
arrying a young man who bled from a dee
p wound in his back. Zipang was about to 
enter an age where gods would no longer

o ensure that future would come to pass.

accessory.name: Bear-Cat Ornament++

name: Natal, Dancing Flames

Natal the Dancing Flames 

Natal's sister Setsuri often caressed her h
ead, whether she was happy, sad, angry--
or the day her mother died. To Natal, Sets
uri was home, the one place she was alwa
ys happy. But now, it was gone; it would l
ive on only as a memory.

accessory.name: Pink Bear-Cat++
accessory.detail: From one sister, she received kindness. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

Natal the Black Flames 

Natal had never seen Kagura smile. She h
ad once asked Setsuri about this, and she

emember how. As Natal watched Kagura d
ie, a gentle smile on her face, she finally u
nderstood.

accessory.name: Red Bear-Cat++
accessory.detail: From the other sister, she also got kindness. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

story:
Nefteria the Dying Star 

Whatever Nefteria did, her Doll would alw
ays try to imitate her. That was how they

ind raced with memories of precious mom
ents.

name: Nefteria, Destroyer Star
story:
Nefteria the Destroyer Star 

Nefteria's mind raced with 
memories of invaluable encounters. She h
ad been prone to breaking things, even m
ore so when she was trying to be careful. 
A smith came to Babel once and crafted h
er a glass spear that looked only too brea
kable.

accessory.name: Endless Necklace++
accessory.detail: Very rarely placed as wager when gambling. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-450[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

Nefteria the Drunken Star 

Neftria's mind raced with memories of goo
d friends. She had never met a god who co
uld drink as much as Dione. The night the
y met, they drank barrel after barrel, neith
er wanting to admit defeat. When dawn ca

accessory.name: Eternal Necklace++
accessory.detail: Very rarely placed into a pawn shop. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-450[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

Schelk the Dashing Wind 

At a library in Water Valley, Luka picked u
p a book she had read many times: "Living

ing of Light Valley who had written the bo
ok. She had not seen him in a while and h
oped he was doing well.

accessory.name: Gale Feathers++
accessory.detail: The winds carry it to one's true love. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

story:
Schelk the Blazing Wind

Schelk met Victor at a banquet when she 
had just been made queen of Fire Valley. 
Several men had been laying on the floor 
around her. It was only when her foot stru
ck his nose that he realized she had been

accessory.detail: Red means passion, and are sent by women. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

Schelk the Dragon Wind 

The arrow hit the dragon in the eye. Sche
lk nocked another arrow and studied the p
eople at its feet. Five were dead. The youn
g girl Luka sat petrified; she didn't respon
d to his calls. The dragon raised its claws;
 Schelk let loose his second arrow.

accessory.name: Bluewind Feathers++
accessory.detail: Blue means love, and are sent to family. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Frau, Machine Abettor
story:
Frau the Machine Abettor 

Everything was now over. Frau thought he

, or did he shut down, having completed h
is mission? It looked like he could still tim
e travel, though. Frau thought about wher
e and when they would go next.

accessory.detail: Fulfills its duty even if it costs its life. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

story:
Frau the Machine Booster 

Frau was in the Age of Light. V had pierce
d the space-time fabric with "nails" that w
ould, over time, create cracks that could s

accessory.detail: Weak to electricity, making its life hell. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Frau, Machine Rider
story:
Frau the Machine Rider 

Both V and I will be gone soon. I have fulf
illed my duty, although I wish I didn't have
 to leave her behind. She has no one to ta
lk to except me, and can't even wake up in

er day she tried to make bre--

story:
Noa the Cycle Creator 

Noa opened her eyes in the dark. What ha
ppened to V? And why did the world still 
exist? The door opened suddenly, and No
a understood at once. There stood the Em
peror she knew, as a young man she had n
ever known. A Pureblood; a copy.

accessory.name: Science Visor++
accessory.detail: Can also predict the next day's weather. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

story:
Noa the Disasterologist 

Noa had now created seven lives--the orig
inal model and the A to F series--at the co
mmand of the Three Elders. These slaves 
of the Empire would one day realize the h
orror of what they had done. So, Noa secr
etly created G, their salvation.

accessory.name: Visor of Fire++
accessory.detail: Can also measure heat. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

story:
Noa the Vortexologist 

Noa didn't hate the woman general who o
versaw her. She wasn't a Pureblood, nor w
as she fanatically loyal to the Empire, but
 she was determined about her own goals
. Noa liked such instability; if it grew big e
nough, it would bring about great change
.

accessory.name: Visor of Water++
accessory.detail: Can also measure water pressure. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Amaterasu, Death
story:
Amaterasu the Death Goddess

The girl called out the boy's name over an
d over again; he did not awaken. How frag
ile these humans are, Amaterasu thought,
 to die so easily, leaving behind nothing. S
he had arrived at her desired solution; sh
e had no need to stay here any longer.

accessory.name: Burning Souls++
accessory.detail: They also call such vessels "gods."[5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Amaterasu, Scarlet
story:
Amaterasu the Scarlet Goddess

Setsuri's parents ran a metal workshop. O
ne day, she opened the door to find the w
hite workshop dyed a deep red. In the cen
ter was a beautiful woman twirling an umb
rella. At the back were the disfigured rem
ains of her parents.

accessory.name: Luminescent Souls++
accessory.detail: A piece of a beautiful soul: Setsuri. [5ef5f7]+900[-] RE [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Amaterasu, False
story:
Amaterasu the False Goddess 

Kagura took shelter from the rain under a

 job. She went to sleep clutching the char
m her parents had given her. Soon, she aw
oke to find a beautiful woman in red, stan
ding in the rain with an umbrella.

accessory.name: Colorless Souls++
accessory.detail: A piece of a cold soul: Kagura. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

story:
Marianne

You know District 7 of St. Cruz? Used to b
e a town of bars and gambling dens run b
y Gilvo the Diamond. Queen Marianne paid
 it a visit one day, and Gilvo decided to kid
nap her. That's when Don walked into tow
n with his red cape and gun.(02)

accessory.name: Queen's Earring
accessory.detail: A symbol of holy, immaculate thoughts. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Marianne, White Queen
story:
Marianne the White Queen
 
Don didn't actually save Marianne then. In
 fact, she used the kidnapping plot to run
 away from the castle. Destroyed Gilvo's p
rized bar along the way, one thing led to a
nother, and THAT'S when Don came to the
 rescue. Gilvo's never forgiven him.(03)

accessory.name: Queen's Earring+
accessory.detail: Light creates shadow; shadow creates sin. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

story:
Walter

Walter is an odd hatter who lives in a cert
ain tiny kingdom. He knows that everythin
g he does, from his tea parties to the ridd
les without answers he asks people, is sim
ply a repetition of that which has already 
been written.

accessory.name: Hatmaker's Hat
accessory.detail: A hat made for a hatter by a hatter. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

story:
Walter the Mirror Prophet 

Everyday, Walter's clock shows the same 
date. But, today, something is odd. A mon
ster he's never seen burns the card soldie
rs, while the Queen of Hearts loses her he
ad, her blood drenching a young girl. That

.

accessory.name: Hatmaker's Dove Hat+
accessory.detail: Modified for a dove, his only friend. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Sandy
story:
Sandy

[FF1493]GD7021 Month 32, Darkday[-]
I did it again. I robbed the house, but then
 found the old man living there collapsed.
 I called for help, ran off when people gath
ered outside, but then a monster attacked
 a little child. I drove it away, but forgot m
y loot.

accessory.name: Thief's Cloth
accessory.detail: For wrapping the loot one has stolen. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

story:
Sandy the Handy Bandit

[FF1493]GD7021 Month 34, Darkday[-]
Life in the West isn't bad. I went out thiev
ing, and the old man I saved the other day
 offered me lunch. Then, the parents of th
e child I saved made me dinner. Oh, and I 
got something for helping out the local do
ctor, too!

accessory.name: Thief's Cloth+
accessory.detail: Fills up with gifts more often than loot. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

story:
Asura

The day Asura became chief of the Hiten t
ribe, he swore at his father's grave to des
troy the Tengu. He recalled the day three 
of them came to him on a strange winged 
creature and dropped his father's mangle
d corpse in front of him.

accessory.name: Asura's Chestplate
accessory.detail: Armor worn by one who leads the Hiten. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

story:
Asura the Lord of Hell

The Hiten and Tengu had once agreed to a
 truce to combat a certain foretold disaste
r. Asura no longer remembered the comfo
rt he had felt at the banquet celebrating t
he truce, nor the Tengu girl whose hand in

accessory.name: Asura's Chestplate+
accessory.detail: Asura's burning rage covers it with blood. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

Oliver

Oliver left home to save the world, but his

ough a desert to a dragon with whom he l
ived until a god came along. As they drank
, there was a knock on the door. Oliver op
ened it--and no one's seen him since.

story:
Oliver the Hyperblood Man 

Cut, stitch together, break, and fix.

My life's a patchwork.

The old warrior battled the Red Dragon at

 and wife he had left behind.

Luke stood before the Glutton Queen's ca
stle. Ursula was in there; now was the tim

ay to lift the curse put on him and Ursula.

Alain looked at his Holy Sword. Who had d

Eizel lay in the Imperial hospital, dragoniz
ation worsening due to the Evil Eye that h

ife nursed Eizel back to health, but then t
he blood of a traveling woman destroyed

Joseph had formulated a plan to destroy t
he White Hunters. The other rebel groups

dered. He would send them in to attack. In

aight to him. He would have Theodore's h

accessory.name: Wings of the Ether++

The Hellfire Spear burnt bright, still fuelle

In the light of the two moons, two shadow

accessory.name: Crystal of Bondage++

There were those who cried and screamed

s and eaten their fellow men. Neither Ang
elica nor Artorius had seen evil of this sca
le, and it shattered their faith.

The gods ordered Viola and Fiona to destr

via. Normally, the gods would not have ma

ared accept the Doll as a true human.

accessory.name: Crown of Despair++
accessory.detail: A ray of hope, found within the despair. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

Fiona the Hope Queen 

She fell through the sky. Viola's soul had 
left her body, but just before it did, she re
alized she was free; even the gods could n
ot prevent death from parting her and Fio
na. But, when she landed, her right hand w
as on top of Fiona's left.

accessory.name: Crown of Hope++
accessory.detail: A deep despair, hiding inside the hope. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

Foster the King of Weapons 

Foster wanted to free the world from the 
tyranny of dragons. So, he invented weap
ons to help people combat them. Many dr

the weapons and called Foster a demon.

accessory.name: Wildfire Arrow++

Turner the King of Grief 

The smell of rain filled the room. Rain see
med to follow his wife wherever she was; 
but she always smiled. Even now, as Turne
r gripped her cold hand, she smiled. When

ace, the rain finally stopped.

accessory.name: Raindrop Charm++
accessory.detail: Eventually, it settled on one rain patter. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

Edwards the Lonely King

Edwards smiled as he watched the 5 child
ren play in the small garden outside the s
mall house. A woman, also smiling, left th
e house carrying a basket of laundry. Then

ll smiling, Edwards walked away.

accessory.name: Locket of Distance++
accessory.detail: The locket will never be opened again. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

story:
Smith the Hungry King 

Smith had formed an army of trained kille
rs: 100 hungry "dogs" picked from slums 
around the world. 
The Bandit King would not stop him now. 
Eventually, Smith and his men would go o
n to rule the world under the guise of a tr
ading company.

accessory.name: The Don's Bracelet++
accessory.detail: Symbolizes the sweet joy of taking a life. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Robin, Executed King
story:
Robin the Executed King 

Robin climbed the wooden steps. He had d
one what he could to restore the House o
f Apollos. But, now, the future ahead lay i
n darkness. At the top of the 13th step, a

Rachael the Explosion Queen 

Dozens of baby dragons sat in a circle tied

s lit up in the air one after another until a

babies. Rachael prepared for the onslaugh

accessory.name: Crimson Embers++
accessory.detail: It was all that was left of the dragon. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

story:
Mary the False Queen 

The Glutton Queen was barely standing as

ess. Mary smiled. As she walked to the vic
tor, the Glutton Queen dropped her sword
 and fell to the floor. Mary raised her arm
 and plunged it into the Glutton Queen's c
hest.

accessory.name: Shell Ornament++
accessory.detail: A strange voice can be heard from the shell. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

story:
Rosa the Queen of Evil 

Rosa had told her she would get better so
on; a lie, told so she could complete her e
xperiment to dragonize her own daughter
. Perhaps that was the only form of love R
osa was capable of; but it left her daughte
r with a permanent curse.

accessory.name: Miracle Bouquet++
accessory.detail: Joy, embarrassment, laughter, and tears. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nora, Queen of Cures
story:
Nora the Queen of Cures 

Nora arrived at a town of medical facilities
. She found the Abnormalities Monitoring
 Ward: a white cube with no windows, as i
f designed to prevent anyone from getting
 in or out. A silver-haired man came out o
f the entrance.

accessory.name: Cursed Blooddrop++
accessory.detail: A curse created from cursed blood--a cycle. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Loretta, Glutton Sage
story:
Loretta the Glutton Sage

Witches who once housed the soul of the 
Glutton Queen sat on their knees, their ar
ms ripped off. They looked down upon she

 that of the Glutton Queen. Loretta let out
 a catlike laugh, and her head flew into th
e air.

accessory.name: Laughing Cat Boots++
accessory.detail: A childhood memory: Rain. A cat-like laugh. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Paprika
story:
Paprika

A spider lived in the Forbidden Library. It

of these memories with its thread; this ev
entually became the Book of Magic that g
ave birth to Paprika.

accessory.name: Book Spinner
accessory.detail: A spider who spins his web of thoughts daily. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP.

story:
Paprika the Scarlet Spider

The spider woke up that morning to find a
 girl called Paprika, claiming to have been
 born by its Book of Magic. She put it on h
er shoulder, saying they needed to find it
s true form. It did not notice that one of it
s legs had turned to stone.

accessory.name: Book Spinner+
accessory.detail: The web burned; the girl quietly laughed. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP.

story:
Sanders

In the future, wars are fought primarily be
tween two factions: the Seventh Empire--
which seeks human evolution through AI a
nd machines--and the rebel King's Law Ar
my. Sanders, a former hero, leads a third 
force: a mercenary group called Vulture.

accessory.name: Mercenary's Dagger
accessory.detail: Played a role in many of Vulture's stories. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: Sanders, Colonel
story:
Sanders the Colonel 

Sanders and his Vulture mercenaries were
 fighting dragons, knee deep in the layer o
f black ash that covered most of the world
 due to all the wars. They had only been p
aid a bit of food and water, but for Sander
s, the fight was the thing.

accessory.name: Mercenary's Dagger+
accessory.detail: The hand never forgets the warmth of blood. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

story:
Esther

Esther was in charge of supplies at the Ra
inbow Diner. She had never seen the reclu
sive chef, but loved her food. One day, sh
e was told the chef had fallen ill, and the s
tore came close to shuttering. Esther mad
e a decision and entered the kitchen.

Esther slayed a crimson dragon. In the Ra

Twinkle

[FF1493]GD4988 Month 1, Lightday[-]
I can't see anything! Is it broken? I can't t

Yay! It's fixed! Now I can watch the stars!

Dilal the Heaven's Knight

Dilal had been imprisoned in Babel for mil
lennia by the gods who feared him; now, h
is cell door was opening. With Dilal and th
e shards of the 3 Old Gods and 7 Ancients

accessory.name: Items of Binding+

story:
Vilder

The demon blade has no name, as it chang
es shape into whatever object the user de
sires. This is the only weapon of mine tha
t I refuse to name, for I despise it. I shall 
now bury it deep beneath the holy mounta
ins.
[FF1493]Page 3[-]

name: Vilder, Mighty Smith
story:
Vilder the Mighty Smith

My wife died soon after my daughter's bir
th--the curse of the demon blade. It offer
s absolute power in exchange for misery; 
there is no escape but death. I will now di
e here at the bottom of the Abyss with thi
s blade.
[FF1493]Page 682[-]

name: Black
story:
Black

One half of the Oracle's 6th Avatar. Consi
dered a failure, Black was set to be destro
yed but was let out the Prison of Time by 
his white half. He gained form by possess
ing a body he found at the bottom of the A
byss, but lost most of his Oracular powers
.

name: Black, The One Eyed
story:
Black the One Eyed 

The Oracle's 6th Avatar, Black awakened t
he power of the Evil Eye of Time and hunt
ed down the other Avatars with his black 
dragon. In the end, the Empire seized him
, using his body to resurrect a certain wea
pon. Only his Eye remains.

name: White
story:
White

This incomplete half of an Avatar of the O
racle, itself an artificial creation of the Sn
ow Dragon, switched places with its dark 
half in the body of the 6th Avatar after it 
was put in the Prison of Time for being a f
ailed replica.

name: Oracle
story:
Oracle

This artificial creation of the Snow Dragon
 has no soul. It multiplies as long as the S
now Dragon lives; and as long as one Orac
le exists, the dragon can resurrect itself. T
here were once thousands of Oracles, kno
wn as the White Dragon People.

name: Olga
story:
Olga

Of the 5 Dons of the A. Smith Trading Co.
, none were more loyal to Gilva Apollos th
an Olga of the Winds. It earned her full co
mmand over the heaven-sailing Lost Rain,
 but even that could not erase the pain wh
ere her wings used to be.

accessory.name: Severed Feathers
accessory.detail: Once fluttered in the winds as she flew. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP.

name: Olga, Pilot of Hope
story:
Olga the Pilot of Hope

Olga lost her wings when those from the W
estern Realm captured her and chopped h
er wings off. She suffered much pain, both
 physical and mental. Just as she was losin
g hope, a man with a single bird by his sid
e appeared to her.

accessory.name: Severed Feathers+
accessory.detail: Despite her loss, she regained the sky. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP.

story:
Julien

The Black Fang is a group of Sinners led b
y Chrono. Julien is Chrono's right-hand m
an, but is himself not a Sinner; it is his sp
ear, Canossa, that is the Sinner--a Forbid
den Weapon given life by an Evil Eye--and
 its sin has become his burden.

accessory.name: Magic Transceiver
accessory.detail: A transceiver made with spellcraft. \n[5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, Ups chain bonus.

name: Julien, Dark Spy
story:
Julien the Dark Spy 

Late one night, Julien stands on the parap
ets of the Black Fang's castle, talking to a
 woman on his transceiver. When the conv
ersation ends, the sun has begun to rise. 
Lt. Julien Law of the Empire's Zero Battali
on has ended his mission.

accessory.name: Magic Transceiver+
accessory.detail: The heart pains at his own words of betrayal. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, Ups chain bonus.

name: Zeke
story:
Zeke

Though Zeke is covered head to toe in sca
rs and metal shards still lodged into his fl
esh, he is as calm as a lake on a day witho
ut wind. He does not talk about his past. I
t would only scare people; he does not wa
nt others suffering for his sake.

Zeke the Sacrifice

He dashed after the girl. Alarms rang as th
e men in the towers fired at them. "Don't 
go that way," he cried, in vain. Finally, he 
caught up, his hand grabbing hers. There 
was a click, followed by an explosion; he d
idn't wake up until years later.

accessory.name: Fang of Sacrifice+

name: Gawain
story:
Gawain

Gawain takes the tea to his master. He ha
s timed it so the tea is just the right temp
erature by the time he delivers it. He arriv
es; his master wakes a minute later, rouse
d by the smell of tea. And so, another day

Gawain the Librarian 

Gawain shelves the books with utmost pre
cision. Once his master has read a new bo
ok, she pours over every book she has rea
d to look for even the slightest discrepanc
y that affects the timeline she has establis
hed in her head.

accessory.name: Librarian's Tea+

name: Lilia
story:
Lilia

[FF1493]GD---- Month --, -----day[-]
When I lost the necklace my father gave m
e, I threw a fit. Mother tried to calm me do
wn by giving me her necklace, but it did n
ot placate me. So, she told me she would 
look for it the next day. She never came b
ack.

story:
Lilia the Fiery Sweetness

[FF1493]GD---- Month --, -----day[-]
As time went by, I grew stronger. I vowed
 never to cry again until I had achieved wh
at my father, the king, and my mother sou
ght: a Western Country freed from the clu
tches of the Invaders who took my mother
.

story:
Godfrey

Godfrey once believed all were equal in th
e eyes of the Lord. But the gods who had 
rapidly climbed the ranks now looked dow
n on him as an inferior being, one unwort
hy of being a god. Slowly, the kindness in

story:
Godfrey the Triumphant 

One day, Godfrey arrived at an idea: If he 
sought equality, he would have to defeat 
all who stood above him and impose it. An
d so, he sought out the absolute power he
 needed to return the world to a state of p
ure equality.

name: Shogun
story:
Shogun

[FF1493]Do You Need Assistance?[-]
Looking to start a proxy war, crush a rebe
llion, or mediate a fight?
Call JASON! We offer equipment repairs, c
ombat knowhow, and soldier training!

Contact us now at:
3-535 West Panzile.

Shogun the Raging Bull

Jett drank the liquid. It didn't quench so m
uch as burn, this "alcohol" recently impor
ted from the West. He was tailing a man--
Shogun--drinking on the other side of the
 room. Suddenly, several shots rang out. T
hat was when it all started.

name: Teddy
story:
Teddy

[FF1493]Teddy's Notes[-]

The Professor Teddy

Crystallized jelmols can be fused with just

story:
Amber

[FF1493]Do You Need Assistance?[-]
Looking to infiltrate a big corporation or s
neak into a hidden base? Call JASON! Our
 recon is fast and sharp, and we leave no t
rail behind!

Contact us now at:
3-535 West Panzile.

story:
Amber the Agile Fox 

She lost everything that day, including he
r heart. That made her the ideal agent, wi
lling to commit any vile act without hesita
tion. Eventually, she was given a codenam
e, A, for Amber--for her soul was trapped
 forever in a very deep place.

story:
Hakuhi

Hakuhi serves the Emperor of Zipang in th
e capital of Yamato--named after the hero
 who defeated the gods. The Emperor doe
sn't rest, and Hakuhi worries if he takes il
l, the land will be plunged into war again. 
Unfortunately, her fears come to pass.

accessory.name: Horned Headgear

Hakuhi the Silver Lord

Mist perpetually covers this forbidden mo
untain. Hakuhi and a few others know of a
 certain legend who lives there. With the E
mperor ill, only he can keep the kingdom 
from falling apart. They find this Sword Go
d, unchanged from 20 years ago.

accessory.name: Horned Headgear+

story:
Joy

The thief and folk hero known as Joy--nam
ed after the grinning mask he always wear
s--is able to steal any treasure, no matter

gleeful approach to every job is his way o

Joy the Laughing Thief 

Joy was attempting that night to steal the
 highly protected Black Dahlia. As he ente
red the castle grounds, he saw a girl bein

name: Blu

Blu

[FF1493]Specie: Rainbow Empress[-]
The Rainbow Empress: a  butterfly so rare
, only 20 sightings have been confirmed a
round the world. I guess that means this r
abble of Rainbow Empresses burning befo

[FF1493]Specie: Razorjaws[-]
Despite their primitive jaw structures, the
se creatures seemed to fancy themselves 
as civilized.
Well, fire can put an end to that notion. I t
ook their scales and fangs; Gilva couldn't 
care less if they're alive or not.

accessory.name: Deadly Honey+
accessory.detail: Promises extinction to all creatures. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

Nadia

It's been a year since I left the Box. I was 
a Carrier Bird who sorted letters and deliv
ered them around the world. But, it was th
e letters in the Blue Mailbox I cared about
 the most; undelivered mail waiting to be 
destroyed.

accessory.detail: Sheds light on unknown addresses. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK.

Nadia the Postwoman 

Today, as always, my Blue Mailbox is filled
 with undelivered letters. I left the Box to 
dedicate my life to delivering these letter
s to the final resting places of those who 
were meant to read them--to find a home 
for these lonely letters.

accessory.name: Revealing Light+
accessory.detail: The letter becomes a path paved with hope. [5ef5f7]+750[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK.

story:
Roar

Roar cowered in the cold rain. He had left
 behind his family and friends in that horr
ible prison, and now he hated everything,
 including himself, for his cowardice. He lo
oked up; a scarecrow mockingly smiled at
 him. That was where everything started.

accessory.name: Fiery Arrow
accessory.detail: Burning arrows fired by Jacqueline. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

Roar the Solitary Beast 

Roar dodged each flaming arrow, making 
sure a few grazed his mane. People loved 
it; he was now the top attraction at the Ja
ck O'Lantern Circus, along with Aila the ti
n girl's spear dance. The applause did not
hing to soothe his soul, however.

accessory.name: Fiery Arrow+
accessory.detail: Fired with all intent of hitting Leon. [5ef5f7]+1600[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

Dora

The girl never realized the screams were h
er own. [FF1493]The Empire had executed her pare
nts...[-] The gadget attached to her head sen
t one electric shock after another. [FF1493]...For s
he was a perfect fit.[-] Soon, the girl was no

Dora the Soul Crusher

Every mission was a game to Dora, and ev
ery game involved her earning the friends
hip or love of her targets--for nothing wo
uld hurt her victims more than being betra
yed by someone they trusted. That was th
e only thing she lived for--and it pained h
er.

accessory.name: The Love of D.S.+
accessory.detail: She loves, destroys, goes mad, and laughs. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, Ups counter chance.

B.S-002-xx

[FF1493]SPECS[-]
Model:B.S-002-xx
Power: Imperial Magic Reactor
Weapon: Electromagnetic Spear Gun
Notes: Needs to be fused with test subjec
t
Lasts: 72 hours (Depends on test subject)

name: Beretta.S.
story:
Beretta.S.

Every time she killed the dragon, it would
 return--an Imperial experiment to test th
e endurance of the their undying dragon. 
In Round 802, the dragon finally bested h
er. She awoke fused to a machine, and wa
s told her name was Beretta.

name: Zoya
story:
Zoya

At the bottom of the sea live the Zoya. Yo
ung Zoya are protected by shells made of
 the carcasses of other creatures and feed
 only on the dead. Many die young from fa
lling into deep trenches, unwittingly climb
ing to shore, or starvation.

name: Zoya, Deep Sea
story:
Zoya in the Deep Sea 

The Zoya are peaceful, and therefore man
y die young. Those that live for centuries 
shed their shells and emit a bright light fr
om their heads. This attracts more prey, b
ut it is in the service of the only method o
f survival the Zoya know.

name: Waspell
story:
Waspell

Men carry "food" in their skinny arms, sm
iling even as their eyes are dead. They are
 lined up to feed Queen Waspell. She has 
plenty to eat, but it is never enough. Soon
, the only life left on the island is Waspell
 and the men.

name: Waspell, Insect
story:
Waspell the Insect Empress 

Waspell's powers allowed her to control a
ll who lived near her. The men worshipped
 her, while the women became her "food."
 And, when the women were gone, the me
n became her food. She would sprout win
gs and then fly away, leaving nothing beh
ind.

name: Mula
story:
Mula

Mula has lived here for eternity, observing
 the ways in which humans have defined "
crime" and "punishment." Her soul is miss
ing, her body drowned in shadows, and he
r eyes blinded by the sun; but the giant e
ye she carries in her hand sees all.

name: Lloyd
story:
Lloyd

Lloyd was set for a life in the clergy, even
 before he was born. All his life, he was ta
ught that there was one god, and that all 
mortals who proclaimed themselves as su
ch were his enemies. In this, Lloyd was mo
re devout than anyone else.

accessory.name: Symbol of God
accessory.detail: He grips it and offers it to his "God."[5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: The Radical Lloyd
story:
The Radical Lloyd

Lloyd never doubted the word of his god, 
which he had heard and obeyed all his life
. So, he executed everyone in his convent
. He then executed dragons, which brough
t to him the false gods he had been taugh
t about. He executed them as well.

accessory.name: Symbol of God+
accessory.detail: All enemies of "God" require his justice. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Wolvol
story:
Wolvol

[FF1493]GD7018 Month 50, Darkday[-]
I think it was fate. One rainy day, I was wa
lking through the woods, when I detected
 a trace of blood in the air. I followed it to
 a boulder, under which were his parents.
 They'd died trying to protect this little gu
y.

accessory.name: Rain-Soaked Pet
accessory.detail: A pet that refuses to take to its master. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Wolvol, Wolfskin Hero
story:
Wolvol the Wolfskin Hero

[FF1493]GD7018 Month 54, Darkday[-]
This little guy's been a pain ever since I b
rought him home. He doesn't bite anymor
e, but he tips over food and kicks sand in 
my face. Still, I can't get mad. At night, he
 comes into my bed and cries like he did t
hat day.

accessory.name: Rain-Soaked Pet+
accessory.detail: Secretly fears losing someone again. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Thea
story:
Thea

Everyone knows who Thea is, but they've 
never seen her. She travels in their dream
s, flitting from dream to dream with quiet
 grace. Thea herself has no idea if she exi
sts or not; all she knows is she's been flyi
ng through dreams for millennia.

accessory.name: Dream-Travel Feather
accessory.detail: Needed to fly from dream to dream. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Thea, Dream Savior
story:
Thea the Dream Savior 

Thea had become aware of a change in ev
eryone's dreams. Something known as a d
ragon had begun appearing, causing destr
uction and mayhem. Their appearance was
 not an issue to her; their destruction, ho
wever, needed to stop.

accessory.name: Dream-Travel Feather+
accessory.detail: Once lost, she'll be stuck in that dream. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Orcus
story:
Orcus

There was once a paradise where the harv
ests were rich and the people were happy
. Then, the famine came. It lasted for year
s and years. Finally, the people took up w
eapons and marched against their king. Th
e king began to panic.

accessory.name: Ashes of Despair
accessory.detail: Covers a land that was once rich in harvest. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Orcus, Death Bringer
story:
Orcus the Death Bringer 

When King Orcus came to, he was holding
 a sword. In front of him spread a field sca
ttered with the bodies of his subjects; the
 people who betrayed him. In that momen
t, the king vowed to destroy this paradise
 and turn it all into dust.

accessory.name: Ashes of Despair+
accessory.detail: Eden was cursed and put to eternal rest. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kylt, Magic Maker
story:
Kylt the Magic Maker

Kylt packs his bags. The executioner asks
 if she has any final words. He looks aroun
d the empty room. She shakes her head. H
e silently opens the door. The axe goes up
. He cries at this act of betrayal. She close
s her eyes and smiles.

accessory.name: Spellcraft Remedy++
accessory.detail: Suppresses the effects but does not cure. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Meril, Fallen Sister
story:
Meril the Fallen Sister

Meril's brother lay in her arms, blood pou
ring out the large hole in his chest. She h
ad loved him; it was a sin she learned to l
ive with. But, all at once, the memory left 
her. She gave a catlike laugh and began to
 feed on her brother's corpse.

accessory.name: Rosary of Penance+
accessory.detail: Eaten away in the light of the moon. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Leo, Lord of Orphans

Leo the Lord of Orphans

Breakfast, school, lunch, dinner, bath time
: that was the daily routine they set up aft
er taking over the orphanage. At the end 
of the day, Leo looked at the date: Nine y
ears since leaving the Lost Blonde, and tw
o since she passed away.

accessory.name: Polar Bear Bag++
accessory.detail: Packed with memories from those days. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Bonny, Magical Lolita
story:
Bonny the Magical Lolita

She brings excitement and pain to past an
d future! She might look sweet, but don't 
be fooled! She'll tie you up, crush you, sm
ash your head! Beat you and squash you a
nd drown you in a sea of blood! She's the
 Magical Lolita, Bonny the Witch!

accessory.name: Flitting Partner++
accessory.detail: Starts singing when in a good mood. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cypher
story:
Cypher

Cypher had been favored to win the tourn
ament, an exam taken by all first year Roy
al Knights. But it came to an end fast with

as his eyes--Cain, who would go on to bec
ome Cypher's best friend.

Months after that chaotic tournament, Cyp
her was called away from training to join a
 team charged with slaying a certain drago

, Allen, Luca, and Cain: the four heroes wh

Alain and Noir searched for Queen Jeanne
 as they always did. It was hard work, but 
Noir enjoyed it. He felt comfortable being

But it all changed that day.

Noir saw Alain, his back turned to him. He

omach. The knight said something, and Al
ain grabbed the sword. He then pulled Jea
nne's sword out of her.

[FF1493]GD---- Month --, -----day[-]
Having negotiated a truce with the Invade

Valist & Jill

Woke up under a bunch of rubble. It was d
ark, but I could see colors--and that I was
 now a machine.
[FF1493]-------------------------[-]
I woke up, rubble all around me. There wa
s no light, but I could see. That's when I r
ealized I had become a machine.

Valist & Jill the Twin Souls

Looks like I'm stuck with some girl. Jill. W
hat the hell were they thinking, putting us
 together?!
[FF1493]-------------------------[-]
I wish this Valist person inside me would 
go away. He upsets me so much! And this
 ugly body...how will I ever get married no
w?!

Eureka the Tome Destroyer

All that Eureka saw felt hollow--all part of
 a never-ending war. A cycle of emptiness
. She burned her Forbidden Tomes so the
 history in them would never be repeated 
again. Yet, it repeated, and so, she decide
d to reverse the course of the world.

name: V, Final Weapon
story:
V the Final Weapon

A young woman from the 32nd District wa
s chosen to carry the DNA of the Alpha, B
eta, Gamma, Delta, and Omega and becom
e the V prototype. The hope was that she 
would be able to control the strong-willed
 Omega DNA--but a bomb was put in her b
rain, just in case.

accessory.name: Final Core+
accessory.detail: Reproduced through much weapons research. [5ef5f7]+100[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Lancelot
story:
Lancelot

Lancelot takes breakfast to his master on 
a silver tray as he does everyday, though 
she has barely eaten in a millennia. She w
ill awake to the smell of the tea brought b
y the White Librarian, and begin another d
ay at the Forbidden Library.

name: Lancelot, Secretary
story:
Lancelot the Secretary 

Lancelot cleans the pens to the sound of n
umerous clocks ticking. Many pens are us
ed to write every book, as every fact his m
aster writes reflects the entirety of histor
y. By using different pens, she makes con
nections between facts more clear.

name: Raul
story:
Raul

Raul hated books. He saw them as giant c
lusters of lies packed with words that sho
wed only what the writer and reader want
ed to see. But more than anything, he hat
ed books because of his foster father, the
 publishing magnate d'Artagnan.

name: Raul, Book Detester
story:
Raul the Book Detester 

Raul was born to a family that had long en
joyed the trust of the Capital and  the reg
ard of the locals. But his family was ruined
 by a novel rumored to be based on their r
eal-life criminal exploits. The author was t
he man who took Raul in: d'Artagnan.

name: Joel
story:
Joel

Once night fell, Joule would tell Joel stori
es-- about the world, music, books, Forbid
den Tomes. In the morning, the door to th
eir cellar would open, and Joule would be
 lifted out by his chains, smiling reassurin
gly down at his little brother.

name: Joule, Joel
story:
Joule with the Joel's Soul

Joule stood before a dead couple and thei
r 5 kids. His body was etched with every d
etail about his little brother--except for th
e illness that took his life 21 days ago. Hi
s enemies vanquished, Joule fell into a de
ep sleep--and Joel awakened.

name: Basson
story:
Basson

Basson never rued the fact that he was bo
rn from a book. It was who he was. Since h
is birth and life meant nothing to him, he 
was able to live in the "now." He took up m
usic, in hopes he would one day encounte
r music he would never forget.

name: Basson, First Player
story:
Basson the First Player

The Quintet played on, their sound rough 
and discordant. Finally, the sound died, o
nly for the silence to be broken by laught
er. It was Fluta, their leader. The other fou
r joined in. Basson was happy; this was th
e "now" he had sought.

name: Orbo
story:
Orbo

Orbo was a Spell Breaker. Having been bo
rn from a book, he had no family or friend
s. And so, alone he played his music day a
fter day--until one day, his master brough
t home four others like him. He put them 
in a group and called them the Quintet.

name: Orbo, Second Player
story:
Orbo the Second Player 

Orbo enjoyed nothing more than playing m
usic with his friends behind his master's b
ack. By now, the Quintet had become quit
e good, their harmony improving by the d
ay. Orbo finally had someting like a family
--but it was not to last.

name: Horun
story:
Horun

For Horun, his purpose in the world was t
o satisfy his master. By making his master
 happy, Horun also felt happy, whether he
 was being hit, kicked, or choked; whethe
r he had his flesh seared by hot iron, his h
air pulled, or his bones broken.

name: Horun, Third Player
story:
Horun the Third Player 

As Horun washed the blood from his face 
one day, he was met by four others like hi
m, born from books. They invited him to p
lay music with them. "I want my master to
 be happy," he said. "Are you happy?" one
 of them asked. A tear fell from Horun's e
ye.

name: Clarine
story:
Clarine

Clarine had even fewer memories than the
 others in the Quintet who were born from
 books. She was a mistake, a product of an
 abandoned manuscript. She could not rem
ember even the strange sound she would 
sometimes hear in the distance.

name: Clarine, Fourth Player
story:
Clarine the Fourth Player 

Clarine was the deftest of the Quintet, the
 blank pages in her past quick to absorb h
er lessons. As she played, relishing the lo
ok of surprise on her friends, she was join
ed by Fluta, and then Orbo, and finally Ba
sson. That was their first concert.

name: Fluta
story:
Fluta

Born from a book, Fluta did not have drea
ms. She was stitched together from the pa
sts of many strangers; nothing she did or
 thought felt true to her. She had no drea
ms of her own and simply trained to becom
e a Spell Breaker as she was told.

name: Fluta, Fifth Player
story:
Fluta the Fifth Player 

Having met four like herself, Fluta at last 
had a dream. She would keep practicing w
ith her Quintet--behind their master's bac
k--until their tiny concerts had finally rea
ched audiences around the world. Alas, he
r dream was not to be.

name: Lily
story:
Lily

When Lily writes, her words lift off the pa
ges and become men and women, and obj
ects that define them. And so, she is kept
 asleep. She sleeps until that day the worl
d begins to change and her master requir
es the use of her powers.

name: Yurika Lily
story:
Yurika Lily

The time nears. Lily quietly opens her eye
s.

name: Erasing Spirit
story:
Erasing Spirit

[FF1493]For Mega Fusion Reset[-]
This artificially created product of science
 can be used in Mega Fusion to reset all b
onuses the unit has earned through Mega
 Fusion.
[FF1493]Gold and units used in the fusions will no
t be returned.[-]

name: Venom
story:
Venom

For Venom, making poison was an art. It w
as not about killing the victim; it was abou
t making them suffer helplessly for as lon
g as possible until the inevitable happene
d. And now, he had created his masterpie
ce: a poison that invaded the mind.

accessory.name: Ancient Blood

Venom the Poison Maker

Venom had created poison for the Empire
 from a dragonization crystal. He now nee
ded a test subject he could monitor closel
y. At that moment, his wife, pregnant with
 the their second child--Sigmund--walked
 in. Venom touched her stomach and smile
d.

story:
Setsuri

Setsuri trudged through the blazing castle
 with the sister she had raised like a daug
hter on her back. Suddenly, Setsuri stopp
ed and gently laid down her sister. Ahead
 stood a god burning with rage. Setsuri no
cked and let fly her final arrow.

accessory.name: White Hair Ornament

story:
Setsuri the White Fire 

The village had waited patiently for the tim
e to revolt, but the plan was cut short by 
the god's two disciples. Setsuri aimed her
 arrow at the last remaining villager, a cry
ing red-haired baby. The baby looked up a
t Setsuri---and smiled.

accessory.name: White Hair Ornament+

There was a samurai known for the rapid t

lothing told him that across the ocean wa

.

In the Western Realm, the Woodpecker wa

h 5 quick thrusts of his needle, he disarm

 then came up to him and offered to take 
him to the top gunman in the land: Don Po
lta.

Orcan brought a sense of honor to the A.

Boss Elphi Apollos hoped would one day c

n she died--as did four of the Dons--and t

Orcan despaired at the new Dons--each o

der turn to criminality. He received even m
ore bad news: His old friend, the chief of 
the Razorjaws, had been attacked and kill
ed. He suspected a conspiracy.

The Ancients live in the Eastern Realm, bu

The Grail is made from and holds Charis' b

[FF1493]Emma Freid's Flower Tips[-]
Hello! Emma Freid here with this week's f

ics that all plants need: water, sun, and dr

[FF1493]Emma Freid's Flower Tips[-]
Hello! Emma Freid here with this week's f
lower tips! Dig a huge hole, and fill it with
 ground dragon brain, some dirt, dragon g
uts, more dirt, seeds, and even more dirt,

As a young boy, Kurenai admired the Teng

Since ancient times, the winged Tengu an

ingless. That was how he came to join forc

story:
Vincent

Eight years ago, Imperial forces crushed V
incent, head of the House of Buffalo, and 
his attempt to win back his family's land, 
taking his wife and child. This time, Vince
nt thought, things would be different. He 
had a powerful ally in Dora.

accessory.name: Mask of Fear
accessory.detail: Disguises an all too pure heart via fear. [5ef5f7]+850[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC.

name: Vincent, Trusting
story:
The Trusting Vincent

Vincent attacked from the south, while Do
ra went in from the north. He made his wa
y to the cell where his wife and child were
. Dora was already there. Suddenly, a cage
 fell on him. He watched in horror as Dora
 swung her blades at his wife and child.

accessory.name: Mask of Fear+
accessory.detail: Does not induce as much fear as hoped. [5ef5f7]+1550[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC.

name: Papirus
story:
Papirus

The Tower of Babelodia in the north of the
 Eastern Realm is full of mystery. Living th
ere is Papirus, one of the Ancients, and it
s beastmen guards. As the surrounding ar
ea is full of Soul Residue, few have manag
ed to go there and meet these creatures.

accessory.name: Moonlight Tablet
accessory.detail: Ancient text covers this glowing tablet. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, Ups weakness damage.

name: Papirus, Vigilant Beast
story:
Papirus the Vigilant Beast

Papirus and its beastmen guards sit in the
 Tower of Babelodia all day, monitoring th
e nearby area--though not even dragons v
enture here due to the Soul Residue. The 
five creatures are said to be highly intellig
ent and capable of telepathy.

accessory.name: Moonlight Tablet+
accessory.detail: The Seven Ancients can decipher the text. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & REC, Ups weakness damage.

name: Blazon
story:
Blazon

[FF1493]Dearest Princess[-]
O, Princess! Take my hand in marriage! Fo
r you, I would burn in fires and swim in bo
iling water! Meet me at the Pond of Magm
a when the Land of Fire begins to rumble!

Blazon de Volcane

name: Blazon, Fiery Knight
story:
Blazon the Fiery Knight

[FF1493]To My Dearest Princess[-]
Princess! My great love! Did my burning p
assion perhaps make you recoil?! Fear no
t! My fires may singe your heart, but my e
mbrace is as warm and gentle as a blanke
t!

Blazon de Volcane

name: Blazon, Inferno Knight
story:
Blazon the Inferno Knight

Princess! Why have you rejected me?! Is t
here another man?! If so, I will destroy hi
m! But if even this does not move you, I w
ill burn you into ashes and clasp you to m
y chest in the Land of Fire to declare my e
ternal love for you!

name: Eisover
story:
Eisover

[FF1493]My Beautiful Princess[-]
O, Princess. Will you not take my hand in 
marriage? I would walk through the colde
st blizzard just for you. Meet me at the Ab
yss of Crystals when the Land of Ice begin
s to freeze.

Eisover LeFrost

name: Eisover, Freezing Knight
story:
Eisover the Freezing Knight

[FF1493]To My Beautiful Princess[-]
O, Princess. My beautiful princess. Please
 do not fear my iciness. Though my love m
ay freeze the world over, my embrace will
 protect you from such a glacial outcome.

Eisover LeFrost

name: Eisover, Arctic Knight
story:
Eisover the Arctic Knight

Princess, why will you not accept my love
? Is there somebody else? If so, I will bur
y him deep beneath the seas of this froze
n land...or else encase you in ice and emb
race you with my arms in the Land of Ice t
o declare my eternal love.

name: Iverie
story:
Iverie

The beautiful princess had a problem: she
 always fell in love with her suitors. One d
ay, the Prince of Ice and Prince of Fire cam
e to propose to her. Their fiery and cool n
atures delighted her and made her forget 
all her problems.

name: Iverie, Wavering Heart
story:
Iverie the Wavering Heart


The princess hurried to a secret dungeon 
where lay eight princes, bright red carpet
s of blood extended from them to her feet
. She answered each suitor with a "no." Sh
e now held out hope for the Princes of Fir
e and Ice who would storm in very soon.

name: Zamerie Jr
story:
Zamerie Jr.

Zamerie Jr. is Zamerie's first child, and Za
merie hopes he will one day take over his
 business. Unlike his father, Junior is very
 curious, but has a short attention span lik
e his father. He has a tendency to wander
 away and become lost.

name: Zamerie Sr.
story:
Zamerie Sr.

Zamerie has been reborn, triggered by his
 child coming into danger. The trigger sho
uld have been the birth of his child, but co
wardice had held him back. He is now a ne
w man, his heart and mind as pure as can 
be.

name: Demi Artie
story:
Demi Artie

Raised since birth to destroy the archfien
d who would eventually arise, Artie now tr
avels on his way to defeat the Gray One. H
is companions are a sacred sword he was 
given as a child and the knight Angie, who
 knows Artie better than anyone.

name: Demi Angie
story:
Demi Angie

Angie travels with Artie, the hero destine
d to slay the archfiend of legend who has 
arisen to turn the world into ash. The Gra
y One now threatens the Golden Realm wh
ere Angie lives, so the king, Artie's father
, has sent the two after Him.

name: Sekito
story:
Sekito

Fifteen years after the war, poverty and ch
aos still ruled the land of Zipang. Led by t
he desert nomad Sekito, the people began
 to rebel against the Emperor. One day, Se
kito led his men into the Imperial Palace, 
and was met by a fiery man.

accessory.name: Rusty Red Flask
accessory.detail:
A flask filled with cheap Dry Yamato.
[5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-800[-] ATK.

name: Sekito, Red Rust Rebel
story:
Sekito the Red Rust Rebel 

The mood was grim inside the Palace. The
 Emperor's Eight Blades debated who cou
ld lead the kingdom now that the Emperor
 had been killed. Sekito only wondered wh
ich of these Blades had betrayed the Emp
eror and cut him down.

accessory.name: Rusty Red Flask+
accessory.detail: A flask filled with expensive Sweet Amagi. [5ef5f7]+2200[-] HP, [d9419a]-1000[-] ATK.

name: Telul
story:
Telul

[FF1493]Today's Good News![-]
Old woman got better!
Someone took in my cat!
Mr. Zeze's shop a hit!
Kilhi and Marie made up!
[FF1493]Other News[-]
Got a bit sick.
Got kicked out of home.
Lost my wallet.
Lost all my friends.

accessory.name: Boots of Fortune
accessory.detail: Picked these boots up in a foreign town. They bring happiness. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-400[-] ATK & REC.

name: Telul, Happy Prince
story:
Telul the Happy Prince 

Since he was born, Telul has had the powe
r to make everyone near him happy. Telul 
loves to see people smiling, even if it is al
ways followed by him being stoned, kicke
d out of inns, and harassed out of towns, 
all for no apparent reason.

accessory.name: Boots of Fortune+
accessory.detail: Has been unable to see anything but happiness since wearing them. [5ef5f7]+2200[-] HP, [d9419a]-500[-] ATK & REC.

name: Ruche
story:
Ruche

Just my luck. I wasn't gonna die without t
aking down at least one more Imperial sol
dier. Found this one sap looking at me lik
e he felt sorry for me, so I bit down hard o
n his right arm. He didn't even flinch. Tha
t's when I blacked out.

accessory.name: Dragon Bandage
accessory.detail: A bandage that reduces aftereffects of a special operation. [5ef5f7]+1[-] Soul at start of quest. (Only 1 equippable per unit)

name: Ruche, Dragon Arm
story:
Ruche the Dragon Arm

Just my luck! Turns out those Imperial sci
entists turned me into the right arm of tha
t sap I tried to kill. And now, they want hi
m dead. Don't know what's going on, but 
all he does is whine about his sister all da
y. Kill me already.

accessory.name: Dragon Bandage+
accessory.detail: Removing it will end his journey with the dragon. [5ef5f7]+2[-] Souls at start of quest. (Only 1 equippable per unit)

name: Ophelia
story:
Ophelia

The king stared into the maw of the drago
n. Around him lay the bodies of his 20 gu
ards. But then, with the swish of a sword,
 the dragon's head flew into the air. The 1
3-year-old king gazed in awe at Ophelia, y
oungest ever Royal Knights Commander.

accessory.name: Ribbon of Binding
accessory.detail:
That which the mother ties her daughter's hair with upon her return.
[5ef5f7]+1300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & REC.

name: Ophelia, Knight Queen
story:
Ophelia the Knight Queen 

Ophelia prepared to leave for war--still a 
soldier even as queen. The king came to h
er with their daughter Maria, who, as alwa
ys, handed Ophelia a red ribbon--a promis
e that she would return to tie Maria's hair
 with it. Her promise went unmet.

accessory.name: Ribbon of Binding+
accessory.detail: Never to be tied again, the ribbon flies in the wind like her hair. [5ef5f7]+2000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-600[-] HP & REC.

name: Six
story:
Six
