accessory.name: Feather of Illusion
accessory.detail: Repeatedly disappears and reappears, like an illusion. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & REC.

name: Six, Shadow Glutton
story:
Six the Shadow Glutton

Rumor had it that Six was not of this worl
d, and [0040FF]Hello.[-] visiting from a [0040FF]Pleased to me
et you.[-] a relationship like [0040FF]My name is Six,
 what you[-] Glutton Queen [0040FF]know as Standar
d Weapon[-] include Three [0040FF]Mk 6. I do not lik
e this name. Now, let us begin.[-]

accessory.name: Feather of Illusion+
accessory.detail: Eventually, the illusions swallow the world whole. [5ef5f7]+2000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-600[-] HP & REC.

name: Grimda
story:
Grimda

Grimda was abandoned as a child. She wa
s raised in the Forest of Werewolves, and 
could converse with beasts. A kindly were
wolf even taught her the human tongue--b
ut Vanal knew the blood of the Red in Grim
da would make her hunt down Vanal some
day.

accessory.name: Red Wolf Headband
accessory.detail: A red hairband, her last memento from her childhood days. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-650[-] ATK.

name: Grimda, Crimson Hunter
story:
Grimda the Crimson Hunter

Grimda was a legend among hunters, for o
nly she was brave enough to hunt the infa
mous werewolves. The frightened people 
called her the Crimson Reaper, the Red De
vil. She didn't care; people bored her. She
 entered the woods, looking for new prey.

accessory.name: Red Wolf Headband+
accessory.detail: Soaked in the smells of both humans and beasts. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-750[-] ATK.

name: Marina
story:
Marina

I'm Marina, and I'm here to protect the oc
ean! If I catch you ever taking part in shad
y deals or land grabs in this lovely blue w
orld where I was born, why, I'll chase you 
down and punish you! I'll rip your guts ou
t and feed them to the fish!

accessory.name: Hat of the Waves
accessory.detail: A gift from her sister, the hat is in the shape of a sacred sea monster. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-650[-] REC.

name: Marina, Ocean Protector
story:
Marina the Ocean Protector

Marina's lovely smile did nothing to distra
ct the pirate captain from the fact she was
 holding him in the air by his neck. Around
 him lay his crew of 50, shot to pieces. He
 told her everything. She then tossed him
 away and made her way to Gilva.

accessory.name: Hat of the Waves+
accessory.detail:
She found it drifting in the waves, thus beginning her journey for revenge.
[5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-750[-] REC.

name: Sylvia
story:
Sylvia

[FF1493]Today's Itinerary[-]
6:00: Wake up. 6:03: Wash face. 6:18: Ge
t dressed. 6:56: Leave. 7:00 Break fast. 7
:03: Leave. 7:05: Read messages. 7:15 Re
ply to messages. 7:21 Wash hands. 7:32: 
Ready report for gods' banquet 7:38: Lea
ve. 7:42: *Top secret*

accessory.name: Holy Scheduler
accessory.detail: Contains top secret details of her master's itinerary. [5ef5f7]Raises[-] ATK of unit  during counter.

name: Sylvia, Godly Secretary
story:
Sylvia the Godly Secretary

Sylvia is the secretary of a god. She does 
what is necessary to make sure everything
 goes exactly as scheduled--something sh
e vowed when she took on the job 17 yea
rs ago. Since then, all has gone according
 to plan for the god she serves.

accessory.name: Holy Scheduler+
accessory.detail: Her master is booked full for the next one thousand years. [5ef5f7]Raises[-] ATK of unit  during counter.

name: Ren
story:
Ren

Ren, a traveling doctor, has seen his shar
e of odd illnesses, but none have posed a
 challenge to his deep knowledge. He trea
ts the poor and lives not in Yamato, but in
 the woods outside the capital. One day, h
e finds a panda hair clip in the woods.

accessory.name: Chart of a Fire God
accessory.detail: Contains details of a certain patient's progress. [5ef5f7]Raises[-] ATK of unit  during follow-up.

name: Ren, Drifter Medic
story:
Ren the Drifter Medic 

After his morning shift treating children, R
en treats the girl he found near the bear-c
at hair clip he picked up in the woods. He
r eyes are lost, her mouth silent, and her 
memory probably gone. The wind blows h
er red hair, and he whispers her name.

accessory.name: Chart of a Fire God+
accessory.detail: Time is needed to mend the wounds of a broken heart and body. [5ef5f7]Raises[-] ATK of unit  during follow-up.

name: Kopi
story:
Kopi

Kopi is the oldest of the four beastmen se
rving Papirus, the Ancient. He sleeps peri
odically to rejuvenate his body via photos
ynthesis, a process that grows longer with
 every rest. His current slumber has now l
asted for 300 years.

accessory.name: Entrapment Crystal
accessory.detail: A quartz vessel, inside which is trapped a fairy that drifts through dreams. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] REC, [d9419a]-600[-] ATK.

name: Kopi, Dreamy Beast
story:
Kopi the Dreamy Beast

Kopi lives in his dreams, fulfilling various 
duties before waking up. The reason he ha
s been asleep for 300 years is that he has
 been busy protecting the Dream Fairies, 
who have come under attack by evil dream
-devouring dragons.

accessory.name: Entrapment Crystal+
accessory.detail: It is not meant to imprison her, but to protect her from being devoured. [5ef5f7]+2000[-] REC, [d9419a]-1000[-] ATK.

name: Battle Varsh
story:
Battle Varsh

When Varsh arrived, half of the Hunters w
ere dead. Soul Residue pierced his armor 
and ate away at his flesh as he walked tow
ard the source of evil--a newborn dragon,
 brought into the world to consume and d
estroy the hatred directed at it.

name: Zeke, Enhanced
story:
Zeke the Enhanced 

There is a suit of armor made from metal e
xtracted from dragon scales. It is extreme
ly durable, but so taxing of one's physical
 strength that one is only allowed to wear
 it in emergencies. Zeke wore it once--the
 day he and Gurt lost half their men.

name: Nameless Dragon
story:
Nameless Dragon

Having just been born, it has no story yet
.

name: Britney
story:
Britney

Britney's a cyborg dragon killer made from
 dragon parts! She was a soldier, so her n
ame and rank are already registered! She 
can repair herself on the field and does no
t fear death! Requesting permission to tes
t Britney and the other four!
-- Oliver Alcott, Dep. Director of Lab No. 8

accessory.name: Receptors
accessory.detail: Antennae inserted into her brain so she can receive her orders. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-800[-] REC.

name: Britney, Zombie Fighter
story:
Britney the Zombie Fighter 

Britney does not sleep! I remove the bloo
d that is her fuel overnight to prevent dec
ay! Her hair color indicates her fuel level,
 which is useful! Britney, Evelyn, Marion, 
Zara, and Aileen each have their orders, w
hich can be changed remotely! We are rea
dy to begin! Now, start the test!

accessory.name: Receptors+
accessory.detail: Can cause huge migraines depending on signal strength. [5ef5f7]+2200[-] HP, [d9419a]-1000[-] REC.

name: Siam
story:
Siam

Siam knew her plan was sound; it was now
 down to a test of wills between her and h
er opponent. The server was getting close
. All at once, the cutlery and tablecloth fle
w into the air--and Siam ran out the resta
urant without paying a single coin.

accessory.name: Weasel (Maybe)
accessory.detail: A longtime pal that just showed up on her shoulder one day. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-400[-] ATK & REC.

name: Siam, Dine and Dasher
story:
Siam the Dine and Dasher 

Her knees buckled, and she fell to the san
d. Delusions assaulted her. Siam cursed h
er idiotic plan...but what was this? A food
 stand in a desert? "Rainbow Stand" read 
the sign. With what little strength remaine
d, Siam scrambled to the stand.

accessory.name: Weasel (Maybe)+
accessory.detail:
Always laidback, even when she's in danger or dining-and-dashing.
[5ef5f7]+2200[-] HP, [d9419a]-500[-] ATK & REC.

name: Aila
story:
Aila

Aila removed the last of the spears from h
er neck to much applause. As she mended
 her bloodless body backstage, she was to
ld the next stop of the Jack O'Lantern Circ
us would be the Capital. There, Aila felt, s
he would find the lost piece of her heart.

accessory.name: Faded Black Fire
accessory.detail: An item of pride; a promise made to herself. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-800[-] HP.

name: Aila, Vicious Dancer
story:
Aila the Vicious Dancer

The Capital was a war zone. Aila searched
 for the ringmaster, but found two dragon
s instead. She thwarted one as the other w
ent for her back; it was thwarted by a knig
ht with golden hair. Aila and the knight be
gan their first and final dance.

accessory.name: Faded Black Fire+
accessory.detail: Faded, damaged, and never to return again. [5ef5f7]+2000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-1200[-] HP.

name: Halul
story:
Halul

[FF1493]Renters Wanted[-]
The following conditions apply:
Must not play music.
Must not have odd pets.
Must not use gunpowder or guns in the ro
om.
Must be friendly.
Inquire at 771b Baler St.

accessory.name: Plain Hair Accessory
accessory.detail: A hair accessory given to her by her late husband. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-800[-] REC.

name: Halul, Tenant Evictor
story:
Halul the Tenant Evictor

Many people lived in that apartment. Goo
d people, like a former dancer at a desert 
tavern and a blue-haired girl with a white 
hat. There was also a twisted genius detec
tive and a self-proclaimed inventor. Halul 
wanted to kick out the latter two.

accessory.name: Plain Hair Accessory+
accessory.detail:
Still does her chores, remembering the vow they exchanged long ago.
[5ef5f7]+2000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-1200[-] REC.

name: Adam
story:
Adam

Deep underground is a prison full of crimi
nals and Sinners. Imprisoned at the lowes
t level is a man who has no idea what crim
e he committed. No matter; he has not ha
d a bath in centuries, and he has finally ha
d it. He is going to break out.

accessory.name: Enhancing Perfume
accessory.detail:
A special perfume made with a special compound through a special process.
[5ef5f7]Raises[-] ATK of unit  during counter.

name: Adam, Jailbreaker
story:
Adam the Jailbreaker

A trail of broken doors and guards were le
ft in Adam's wake. An arrow grazed his fa
ce; this was the last straw. He would forgi
ve no man nor god for scarring his delicat
e face. Howling with rage, he stormed thr
ough to the top level of the prison.

accessory.name: Enhancing Perfume+
accessory.detail: A single drop allows him to fight for 10 years without sleep. [5ef5f7]Raises[-] ATK of unit  during counter.

name: Barock
story:
Barock

The footsteps were coming his way. The m
an trembled as the smell of blood on his h
ands stung his nose. He waited for the ch
ance to open the door and slit his tormen
tor's throat--but when he opened it, he w
as met by the barrel of Barock's gun.

accessory.name: Sappy Novel
accessory.detail: An adult novel written in sickly sweet prose. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-650[-] REC.

name: Barock, Exorcist
story:
Barock the Exorcist

Barock sat at the back of his smoky office
, a drink in one hand and a pulpy novel in 
the other. The door slowly opened, and a 
young girl in black came in. Barock's sixth
 sense kicked in: this was going to be the
 month's first exorcism job.

accessory.name: Sappy Novel+
accessory.detail: Has already bought the 6th book in the series. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-750[-] REC.

name: Watson
story:
Watson

Watson packed his things for the 27th tim
e that year. He had nowhere to go, and all
 he had were his useless inventions--nois
e, smell, and muck emitters. Then a leafle
t caught his eye. He read it and jumped fo
r joy for the 28th time that year.

accessory.name: Dying Message
accessory.detail: The last thing written by the neighbor. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-650[-] ATK.

name: Watson, Water Booster
story:
Watson the Water Booster 

Watson hated his neighbor and his late ni
ght music playing. One night, two shots w
ere fired from the detective's room into h
is. Upon investigating, he found the detec
tive being held up. It was their first case: 
Murder at Black Mist Castle.

accessory.name: Dying Message+
accessory.detail: Half of it is missing, leaving its true meaning a mystery. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-750[-] ATK.

name: Seven
story:
Seven

accessory.name: Inner Eye
accessory.detail: An eye that quietly watches the outside from the inside. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] REC, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK.

name: Seven, Conqueror
story:
Seven the Conqueror

[0040FF]XXXXX
XX Y XX
X  OUR  X
XX   WOR  XX
XXX    LD,    XXX
XX   ISM  XX
X  INE  X
XX . XX
XXXXX[-]

accessory.name: Inner Eye+
accessory.detail:
It will never see anything but the Abyss.
[5ef5f7]+2000[-] REC, [d9419a]-500[-] HP & ATK.

name: Machina
story:
Machina

Over time the Holy Sword, Holy Grail, and
 Holy Crown have faded from the history o
f the Capital. They still exist, still under th
e control of a group of shadows with no fo
rm that calls itself the Order. They are the
 Capital's true rulers.

accessory.name: Ancient Cog
accessory.detail: A cog that never rusts, no matter how much time has passed. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] REC, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK.

name: Machina, Holy Overseer
story:
Machina the Holy Overseer

No one has seen or heard them, or knows
 if it even exists. What is known is that the
 Order is ruled by Machina, a collective en
tity of beings who have controlled human
 history from the shadows. They--or rathe
r, it--is one of the Seven Ancients.

accessory.name: Ancient Cog+
accessory.detail: Its composition, age, and purpose are all unknown. [5ef5f7]+2000[-] REC, [d9419a]-500[-] HP & ATK.

name: Kikyo
story:
Kikyo

The lord and vassals of the castle only vis
ited the room a few times a year. A prince
ss lived inside with her magic mallet that 
could grant any wish. She was kept there 
not to be hidden, but to keep her ignoran
t and pliable as a tool.

accessory.name: Red Bowl Fragment
accessory.detail:
A memento of her onetime servant. 
[5ef5f7]+1300[-] REC, [d9419a]-600[-] HP.

name: Kikyo, Ogre Princess
story:
Kikyo the Ogre Princess 

Rumor had it that an ogre lived in that cas
tle with a magic mallet that could seize th
e wish of any who came near. Brave warrio
rs and spellcasters ventured into the cast
le; those who fled with their lives spoke n
ot of an ogre, but of a woodpecker.

accessory.name: Red Bowl Fragment+
accessory.detail: Imbued with her feelings for the servant who traveled across the ocean. [5ef5f7]+2000[-] REC, [d9419a]-1000[-] HP.

name: Sun Spirit
story:
Sun Spirit

[FF1493]Embodiment of the Sun[-]
The sun nurtures new life.

name: Rain Spirit
story:
Rain Spirit

[FF1493]Embodiment of the Rain[-]
The rain quenches lands that have burnt i
nto ash.

name: Star Spirit
story:
Star Spirit

[FF1493]Embodiment of the Stars[-]
The stars fall upon lands
that have been destroyed by wars.

name: Moon Spirit
story:
Moon Spirit

[FF1493]Embodiment of the Moon[-]
The moon shines down on despondent lan
ds that weep day and night.

name: Isabella, Imprisoned
story:
Isabella the Imprisoned

The world had taken her parents, taken he
r home, and taken her heart. She never ha
d a place, and she eventually realized she
 never would. And, so, she decided to des
troy the world and create a new one--one
 where she belonged.

name: Baby Spirit
story:
Baby Spirit

All roads eventually lead to the same dest
ination. This is a symbol of hope for the n
ew road that the world and its people are 
about to embark on.

name: Glen
story:
Glen

Glen was born to a tribe of nomadic herde
rs known as the Kamulina. After dragons d
estroyed his tribe, Glen decided to travel 
to the Capital and join the Royal Knights-
-not for revenge, but to stop similar trage
dies from happening again.

name: Glen, Swordsman
story:
Glen the Swordsman 

Though he had killed many dragons and s
aved many people during the assault on th
e Capital, Glen and his friends were given
 no credit. Disillusioned, Glen gave up on 
the Royal Knights and set off on a new pa
th with his three newfound friends.

name: Glen, Champion
story:
Glen the Swords Champion 

Glen is a Fire Swordsman seeking to rid th
e world of dragons, inspired by the knight
 who saved him when dragons destroyed h
is people. "We all go home," she had told 
him, and then he knew--that real strength
 was being able to save others.

name: Livio
story:
Livio

Born in the Empire, Livio was forced to le
ave the Imperial Army after being struck b
y a mysterious illness. He has since roame
d the world looking for a cure. Recently, h
e has learned of the Forbidden Library wh
ere all knowledge is kept.

name: Livio, Great One
story:
Livio the Great One
 
Livio learned that the Forbidden Library n
ear the Capital was burned down years ag
o, but that another library exists somewhe
re in the world. He has now set off on a ne
w path in search of this library with his th
ree newfound friends.

name: Livio, Great Curse
story:
Livio the Great Curse

Livio is a Dark Spearman who is searching
 for a cure to his illness. He has learned o
f a Moonbow Library that appears only on
ce so often--like a mirage. Though this tip
 offers him little hope, he has no choice b
ut to pursue it.

name: Saya
story:
Saya

Since the Great Cataclysm 17 years ago, m
any cases of amnesia had come to light. S
aya was one such victim. She had no mem
ory of her mother or father, but her grand
mother in the Capital found her. Since the
n, Saya visited her once a month.

name: Saya. Archer
story:
Saya the Archer
 
After bravely defending the Capital from d
ragons, Saya went to the hospital to find h
er grandmother afflicted with amnesia--an
d clasping a letter to Saya about her pare
nts. She has now set off on a new path wi
th her three newfound friends.

name: Saya, Bright Archer
story:
Saya the Bright Archer

Saya is a Water Archer who travels to rest
ore her memory. The letter left by her gra
ndmother said her parents live in the East
ern Realm. She now travels to pick up the
 fragments of her memory before returnin
g to her grandmother.

name: Elphi
story:
Elphi

Elphi was a priestess who could hear the 
voices of dragons. Her father was Chief of
 Rainbow Valley, the dragon people's hom
e. While in the Capital on an official visit, 
she became lost in the city's alleyways--a
nd suddenly heard dragon voices.

name: Elphi, Priestess
story:
Elphi the Priestess

By detecting the dragons early with her a
bility to hear their voices, Elphi helped re
duce casualties. But now her Dragonblood
 Crystal was cracked--an ill omen. She has
 set off on a new path with her three newf
ound friends to prevent further disaster.

name: Elphi, Listener
story:
Elphi the Listener

Elphi is a Priestess of Light who travels to
 stop a potential disaster. Two of four Dra
gon Listeners have gone missing--had Elp
hi been the actual target of the assault on
 the Capital? She now travels to uncover a
 massive conspiracy.

name: Karen
story:
Karen

Karen's late mother had inflicted a curse u
pon her, one that slowly corrupted her bo
dy and would eventually corrupt her mind
. There was one way to slow the curse: de
capitate other victims of the curse--drago
ns--and bathe in their blood.

name: Karen, Red Shoes
story:
Karen the Red Shoes Girl

Every night, Karen had the same nightmar
e: her laughing as she chopped off limb af
ter limb. Yes, she spent all day cutting off
 dragon legs to bathe in their blood and s
low her curse--but she didn't realize her b
loodlust was rising dangerously.

name: Cthu
story:
Cthu

Originally summoned from a Tome as the 
Glutton Queen, Cthu was meant to exist o
nly temporarily. But by devouring a certai
n Tome, she gained new flesh and was abl
e to return in her true form. She now seek
s to devour all--including her many preten
ders.

name: Cthu, Glutton Queen
story:
Cthu the Glutton Queen

It was a massacre. Cthu's sword, claws, an
d fangs decimated the pretenders of evil. 
She grinned in the light of the moon, and 
the pretenders did so as well--desperate 
and bloody. Cthu emitted a strange catlike
 laugh and continued her slaughter.

name: Lucius
story:
Lucius

Lucius was wise, strong, and beautiful. As
 a soldier and minister, he led the people 
in healing the wounds left by the Great Ca
taclysm. People saw in him the Knight Kin
g of yore--and wise Lucius knew this mea
nt the throne was his to take.

name: Lucius, Fool
story:
Lucius the Fool

The good king's name had already been sh
attered, his countless acts of misrule havi
ng now caused more suffering than the dr
agons. Lucius changed the minute the cro
wn was placed on his head. Was this his tr
ue nature? Or was there something else?

name: Kojiro
story:
Kojiro

In Zipang, there are men and women know
n as Blades whose duty is to protect the E
mperor. The greatest of them is Kojiro, th
e woman who defeated the Sword God Mu
sashi and is said to be the equal of the leg
end known as the Fire God--her master.

name: Kojiro, Black Blade
story:
Kojiro the Black Blade

Kojiro and Musashi were raised to become
 Blades--the Emperor's guards. Kojiro was
 known for her speed, Musashi for his pow
er. Eventually, they came to lead the Eigh
t Blades. But a crisis was triggered the da
y Musashi attacked the Emperor.

name: Voof
story:
Voof

I'm Voof, and I came here to the Rainbow 
Diner to become the best dog chef in the 
world! Too bad it's closed, but I can give y
ou a taste of... What do you mean, you're 
not hungry? You're not a bird, are ya? Wa
it...you kinda look like a bird.

name: Voof, Food Seeker
story:
Voof the Food Seeker

I've gotta say, grandma, I didn't think one
 old woman would be running the "best re
staurant in the world." ...Whoa, be careful
 with that! You could hurt yourself. Let me
 just get that, and... Who're you, lady?! An
d where's that old woman?!

name: Jetterman
story:
Jetterman

[0040FF]6:30: Emma's Flower Class[-](18)
[0040FF]7:00: Jetterman[-](NEW)
It's Jetterman, the most awesome superhe
ro in the history of TV! Watch him fight th
e super-evil Bugguns with super-cool silv
er bullets! He's also got a sidekick who's 
a stone cold fox!

name: Jetterman, Steel Will
story:
Jetterman the Steel Will

[0040FF]2:30: Test broadcast[-]
[0040FF]3:00: Jetterman[-]
Daniel and Erika get to Dr. Molton's lab in
 time, but they can't use his secret weapo
n until they pay off his debts! Erika sells a
 few paintings in the doctor's collection--
but she's about to die!

name: Aegis
story:
Aegis

With every thrust of his spear, another so
ldier collapses and explodes. Hundreds of
 robots still remain, all firing at him. He co
uld dodge the shots, but instead he block
s them with his shield. The girl on his bac
k must not be hurt.

name: Aegis, Shield
story:
Aegis the Shield

She was seeking a key. She had little time
 left, but she trusted him, and so continue
d probing. As she crossed from Level 3 to
 4, 5, and 6, her senses sharpened, she fo
und the "key," she reached out, tou--
She woke up.

name: Wilhelm
story:
Wilhelm

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No.
 0132

Title: The Origin of All Sin

name: Wilhelm, Original Sinner
story:
Wilhelm the Original Sinner

Wilhelm is kept at the lowest level of a ce
rtain prison. He is the Darkest Sinner, a p
roduct of many experiments. All Sin can b
e traced to him, and so, he lives here by c
hoice-- to prevent the creation of new Sin
s and keep his heart empty of dark rage.

name: Elga
story:
Elga

Elga is a traitor who now fights against th
e Empire that created her. She needs regu
lar maintenance to prevent her flesh from
 decomposing. Elga has a companion calle
d G--a tiny satellite that can communicate
 with her via telepathy.

name: Elga, Rebel
story:
Elga the Rebel

Elga was created by the Empire, and so on
ce did exactly as told--burning towns and
 killing their men, women, and children. S
he would feel things she could not proces
s--but once she discovered this to be ang
er, she cursed her past actions.

name: Leva
story:
Leva

[FF1493]Stuff to Tell My Sister![-]
.Tiny people in the East
.Giants in the North
.The masked immortals
.Land of pitch darkness
.King of the land where everyone's asleep
.Land of seven moons
.The "holes" and "nails" leading to other w
orlds

name: Leva, Lady of the Sea
story:
Leva the Lady of the Sea

Leva is a trouble-prone tomboy and the yo
unger of two sea princesses. She travels t
he Seven Seas, using her lovely voice to c
alm raging seas and dragons alike. When s
he comes home, she tells her bedridden s
ister all about her adventures.

name: Yuri Hojo
story:
Yuri Hojo

Yuri Hojo dashed out of the house. She'd 
been late 3 days in a row; one more would
 put her in hot water for sure. As she roun
ded the corner, she bumped into somethin
g big and instinctively pulled out her weap
on. There stood a Robo Dragon.

name: Yuri Hojo, Golden Girl
story:
Yuri Hojo the Golden Girl

Yuri Hojo arrived at the Combat Base, late
 for the fourth day in a row. As she imagin
ed the fate in store for her, she was given
 a mission so out there, she thought she w
as in a movie. She was to travel back in tim
e and end this war.

name: Kairos
story:
Kairos

Kairos leads the Empire's unit charged wi
th killing Impures--Uberbloods; the Drago
nized, Insectized, and Demonized; Immort
als; and others suffering from mutated blo
od. Kairos was given the post when he de
stroyed a group run by Impures a few yea
rs ago.

name: Kairos, Punisher
story:
Kairos the Punisher

It was 15 years ago that Kairos changed h
is name. He once secretly fought with the
 Impures--until the day he shot someone 
important to him. Just before, they had m
ade a pact--one that Kairos quietly waits 
to fulfill.

name: Cassandra
story:
Cassandra

Cassandra, who served the Queen, feared
 this Alice. She had won over Walter the H
atter and was now making her way to the 
castle. She did not want to wake the Quee
n, who was in hibernation--it was not wor
th losing her head over.

name: Cassandra, Dutiful
story:
Cassandra the Dutiful Servant 

The Queen slept most of the year, and dur
ing that time, it was forbidden to enter th
e castle. All in the tiny kingdom knew and
 feared this rule. But, thought Cassandra,
 not Alice. Suddenly, the castle shook; the
 Queen of Hearts had awakened.

name: Loleta
story:
Loleta

Far above the skies is the Holy Land in wh
at was once Babel. Its ruler is Loleta, disc
iple to the Glutton Queen. She awaits the 
day when the spells will be broken so she
 can throw the kingdom into darkness onc
e again.

name: Loleta, Ruler of Magic
story:
Loleta the Ruler of Magic 

Since the Great Cataclysm 17 years ago, b
oth the gods who fell to earth and the hum
ans who they once fought continued to en
gage in pointless war. This was good as fa
r as Loleta was concerned, but not good e
nough. She wanted even more chaos.

name: Organa
story:
Organa

Organa lost her wings and fell to earth in 
the Great Cataclysm. She has lost her mem
ory and her knowledge--and has even lost
 the immortality that all fairies possess. S
he has been aging for the 17 years since t
he disaster, inside a cage.

name: Organa, Sacred Spirit
story:
Organa the Sacred Spirit 

Organa's cage hangs from the World Tree
 that gave birth to her. It reaches to the h
eavens and is always hidden by thick clou
ds--which is why so few people have ever
 seen it. Dragons avoid this home of the S
oul Vessel.

name: Sekt
story:
Sekt

Sekt is a Doll who hunts gods--though a g
oddess created him. He has a book with th
e details of every god, and a coffin that fo
rever entraps the eternal souls of the god
s while transferring their powers to him. T
here is no flaw in his design.

name: Sekt, God Killer
story:
Sekt the God Killer 

The culling of gods had been the goddess
's idea. With Babel fallen, all the gods did
 was waste the limited supply of Souls. So
, she created a Doll that would cull them a
nd hopefully make them learn from their p
ast mistakes.

name: Angela
story:
Angela

This story has not yet been written.

name: Angela, Knight Captain
story:
Angela, Knight Captain 

This story has not yet been written.

name: Angela, Knight of Honor
story:
Angela, Knight of Honor

This story has not yet been written.

name: Albert
story:
Albert

This story has not yet been written.

name: Eris
story:
Eris

Eris was born to a family of apple farmers
 in the village of Eldoir. Since her parents
 died from a mysterious illness three year
s ago, she has run the farm with her little
 sister. The apples here are blue, but their
 hue grows deeper by the day.

name: Eris, Dragonized Girl
story:
Eris the Dragonized Girl 

All of Eldoir had been struck by dragoniza
tion, spread from Fort Vastark. The top ha
lf of Eris was already dragonized. The Emp
ire planned to destroy the village and hide
 the evidence; but standing in their way w
as the dragon that was Eris's sister.

name: Nyte
story:
Nyte

The village had raised Nyte like a son and
 now it burned at the hands of demons. Cu
rie and Orcey, the closest thing he had to
 family, were in peril. Suddenly, the warrio
r in him was awakened--by a sword flying
 through the sky and into his chest.

name: Nyte, Warrior
story:
Nyte the Warrior
 
It was said that only the sword could defe
at the archfiend, and now that it had lodg
ed itself into Nyte's flesh, the two moved 
as one. As Nyte grew into a powerful warr
ior, the sword slowly took shape, awaiting
 the rebirth of the archfiend.

name: Curie
story:
Curie

Curie is a white wizard who travels with N
yte, the warrior she raised like a brother, 
to defeat the archfiend. It started when de
mons burned their village a year ago, and
 Curie intends to play her part to the end-
-though only grayness lies ahead.

name: Curie, White Witch
story:
Curie the White Witch 

Avia unlocks the gates. Nyte, the four cho
sen ones--and one animal--enter Ash Vall
ey, a land bereft of colors. But, there is no
 archfiend--not until now. Only Nyte does
 not know. And, by not telling him, Curie h
as played her part.

name: Marciella
story:
Marciella

Marciella is a martial artist who travels wi
th the warrior Nyte to Ash Valley. She join
ed him and his band after losing to him in
 battle in the City of Sand. She is sure her
 six siblings are being held by demons and
 seeks to rescue them.

name: Marciella, Fighter
story:
Marciella the Fighter 

Marciella charges at the archfiend. Six yea
rs ago, she was taken away and taught to 
believe the archfiend was the first enemy 
who would be worthy of her. She knows s
he is ready to play the part of worthy adve
rsary, even if it means her own death.

name: Nestor
story:
Nestor

Nestor is an astrologist who joined Nyte a
nd his band in the City of the Moon. He ha
s precisely plotted their journey so far by
 reading the stars, but he is also a rascal w
ho vanishes every night and gets into trou
ble--a role he enjoys very much.

name: Nestor, Clown
story:
Nestor the Clown 

The witch and mage, and now the fighter h
ad been killed by the archfiend. 
A thankless role, Nestor thought. He'd foo
led the boy by playing the fool, but the sc
ript now called for him to reveal all. He wa
s killed for it--and so the story began.

name: Avia
story:
Avia

Avia is the last of the bird dragons, found
 abandoned with the baby Nyte. Together 
they grew up, and now Avia guides Nyte o
n a hero's quest. With its high intellect an
d animal instincts, it leads the inexperienc
ed Nyte and his companions.

name: Avia, False Bird
story:
Avia the False Bird 

Avia always speaks [FF1493]the truth[-]: that Nyte is
 [FF1493]the warrior[-] destined to [FF1493]put the archfiend
 to eternal sleep[-] with his sword. His path [FF1493]
is not set in stone[-], and he [FF1493]may[-] die. But, th
e future is [FF1493]a blank canvas[-], and can yet be 
painted with [FF1493]rainbow colors[-].

name: Derst
story:
Derst

Derst is a knight in onyx armor who makes
 repeated attempts at Nyte's life. He wield
s a spear covered entirely in blades that c
ause his sword hand to drip blood. He is t
he only one with no role in this drama--an
 understudy watching from the wings.

name: Derst, Shadow
story:
Derst the Shadow 

As Derst makes his way to Ash Valley to s
eize the archfiend's throne, he is confront
ed by the witch, the mage, the fighter, and
 the clown--but no sign of Nyte. Derst, th
e understudy with no role to play in this d
rama, fights his final fight.

name: Kirik
story:
Kirik

Kirik belongs to a tribe called the Key Gua
rdians. By order of his chief, he has been 
trying, in vain, to hunt the bird dragon Av
ia that travels with Nyte. He seems to wan
t to warn Nyte about some kind of danger
, but his tribal tongue is unintelligible.

name: Kirik, Hunter
story:
Kirik the Hunter 

The Primeval Forest gives Kirik powers. A
n eighth arrow unerringly pierces his targ
et. Again, the prey falls to the ground, cra
cks open like an egg, and yields a ninth on
e. One last chance--an army of Key Guard
ians fire at the bird dragon.

name: Orcey
story:
Orcey

Orcey is a black mage accompanying the w
arrior Nyte to the land where the archfien
d is said to sleep. His powerful magic has 
protected Nyte at every point, each spell 
cast without emotion--all in the service of
 leading Nyte to his gray end.

name: Orcey, Black Mage
story:
Orcey the Black Mage
 
Curie lies dead in front of her brother Orc
ey. Nyte, having lost his greatest love, wil
l now direct his anger to the world--as the
 archfiend. Orcey knows he has played his
 final part; he will now battle the boy he lo
ves like a brother.

name: Night
story:
Night

The archfiend had a dream of a warrior, fo
rced to follow his fate on a path that he b
elieves leads to a rainbow-colored future.
-------------------------
The warrior dreamed of an archfiend who 
with his sword killed everyone he loved fo
r a gray future.

name: Lady Acquire
story:
Lady Aquire

Lady Acquire is a girl who is able to trave
l between the real world and the 2nd-and
-a-half dimension she lives in. She only tr
avels here to play the games that don't ex
ist in her world, and to visit her own perso
nal mecca: Akihabara.

name: Sheep Spirit
story:
Sheep Spirit

[FF1493]For fusion[-]
This rare Spirit was born suddenly from a 
dream on the first day of the year. It is mo
re of a sleepyhead than the typical Spirit.

name: Elkia
story:
Elkia

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No.
 0003

Title: He Who Controls All Fire

name: Elkia, Crimson God
story:
Elkia the Crimson God 

Magma-like liquid poured from the wound
s of the giant flame dragon as it writhed o
n the ground. It glared with its green eye 
at Elkia, who removed his fiery spear from
 the dragon and aimed the tip at that eye.
 The dragon would now obey him.

name: Almafi
story:
Almafi

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No.
 0004

Title: She Who Controls All Water

name: Almafi, Blue God
story:
Almafi the Blue God 

As she stood on the water surface, she sa
ng a song no human could hear. The ragin
g sea went calm as every ship sank withou
t a trace. Sleeping below Almafi was a gia
nt dragon who would awaken as the song 
ended and signaled the dawn of a new age
.

name: Lu-Wonne
story:
Lu-Wonne

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No.
 0005

Title: He Who Controls All Light

name: Lu-Wonne, Radiant God
story:
Lu-Wonne the Radiant God

The harvest had been the biggest he had 
seen in 1,000--no, 7,000 years. As Lu-Wo
nne flew through the comet-filled sky to t
he World Tree on the back of a giant drag
on, he turned to his cargo with an evil gri
n and began to plant his seeds.

name: Dormia
story:
Dormia

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No.
 0006

Title: He Who Controls All Darkness

name: Dormia, Dark God
story:
Dormia the Dark God 

The war had ended. The giant hairy drago
n lay with its head bowed, as if vowing all
egiance to the man who stood before it--D
ormia. Another man walked up to Dormia,
 and he too bowed in loyalty. It was Schne
ider, supreme commander of the Empire.

name: Riella
story:
Riella

Riella is the proudest and most powerful o
f the Four Knights of the World Tree. The 
fairies in the Tree tremble at the sight of 
her beautiful wings; 
and her siblings fear her fierce swordsma
nship when battling the Insects.

name: Riella, Shining Petal
story:
Riella the Shining Petal

The Four Knights, willed into being by the
 World Tree, were put in the care of Aurel
ia and El. They were the envy of all fairies
, but only Riella knew that the secret of th
eir blood would be their undoing lest they
 always prove their worth.

name: Magna
story:
Magna

For Magna, the World Tree was a continen
t-sized playground full of undiscovered ar
eas and life forms. As a child, she often be
came lost in this sprawling maze; every ti
me, Aurelia found her with some new spec
ies Magna had collected.

name: Magna, Fiery Explorer
story:
Magna the Fiery Explorer

Magna's curiosity could not be sated. She
 found tear-inducing mushrooms, vines th
at picked at her pouch like thieves, and m
ud-like sap that shone like a rainbow in th
e moonlight. With no one to come look for
 her, Magna continued exploring.

name: Giusse
story:
Giusse

Giusse is one of the Four Knights of the W
orld Tree and a troublemaker. He now lan
guishes in prison, punished by El for start
ing an inter-tribal fight. In the moon's ligh
t, Giusse closes his eyes, hoping to see "h
er" in his dreams again.

name: Giusse, Black Butterfly
story:
Giusse, Black Butterfly

Dead Insects fell off the burning World Tr
ee. High above in the sky, "she" looked do
wn at Giusse. Then the rain came, and "sh
e" turned her back and flew off into darkn
ess. The dream always ended there. Some
day, he too would fly off like "her".

name: Fran
story:
Fran

One of the Four Knights, Fran is responsib
le for healing the scars that remain in the
 World Tree from a long time ago when it 
was almost burnt down by humans. For th
is, she needs the foul blood and flesh of t
he Insects--her mortal enemies.

name: Fran, Arboreal Stream
story:
Fran the Arboreal Stream

At the roots of the World Tree is a place w
here pristine waters gush out, four-leafed
 plants grow, and only a single beam of su
nlight enters. It is Fran's secret--along wi
th a beautiful wing fragment she found at
 the bottom of the water here.

name: Aurelia
story:
Aurelia

After the World Tree was almost burnt do
wn by the Insect King and Queen, Aurelia 
spent centuries healing it back to life. Thi
s took a toll on her. Today, she lies comat
ose, protected by Four Knights who know
 that if she dies, so does the Tree.

name: Aurelia, Tree Goddess
story:
Aurelia the Tree Goddess

Aurelia is with a guest-- the only human t
o have climbed to the top of the World Tre
e. She enchants Aurelia with objects and t
ales from the outside world. In return, Au
relia gives a seedling of the Tree to Rosal
ie--who will go on to murder the Tree.

name: El
story:
El

Insects covered the World Tree, spreading
 their foul poison. As Aurelia fought their
 King at the top, her sister El flew to the r
oots--there was only one way to save the 
Tree. Awaiting her was the thing that was
 once her sister Welza.

name: El, Tree Servant
story:
El the Tree Servant

El has commanded the Four Knights since
 Aurelia fell into her deep sleep. The Worl
d Tree's denizens say she is haunted by h
er previous failure to save the Tree and th
e Knights, but, no. El made a vow a long t
ime ago--when she still had her sisters.

name: Welza
story:
Welza

Welza had never had to work, as her two s
isters dealt with all threats to the World T
ree. As a result, her wings failed to grow b
eautifully--and a small darkness began to
 grow in her heart. It was then that she m
et the injured Insect.

name: Welza, Mutant
story:
Welza the Mutant

Welza looked down upon the burning Wor
ld Tree in the pouring rain. Beside her wa
s the Insect King, wounded badly. His plan
 to seize the World Tree had been thwarte
d by her sisters. Holding the King in her a
rms, she flew off into the darkness.

name: Rei
story:
Rei

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No.
 0007

Title: She Who Controls All Disasters

name: Rei, God of Nothing
story:
Rei the God of Nothing

Darkness enveloped the world, bringing th
e era to an end--but not the real end. Her
 pawns had simply brought about the evil 
needed to start the world anew. Rei contin
ued down her path towards the ultimate e
nd, dragging along four broken Dolls.

name: Fire Fairy
story:
Fire Fairy

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]
When the Queen captured the Four Knigh
ts, I thought it was all over for the World T
ree. But even at that darkest moment, my
 heart was telling me that something wasn
't quite right.

name: Mish, Fire Fairy
story:
Mish 

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]
The Insects preyed on us fairies. So, why 
hadn't their Queen given over the Four Kn
ights to their King yet? In fact, as far as I 
can see, not one fairy living in the World T
ree has been killed or eaten.

name: Water Fairy
story:
Water Fairy

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]
All of a sudden, we saw something flying 
towards us--and they quickly grew in num
ber until they had covered the skies and b
locked out the sun. As our world fell into 
darkness, we saw their hideous King and Q
ueen.

name: Clover, Water Fairy
story:
Clover 

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]
All I could do was shake in the face of this
 huge army of Insects. They were spinning
 my friends into cocoons. I watched helple
ssly as their Queen came for me--but she 
was thwarted by Sir Fran, one of the Four
 Knights.

name: Light Fairy
story:
Light Fairy

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]
The Fairies were in a panic. Insects and th
eir Queen were invading the World Tree--
and now they had learned that Sir Fran ha
d been captured. Sir Riella and the rest of
 us in her battalion quickly prepared for b
attle.

name: Rose, Light Fairy
story:
Rose 

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]
Our plan was to have one unit distract the
 Insects and their Queen while the elite un
it went after the King. But, it was quickly 
dashed. Right in front of our eyes, Sir Rie
lla was spun into a cocoon by the Queen h
erself.

name: Dark Fairy
story:
Dark Fairy

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]
Dark forest. Cocoon. Capture. Many. Flee.
 Fail. Insects. Queen. Thread. Mouth. Eyes
. Arms. Legs. Breath. Dark. Dark. Dark. Vo
ice. Voice. Giusse. Help.

name: Fal, Dark Fairy
story:
Fal 

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]
Cocoon. Gap. Peek. Hear. Talking. Giusse.
 Queen. Reach out. Hand. Parry. Hand. Giu
sse. Screams. Giusse. Angry. Queen. Trap
s. Giusse. End. Giusse. Cocoon.

name: Neutral Fairy
story:
Neutral Fairy

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]
When Insects and their King invaded the W
orld Tree, I was beside where Lady Aurelia
 and Lady El lay, waiting for "her" to arriv
e to fulfill her destiny. The cocoon she sp
un me into was cold, but strangely comfor
ting.

name: Tinver
story:
Tinver 

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]
Inside the cocoon, I had a dream about th
e day Lady Aurelia fell into her sleep. As s
he closed her eyes, she told me how much
 she still loved her sister--but instead of r
egret, she showed only a gentle smile.

name: Queen Welza
story:
Queen Welza

Cocoons hung in the air from every level o
f the World Tree. The fairies who lived the
re and the Four Knights had been capture
d by the Insect Queen--they would now be
 safe from whatever was about to happen.
 Welza readied herself.

name: Queen Welza, Protector
story:
Queen Welza the Protector

Their likes and dislikes. Their passions an
d fears. Dreams. Aurelia. El. All this she h
ad wanted to talk about, and it was now to
o late. But, each of the four had sprouted
 a pair of beautiful wings--and that was al
l that mattered to her.

name: Cypher, Dual Fangs
story:
Cypher the Dual Fangs

The two swords wielded by the blue-eyed
 knight--to do his will and protect his lord
--will come to be wielded by another. The
 two pale-blue blades will one day become
 a single blue fang and slay the Dragon of
 Darkness.

name: Kiga
story:
Kiga

After 3 years at the A. Smith Trading Co., 
Kiga had yet to make any sort of mark as a
n apprentice navigator or errand boy. Yet,
 he went about his business as usual with
 a warm smile, only focused on the missio
n assigned to him.

name: Kiga, Undying Ice
story:
Kiga, Undying Ice

Thirty arrows flew at Kiga in the light of a
 full moon. He cut them down with his two
 blades and studied the girl who had come
 from the seas with contempt. The next mo
ment, her limbs flew through the air--and
 a war had been prevented.

name: Neun
story:
Neun

Neun ignored the witch's orders as usual 
and went to the Capital. There was no pur
pose to her visits, but to simply live her a
ll too brief life; doing otherwise would me
an she had broken the chains that had onc
e bound her for no reason.

name: Neun, Undying Evil
story:
Neun, Undying Evil

Neun finally found the girl on a rainy day 
that was also curiously bright and sunny. 
An evil grin spread across her face, and th
e girl returned an equally sinister smile. W
hen the last raindrop hit the ground, "Thr
ee" and "Nine" both lay dead.

name: Lyonne
story:
Lyonne
Lyonne lost his arm for the 8th time hunti
ng down the witch's enemies. He didn't m
ind the loss so much as the one enemy wh
o got away, and the shadowy doctor who t
reated him--a certain yellow rabbit--knew
 better than to bring the subject up.

name: Lyonne, Undying Beast
story:
Lyonne, Undying Beast

Lyonne lost his 9th arm capturing the 3 e
nemies now in the Fool King's custody. On
ce, they had been gods. Now, they were s
elling out their allies. They told Lyonne w
here to find the Sky God--their leader. Ly
onne prepared to lose his 10th arm.

name: Pavone
story:
Pavone

No place in the Empire was crueler than th
e East No. 3 Alliance District. No one who
 ended up there ever saw the light again. 
Yet, people still ran businesses there, as s
ome things could only thrive in that pure 
darkness deep below the Empire.

name: Pavone, Undying Beauty
story:
Pavone, Undying Beauty

Pavone's bar specialized in contraband alc
ohol and  dancers so exquisite that even t
he Empire's elite would come. Pavone use
d the cover they gave to trade information
 behind their backs--like to the blue-haire
d woman she was meeting tonight.

name: Squill
story:
Squill

No one in the unit has a name, as names o
nly give identity. No one in the unit has re
nown, as no one in the unit seeks it. No o
ne in the unit dies, as no one in the unit is
 alive to begin with. As far as anybody kno
ws, the unit does not exist.

name: Squill, Undying Crown
story:
Squill, Undying Crown

Squill tracked humidity, temperature, den
sity, and numbers so the storeroom, a larg
e chamber below the Capital, was in perfe
ct condition. Yet the witch did not entrust
 him with the key to the Door, so he did n
ot know about the bodies that lay inside.

name: Elpis
story:
Elpis

The witch lived in a tiny castle deep inside
 the forest. None who ever met her came b
ack the same; so for 100 years, the doors
 had remained shut. But they had now ope
ned to let in Lucius the Good, and the Que
en he carried in his arms.

name: Elpis, Undying Soul
story:
Elpis, Undying Soul

A long spiral staircase descended into an 
abyss below the Capital. There, halfway do
wn, the witch talked to a creature who did
 not respond--for it had been asleep for 1
7 years, imprisoned here after almost dev
ouring the world.

name: Rhinoss
story:
Rhinoss

Unable to infiltrate target destination. Ov
er.

name: Rhinoss, Undying Curse
story:
Rhinoss, Undying Curse

Infiltrated destination. Confirmed the follo
wing: an old dragon who was once human
; a cursed one drenched in the blood of de
ath; an immortal sword master who detes
ts blood; two werewolf sisters; and a baby
 dragon with no name. Over.

name: Soul Spirit
story:
[FF1493]Symbol of Friendship[-]

A very special Spirit given to you by a ver
y special friend. Cannot compare to other
 Spirits.

name: Jett the Fisherman
story:
Jett the Fisherman

This is Jett, after his childhood dream has
 come true.

You could say it's Jett in his one true form
.

name: Amber the Explorer
story:
Amber the Explorer

This is Amber, after her
childhood dream has come
true.

You could say it's Amber in her one true f
orm.

name: Shogun the Fireball
story:
Shogun the Fireball

No dreams or anything here.

Just Shogun, burned by the failings of his
 colleagues once again.

You could say it's Shogun  in his one true
 form.

name: Nash the Dog
story:
Nash the Dog

Nash opens his eyes to find his head in th
e lap of a girl singing a song that suggest
s a future as bright as the sun shining dow
n on him. She touches his cheek and, in h
is naivety, he promises a joyous future for
 the two of them.

name: Nash the Lone Wolf
story:
Nash the Lone Wolf

Snow melts on her cheek from the last tra
ces of warmth left. Her lips are shut, neve
r to part into song again. The happiness N
ash has hoped for has crumbled into dust
. No meaning lies ahead for him. And so, h
e sets off on a path for revenge.

name: Silva of Unit 6
story:
Silva of Unit 6

Odd-jobbers were the most respected peo
ple in the underworld. Of the 700 in town
, the top ones became legends, admired b
y all other odd-jobbers. Silva was one suc
h admirer, a counterfeiter who would one
 day reach the top by ousting the Red Han
dyman.

name: Redd of Unit 6
story:
Redd of Unit 6

Reddo was a transporter, one who carried
 goods for the underworld. He was always
 late as a matter of caution, but this time 
the strategy backfired. As he lay on the gr
ound, pummeled by assailants, the Hatter
 silently arrived on the scene.

name: Blueton of Unit 6
story:
Blueton of Unit 6

Blueton refused to tie himself to any of th
e many occupations offered in the underw
orld. He cherished his freedom, so his onl
y interest was in crushing anyone who dar
ed threaten it--like this newcomer who ca
lled himself the Hatter.

name: Yellen of Unit 6
story:
Yellen of Unit 6

Yellen sold flowers--but mostly the Memo
rica. One whiff of its aroma could wipe ou
t anyone's memory, but only the bad parts
. Underworld bosses often hired her for m
emory wipe jobs--which was how she cam
e to visit the Hatter one day, bouquet in h
and.

name: Purpa of Unit 6
story:
Purpa of Unit 6

Purpa was always alone, ever since her fa
ther vanished and her mother abandoned 
her as a baby. She grew up soaked in the 
poison that permeated this town to becom
e a Scrapper. One day, she was hired to "s
crap" the Hatter.

name: Rabby the Conductor
story:
Rabby the Conductor

[FF1493]Aaron is nervous. Carrol is unfazed as usu
al. And Anastasia is ready to shine. Rabby
 raises his hand, and the Crimson Quartet
 begins to play the opening song of the Ki
ngdom's first Founding Day Festival. It is 
an age of remarkable peace.[-]

name: Angelica, Savior Queen
story:
Angelica, Savior Queen

[FF1493]Bells ring throughout the Capital on a war
m, sunny day. In front of a large crowd, th
e Knight King, the hero who rid the land o
f the First Dragon, kneels before Angelica
. Then he speaks the words that fulfill his 
vow of eternity from long ago.[-]

name: Edgar the Babysitter
story:
Edgar the Babysitter

[FF1493]As usual, Edgar was at a loss. His fierce fa
ce had caused the children to cry, but put
ting on the mask designed to make them l
augh made them cry even harder. Still, he
 tried to get his twins to laugh, Walpurgis
 watching with a warm smile.[-]

name: Ayame, Family Woman
story:
Ayame, Family Woman

[FF1493]Ayame follows the path from her house un
til she is at the fields, where the man once
 known as Zero plants rice, tending the la
nd he saved. She waves, and he waves bac
k. Together they eat the rice balls she has
 made, enjoying the peace.[-]

name: Joel XXXX
story: Joel XXXX

name: Earth Spirit: Fire
story:
Earth Spirit: Fire

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]
This is material used to help the Spirit Tre
e grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise 
the tree's level.

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]

story:
Air Spirit: Dark

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]
This is material used to help the Spirit Tre

the tree's level.

story:
Air Spirit: Neutral

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]
This is material used to help the Spirit Tre
e grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise 
the tree's level.

name: Tree Spirit: Fire
story:
Tree Spirit: Fire

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]
This is material used to help the Spirit Tre
e grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise 
the tree's level.

name: Tree Spirit: Water
story:
Tree Spirit: Water

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]
This is material used to help the Spirit Tre
e grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise 
the tree's level.

name: Tree Spirit: Light
story:
Tree Spirit: Light

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]
This is material used to help the Spirit Tre
e grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise 
the tree's level.

name: Tree Spirit: Dark
story:
Tree Spirit: Dark

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]
This is material used to help the Spirit Tre
e grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise 
the tree's level.

name: Tree Spirit: Neutral
story:
Tree Spirit: Neutral

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]
This is material used to help the Spirit Tre
e grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise 
the tree's level.

name: Frigia
story:
Frigia

The Niflheim family were protectors of the
 land's renowned Eisglas. Frigia, third in l
ine to the throne, had yet to master the a
rt of Eisglas. It was a well-kept secret, bu
t the Eisglas Festival was approaching fas
t. She needed a teacher.

name: Frigia the Ice Master
story:
Frigia the Ice Master

Icy currents rolled into the city; with them
 came an ice dragon, a friend riding on its
 back. As they stared down into the city w
ith contained fury, the Eisglas across tow
n began to transform into shapes that Frig
ia had only seen once long ago.

name: Hemera
story:
Hemera

There was a land of pitch darkness, where
 everyone carried around light--for withou
t light, one might as well not have existed
. One day, a shadow of another kind enter
ed this land. It was a creature that people
 in other lands called a "dragon."

name: Hemera the Light
story:
Hemera the Light

This dragon had already killed 7--ironical
ly, it had been lured by their lights. Queen
 Hemera made a decision. She formed a tr
oupe of hunters and led them to vanquish
 this shadow. Little did she know that ther
e was more than just one shadow.

name: Fululu
story:
Fululu

FRR: Nice song.
???: Really? Not my taste.
FRR: I think it's great.
FRR: "How high the moon."
???: Ahem. Report please.
FRR: Right. Sorry.
FRR: Circling Moon II.
FRR: Took me just 2 days.
???: Pretty far from me.
[End Transmission]

name: Fululu, Moon Yearner
story:
Fululu, Moon Yearner

FRR: Huh. Last song?
???: ...not...com....ing
FRR: We are far apart.
???: ...didn't...have...
FRR: Don't worry. I knew it was a one-way
 ticket.
???: ....go....moon...
FRR: Thanks. Means a lot.
FRR: But it was worth it.
FRR: Even if there's no--

name: Vanitas
story:
Vanitas

He dug with mad abandon. He would not h
ave another chance like this. Then he did 
it. The grave was now open. Cool night air
 blew against his parched skin. But the mo
onlight never reached this undead man. F
or waiting there was the feared Gravekeep
er.

name: Vanitas the Gravekeeper
story:
Vanitas the Gravekeeper

Vanitas chatted with his coffin. He didn't 
know if anyone was inside or if it was a co
mmunicative medium; all he knew was it t
old him where to find the undead. Sudden
ly, the coffin went dead. There before him
 was a girl in black, holding his heart.

name: Linda
story:
Linda

For the thousandth time, Linda exchanged
 vows and sighed sadly. The first had died
 by lightning soon after the ceremony; the
 second, eaten by a dragon in the middle o
f his vows. Linda accepted her fate, but al
so hoped the cycle would end.

name: Linda, Marriage Jinx
story:
Linda, Marriage Jinx

In a ruined church, Linda prepared to exch
ange vows with a man she had found with
 no memory and nursed back to life. But a
s day became night, the church doors did 
not open. For the first time, Linda was fur
ious at having failed to exchange her vows
.

name: Zhivil
story:
Zhivil

Zhivil walked among the Eisglas in town, a
 friend perched on his shoulder. Everythin
g was so new to him that he failed to noti
ce everyone getting out of his way wherev
er he went. But soon, he would learn thing
s that would disillusion him.

name: Zhivil, Eisglas King
story:
Zhivil, Eisglas King

A month after settling in the city, Zhivil st
ill got dirty looks, but also  regard--for no
ne could match his Eisglas skill. One day, 
someone came banging on the door of his
 workshop. It was a princess, the third in l
ine to the throne.

name: Margaret
story:
Margaret

[FF1493]Ingredients[-]
Dragon sugar: 129 g
Bahamutton fat: 2 pieces
Fiery eggs: 66
Dragon milk: 2 cups
Desert wheat: 8,725 grains
Moonbow liquor: A dash

[FF1493]Effect[-]
Whoever eats it...eats it

name: Margaret, Blastissier
story:
Margaret, Blastissier

Margaret is an underworld confectionary 
maker, her wares coming in the form of gu
ns, swords, and bombs--tasty and deadly.
 She has recently been spotted traveling t
o the East with her apprentices and confe
ctionary shaped like heavy weaponry.

name: Olivia
story:
Olivia

Olivia had her ideal team and now needed
 a name for the company. She rejected Jet
t's idea, which led to the usual fighting. A
mber sighed, Shogun stayed out of it, and
 Daisy and Nash chuckled next to him. It w
as a time when all six were still full of hop
e.

name: O.D. the CEO
story:
O.D. the CEO

JASON. The name repelled Olivia. Five lett
ers. Her sister, forgotten. She changed he
r name to O.D. and fled to the hellhole of 
Greizal with Nash, her sister's lover. Ther
e she plotted revenge against the Empire 
and Jett--her sister's killer.

name: Neral the VP
story:
Neral the VP

Let's talk about me and Shogun--Captain 
Kuzak. [888888]But before I get started, [989898]look what
 I found in the men's room the other day.[-][b8b8b8] 
Yes, a handkerchief.[-][c8c8c8] See the stitching? St
riking, isn't it? Looks like some kind of flo
wer.[-][d1d1d1] Yep, very impressive.

name: Carrot Spirit
story:
Carrot Spirit

A Spirit born to add nutrition to a certain 
type of dish. More of an acquired taste co
mpared to other Spirits.

name: Onion Spirit
story:
Onion Spirit

A Spirit born to add sweetness to a certai
n type of dish. More prone to crying than 
other Spirits.

name: Potato Spirit
story:
Potato Spirit

A Spirit born to add thickness to a certain
 type of dish. Starchier than other Spirits.

name: Meat Spirit
story:
Meat Spirit

A Spirit born to add depth to a certain typ
e of dish. More liable to melt in your mou
th than other Spirits.

name: Spice Spirit
story:
Spice Spirit

A Spirit born to complete a certain type o
f dish. A lot spicier than other Spirits.

name: Rah-rah Spirit
story:
Rah-rah Spirit

A hot-blooded Spirit that suddenly burst 
into fire. A lot louder than other Spirits.

name: Studious Spirit
story:
Studious Spirit

A  wide-eyed Spirit who suddenly transfer
red in. Has fewer friends than other Spirit
s.

name: Injured Spirit
story:
Injured Spirit

A painful-looking Spirit who suddenly got
 into a huge accident. Takes less risks tha
n other Spirits.

name: Ghostly Spirit
story:
Ghostly Spirit

A spine-tingling Spirit who suddenly had 
an out of body experience. Hates ghosts m
ore than other Spirits.

name: Adolescent Spirit
story:
Adolescent Spirit

A wild Spirit who suddenly got bit by the 
rock 'n' roll bug. Lives a more hedonistic 
life than other Spirits.

name: Carpentry Spirit
story:
Carpentry Spirit

A Spirit who spends its life preserving the
 Spirit Shrine where more than 800,000 S
pirit Gods gather. A lot more of a craftsma
n compared to other Spirits.

name: Librarian Spirit
story:
Librarian Spirit

A Spirit who spends its whole life studyin
g the Book of Spirits, said to have been w
ritten long ago by Spirits. A lot more of an
 academic than other Spirits.

name: Capitalist Spirit
story:
Capitalist Spirit

A Spirit who spends its whole life in inves
tments and other activities that bring it m
ore wealth than any other Spirit. A lot mo
re of a millionaire than other Spirits.

name: Thieving Spirit
story:
Thieving Spirit

A Spirit who spends its whole life hiding i
ts true face from anyone else and leaving 
no evidence behind. A lot more of a myste
ry than other Spirits.

name: Artistic Spirit
story:
Artistic Spirit

A Spirit who spends its whole life creating
 mind-boggling artistic works that captiva
te all other Spirits. A lot more of a perfect
ionist than other Spirits.

name: The Masked Spirit
story:
The Masked Spirit

A heroic Spirit who has risen to the challe
nge of keeping the peace, even if there ar
en't any evildoers to speak of. A lot more 
of a busybody than other Spirits.

name: 2414178/pirit
story:
2414178/pirit

A 0/1 Spirit who, having discovered the tr
uth behind all 7142018141020, has foun
d itself lost in the 70250120 dimension. A
 lot more 18148240 than other 18781714
rits.

name: Angelic Spirit
story:
Angelic Spirit

A beautiful Spirit who floated down from t
he heavens one day wearing a sacred shaw
l. A lot less grounded than other Spirits.

name: Vampiric Spirit
story:
Vampiric Spirit

A blood-starved Spirit in a gaudy outfit w
ho hates anything that resembles a cross,
 as well as blood.  A lot more ghoulish tha
n other Spirits.

name: Alien Spirit
story:
Alien Spirit

A Spirit who speaks an alien language and
 is definitely not of this world. A lot more 
extra terrestrial than other Spirits.

name: Marathon Spirit
story:
Marathon Spirit

A Spirit who became very energetic after 
running around a lot. Has a level of energ
y unmatched by other Spirits.

name: Enlightened Spirit
story:
Enlightened Spirit

A Spirit who became a genius after losing
 itself in its studies until it had acquired a
ll knowledge. Has a level of intelligence u
nmatched by other Spirits.

name: Gambling Spirit
story:
Gambling Spirit

A Spirit who became a gambler after deve
loping an incredibly stubborn will. Has an
 inability to walk away unmatched by othe
r Spirits.

name: Adventurous Spirit
story:
Adventurous Spirit

A Spirit who became an explorer after trav
eling the world on a dare. Has an inability
 to fear death unmatched by other Spirits
.

name: Inky Spirit
story:
Inky Spirit

A Spirit who became pitch black after dec
iding it wanted to be unlike anyone else. H
as a lack of color unmatched by other Spir
its.

name: Growing Spirit
story:
Growing Spirit

A Spirit who grew up just growing and gro
wing and yet has room for growth. Is notic
eably longer than other Spirits.

name: S.P.I.R.I.T. Mk 3
story:
S.P.I.R.I.T. Mk 3

A Spirit who modified its own body to rea
dy itself for the coming war. It now runs o
n antigravity propulsion, protected by a s
hell that can resist several thousand degr
ees of heat. Is noticeably more robotic tha
n other Spirits.

name: Simple Spirit
story:
Simple Spirit

A normal Spirit who has turned out decen
tly well. Has fewer distinctive traits than o
ther Spirits.

name: Plain Spirit
story:
Plain Spirit

A plain spirit who has turned out pretty w
ell. Has less personality than other Spirits
.

name: Spirit King
story:
Spirit King

A Spirit who rules the Kingdom of Spirits.
 It seeks a certain princess. Has such a ma
jestic aura that even the idea of comparin
g it to other Spirits feels rude.

name: Spirit Princess
story:
Spirit Princess

A Spirit princess in the Kingdom of Spirits
.  It seeks a certain king. Has such a sophi
sticated aura that even the idea of compa
ring it to other Spirits feels rude.

name: Spirit
story:
Spirit

Reborn, once again.

name: Sumo Spirit
story:
Sumo Spirit

An honorable Spirit who takes on all battl
es head-on. Somewhat weak to being pus
hed out of rings compared to other Spirits
.

name: Bridal Spirit
story:
Bridal Spirit

A joyful Spirit who was raised with lots of
 love. Other Spirits gather to witness and 
celebrate this Spirit take the first steps of
 its new life.

name: Dormant Spirit
story:
Dormant Spirit

A Spirit who has taken the maxim, "A Spir
it who sleeps will grow strong and healthy
," a little too much to heart. Is more of a d
reamer than other Spirits.

name: Draggy Spirit
story:
Draggy Spirit

A Spirit who will remind you of a certain s
omeone. Is more of a chatterbox than othe
r Spirits.

name: Natal, Fiery Heart
story:
Natal, Fiery Heart

Natal punched out her 99th beast; it woul
d now serve her loyally. Her near fatal wo
und from 17 years ago had healed, but he
r memory of who she was, why she did no
t age, and how she ended up in this forest
 remained locked deep in her heart.

name: Natal, Blazing Heart
story:
Natal, Blazing Heart

Natal prayed before the grave of the doct
or who had nursed her body and soul back
 to life. Then she walked out of the forest
, her 100 servants gazing on. She would a
t last live the life she chose, just as her tw
o sisters would have wanted.

name: Tera
story:
Tera

Tera was a wanderer. As usual, many chal
lengers crossed her path, some more skill
ed than others. Yet, none could ever best 
her. As her fame spread, she found hersel
f being hunted by both the East and West
, and even by the disciples of Babel.

name: Tera the Demon
story:
Tera the Demon

The disciple of Babel was much faster tha
n Tera had expected. She inspected the du
al sword-wielding woman who stood befo
re her. The more she studied her, the mor
e her pulse began to race. The demon girl
 then licked her lips in a most vulgar way.

name: Tera the Demon Lord
story:
Tera the Demon Lord

Was she human or god--or neither? Tera 
herself had no idea, but the fact her heart
 was the Magic Stone itself suggested she
 was made and not birthed. It did not matt
er to Tera, who continued journeying to fi
nd someone--anyone--who could best her
.

name: Lara
story:
Lara

What Lara desired was simple, and anyone
 who could fully embrace her would have s
ufficed. But she went about it in ways tha
t angered the gods of Babel, who imprison
ed her in a dark cell where she met the cu
rsed disciple who could grant her wish.

name: Lili
story:
Lili

Lili slept a lot, but was never still. One da
y, she woke up to find disciples all around
 her, dead, and no recollection of what ha
ppened. The gods of Babel feared her, and
 imprisoned her in a dark cell where she c
ould finally sleep in peace.

name: Lulu
story:
Lulu

Lulu was a defect, a doll who had acquired
 a Soul. She was a disciple who could not 
fully be one, and so she finally went mute
. She was tossed into a dark cell for dispo
sal, and she prayed the world would never
 again see her ugly visage.

name: Imperial Cyborg: Red
story:
Imperial Cyborg: Red

The visor across her eyes showed a const
ant loop of a girl being whipped. But the s
ound of the whip, the girl's cries, and the 
sight of her torn flesh no longer disturbed
 her. All they did was make her obediently
 fight in one battle after another.

name: Imperial Cyborg: Blue
story:
Imperial Cyborg: Blue

The visor across her eyes showed a const
ant loop of a girl being dunked in water. B
ut the sound of the girl's muted gasps and
 frightened gurgling no longer disturbed h
er. All they did was make her obediently f
ight in one battle after another.

name: Imperial Cyborg: Gold
story:
Imperial Cyborg: Gold

The visor across her eyes showed a const
ant loop of a girl standing in the desert. B
ut the sight of her burnt flesh and eye, pe
cked out by vultures, no longer disturbed
 her. All it did was make her obediently fig
ht in one battle after another.

name: Imperial Cyborg: Black
story:
Imperial Cyborg: Black

The visor across her eyes showed a const
ant loop of a girl confined in a box. But th
e sound of her moans and sight of her bod
y, bent out of shape, no longer disturbed 
her. All it did was make her obediently fig
ht in one battle after another.

name: Imperial Cyborg: Gray
story:
Imperial Cyborg: Gray

The visor across her eyes showed a const
ant loop of a girl surrounded by death. Bu
t the sight and odor of the girl's family ro
tting away or starving no longer disturbed
 her. All it did was make her obediently fig
ht in one battle after another.

?  ?  ?

A mysterious individual in search of the H
idden Mixed Baths. His identity is a compl
ete mystery.

name: Chrono, King of Time
story:
Chrono, King of Time

This story has not yet been told.

name: Ruka
story:
Ruka

Ruka dragged his weak arms and legs thro
ugh the mud. He had escaped the lab with
 his friends, but they had succumbed to th
e disease, leaving just him to fight the mu
tation. Just then, he ran across an army o
fficer who held him and gave him comfort
.

name: Ruka the Blood-cursed
story:
Ruka the Blood-cursed

Part of Ruka's job was to go down below t
he base where those who had lost control
 of what was in them and mutated were be
ing held. Even as he trembled at the fate t
hat would one day befall him, he lopped th
e heads off of his former friends.

name: Ruche, Dragon-bound
story:
Ruche, Dragon-bound

Just my luck! Just when we're starting to 
get a good rhythm going, and just when h
e's about to go rescue his sister, the scien
tists get cold feet and release me from him
! Now he's whining about  how he never a
bandons his friends. Gah!

name: Cyru
story:
Cyru

The Great Cataclysm had robbed her of he
r family, home, and life. At the age of 2, s
he was taken to the Empire and placed in 
the beggars' district in the lowest levels. 
It was hell, but it was one she shared with
 others like her--her new family.

name: Cyru the Blood-cursed
story:
Cyru the Blood-cursed

One day, the scientists came and took her
 and the other children with the "scar" for
 experiments: whippings, confinements, d
unkings, and being left out in the desert. 
As her "family" transformed into hideous 
things, only one officer gave her comfort.

name: Kairos
story:
Kairos

[FF1493]List of Unreturned Items[-]
* Moonbow Dragon, Vol. II
* 23 ballpoint pens
* Flint
* Phonograph in library
* Villa (Burned down)
* Map to headquarters
* Time

name: Isuzu
story:
Isuzu

Far north of the Imperial Palace in Yamato
, capital of Zipang, is a shrine for a dark g
od. Isuzu's job is to defend and care for th
e god who, for some reason, has raised hi
m as a girl since he was left in front of the
 shrine one winter morning.

name: Isuzu, Delicate Elegance
story:
Isuzu, Delicate Elegance

Three years had passed since the Empero
r cut off all ties with the dark god. No env
oy from the Palace had since set foot in th
e shrine. And yet there she was: Kaguya, 
one of the Eight Blades, entering the shri
ne with a cat-like laugh.

name: Fuma
story:
Fuma

Like the legendary Zero, Fuma was a ninja
--the last one in Zipang. But with peace in
 the land, his clan had chosen to disband,
 and he was now out of a job. As he sat fo
rlornly on the roof of a stately palace one
 day, a girl called out to him.

name: Fuma, Steel Shadow
story:
Fuma, Steel Shadow

Fuma was one of the Eight Blades now, bu
t he still hoped to do what Zero did once-
-give up everything to stave off disaster f
or the sake of a girl. And so he still protec
ted her from afar--the girl with the guns w
ho had saved him from starvation.

name: Jilil
story:
Jilil

1. Theta, Ancient Weapon
2. The Holy Grail
3. Vazar: Lost Paradise
4. The Three Evil Eyes

6. Three Lands, Two Worlds
7. The Capital
Afterword: The Path

name: Jilil the Adventurer
story:
Jilil the Adventurer

[FF1493]Foreword[-]
As I walked the ruins as usual, I heard a d
ragon-like roar coming from below. That's
 how I found the secret staircase--and ho
w I found this injured guy and this key. Th
at was the beginning of my adventures.

name: Arys
story:
Arys

Arys wields a talking sword and hunts dra
gons for the Order--a powerful group in t
he Capital. He has a certain dangerous ha
bit that his blade will scold him about--bu
t to no avail. And so it just leads Arys dow
n the path chosen for him.

name: Arys, Holy Sword Bearer
story:
Arys, Holy Sword Bearer

The child had pulled the sword out of the 
ground in the ruins of the Great Cataclysm
. But the sword was unable to possess the
 boy, for he didn't seem to have a heart. A
nd so the Holy Sword--as it had once bee
n known--finally turned into its true form
.

name: Melissa
story:
Melissa

She found it on a rainy day, dying on the g
round. The black ooze--or gas?--reminde
d her of the black cat she once owned. Fro
m loneliness or whimsy, she decided to te
ther its life to the contents of her flask, u
sing her own life as collateral.

name: Melissa, Soul-devoured
story:
Melissa, Soul-devoured

As an alchemist, Melissa wanted nothing m
ore than the world to accept her dark art.
 But lately, all her creations appeared odd
 and deformed. Beside her was the flask w
ith her "black cat," laughing in a way that 
made it sound like an actual cat.

name: Zwill
story:
Zwill

[a551ce]Day is light. Night is dark. [e62d05]She tests and p
olishes[-] [a551ce]Even this, [e62d05]the tools needed[-] [a551ce]I have[-]
 One soul, [a551ce]forgotten. [e62d05]in 17 years'[-] many bo
dies, [46af1e]I don't know [e62d05]time. [46af1e]where I am,[-] carve
d until nothing [46af1e]or even what body[-] can be 
felt. [46af1e]I am inside.

name: Zwill the Fragmented
story:
Zwill the Fragmented

[e62d05]I seek out [a551ce]I've never met[-] She's coming. [e62d05]m
y body [46af1e]We are [a551ce]another [969600]Ow ow[-] remove [e62d05]with
out fragmenting. [46af1e]here to [a551ce]person. [969600]Ooowww[-]
 myself from [46af1e]hunt. [00a5dc]I go in the box[-] the boxe
